(III) ASSIST CHILDREN, YOUNG, ADULT AND ELDERLY PEOPLE OF BRITISH BENGALI AND OTHER ETHNIC MINORITIES OF THE UNITED KINGDOM AND BANGLADESH AND SPECIALLY THE LONDON BOROUGH OF TOWER HAMLETS THROUGH THEIR LEISURE ACTIVITIES TO EDUCATE AND TO DEVELOP THEIRPHYSICAL, MENTAL AND SPIRITUAL CAPACITIES THAT THEY MAY GROW UP WITH FULL MATURITY AS INDIVIDUALS AND MEMBERS OF SOCIETY AND THAT THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE MAY BE IMPROVED AND ALSO TO ACHIEVE THE PROTECTION AND PRESERVATION OF PUBLIC HEALTH BY THE PROVISION OF ADVICE CONCERNING LEGAL AND ILLEGAL DRUGS.

name: EAST HOATHLY C.E. SCHOOL FPTA
activities: Our Charity is formed of named friends, parents and the teachers association where we do various fundraising events throughout the year to raise money for the school. To give the children either treats, outings, or to buy additional books and equipment for the school.
objects: TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF PUPILS IN THE SCHOOL IN PARTICULAR BY 1. DEVELOPING EFFECTIVE RELATIONSHIPS BETWEEN THE STAFF PARENTS AND OTHERS ASSOCIATED WITH THE SCHOOL; 2. ENGAGING IN ACTIVITIES OR PROVIDING FACILITIES OR EQUIPMENT WHICH SUPPORT THE SCHOOL AND ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUPILS;

name: MOUNT OLIVE MINISTRIES
activities: Helping homeless people; soup runs; providing furniture to the needy; providing a place of worship; conference centre pastoral care; providing finances for Christian outreach to local schools; financial support to Seeway Trust (orphanage in Ghana).
objects: THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE CHRISTIAN FAITH IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE STATEMENT OF FAITH ATTACHED TO THIS CONSTITUTION

name: SHARE JESUS
activities: Develops and produces resources  Trains and equips local churches and Christians Brings organisations and churches together for mission
objects: 1. THE OBJECTS OF THE CHARITY ARE TO ADVANCE THE CHRISTIAN FAITH ACCORDING TO THE STATEMENT OF FAITH IN CLAUSE 3.2 BY SUCH MEANS BEING CHARITABLE AS THE CHARITY MAY DETERMINE BUT PARTICULARLY BY MAKING KNOWN THE GOSPEL OF OUR LORD JESUS CHRIST 2. THE CHARITY'S STATEMENT OF FAITH IS AS FOLLOWS:- "SHARE JESUS UNITES IN MISSION WITH CHURCHES, CHURCH DEPARTMENTS AND CHRISTIAN AGENCIES WHICH, ACKNOWLEDGING GOD'S REVELATION IN CHRIST, CONFESS THE LORD JESUS CHRIST AS GOD AND SAVIOUR ACCORDING TO THE SCRIPTURES, AND, IN OBEDIENCE TO GOD'S WILL AND IN THE POWER OF THE HOLY SPIRIT, COMMIT THEMSELVES TO SEEK A DEEPENING OF THEIR COMMUNION WITH CHRIST AND WITH ONE ANOTHER IN THE CHURCH WHICH IS HIS BODY, AND TO FULFIL THEIR MISSION TO PROCLAIM THE GOSPELBY COMMON WITNESS AND SERVICE IN THE WORLD, TO THE GLORY OF THE ONE GOD, FATHER SON AND HOLY SPIRIT."

name: THE ST BLAZEY AMATEUR OPERATIC SOCIETY
activities: Stage Prefomance
objects: THE OBJECT OF THE SOCIETY IS TO EDUCATE THE PUBLIC IN THE DRAMATIC AND OPERATIC ARTS, TO FURTHER THE DEVELOPMENT OF PUBLIC APPRECIATION AND TASTE IN THE SAID ARTS (TO ASSIST AND FURTHER SUCH CHARITABLE INSTITUTIONS AND CHARITABLE PURPOSES AS THE COMMITTEE SHALL FROM TIME TO TIME DETERMINE);

name: THE 6 8 TRUST
activities: The 6:8 trust is a charity which focuses on the relief of poverty, disaster and famine, and the support of Christian teaching, missionary and parish work.
objects: 3.1. THE TRUSTEES SHALL HOLD THE CAPITAL AND INCOME OF THE TRUST FUND UPON TRUST AS TO THE INCOME, AND ALL OR SUCH PART OR PARTS OF THE CAPITAL, AS THE FOUNDER MAY BY NOTICE IN WRITING TO THE TRUSTEES DETERMINE, FOR OR TOWARDS SUCH CHARITABLE PURPOSES, AND TO MAKE DONATIONS TO SUCH CHARITABLE INSTITUTION OR INSTITUTIONS, AT SUCH TIME OR TIMES AND IN SUCH MANNER AS THE FOUNDER MAY FROM TIME TO TIME BY A LIKE NOTICE DIRECT. WHERE  THE FOUNDER HAS NOT, BY 5 APRIL IN THE INCOME TAX YEAR FOLLOWING THATIN WHICH THE INCOME ARISES, GIVEN A DIRECTION WHICH FULLY DISPOSES OF THE INCOME, THEN SUCH INCOME SHALL BE DISPOSED OF IN ACCORDANCE WITH SUB-CLAUSE 3.2 3.2.1 SUBJECT TO, AND IN DEFAULT OF ANY DIRECTION UNDER SUB-CLAUSE 3.1, AND INSOFAR AS ANY SUCHDIRECTION IS NOT EXHAUSTIVE, THE TRUSTEES SHALL APPLY THE INCOME FOR OR TOWARDS SUCH CHARITABLE PURPOSES AND SHALL MAKE DONATIONS TO SUCH CHARITABLE INSTITUTIONS, AT SUCH TIMES AND IN SUCH MANNER, AS THE TRUSTEES SHALL IN THEIR DISCRETION THINK FIT. WITHOUT DETRACTING FROM THE GENERAL NATURE OF THE CHARITY, CHRISTIAN CHARITABLE INSTITUTIONS AND PURPOSES SHALL BE PREFERRED BY THE TRUSTEES. 3.2.2 THE TRUSTEES MAY, IN THEIR DISCRETION, FOR THE PERIOD OF 21 YEARS FROM THE DATE OF THIS DEED, INSTEAD OFAPPLYING THE INCOME OF THE CHARITY IN ANY YEAR, ACCUMULATE ALL OR ANY PART OF SUCH INCOME AT COMPOUND INTEREST BY INVESTING THE SAME AND THE RESULTING INCOME IN ANY AUTHORISED INVESTMENTS AND HOLD THE SAME AS AN ACCRETION TO AND AS PART OF THE CAPITAL OF THE CHARITY, WITHOUT PREJUDICE TO THE RIGHT OF THE TRUSTEES TO APPLY THE WHOLE OR ANY PART OF SUCH ACCUMULATED INCOME IN ANY SUBSEQUENT YEAR AS IF THE SAME WERE INCOME OF THE CHARITY ARISING IN THE THEN CURRENT YEAR.

name: DECV LIMITED
activities: Education, Training and Resources
objects: TO ADVANCE EDUCATION BY 3.1 ALLOWING THOSE PEOPLE WHO WOULD NOT OTHERWISE ACCESS COMPUTER TECHNOLOGY, THE OPPORTUNITY TO HAVE PUBLIC ACCESS TO IT EQUIPMENT, WHICH WILL GIVE THEM ACCESS TO INFORMATION, INTERNET AND EMAIL FACILITIES. 3.2 ALLOWING PEOPLETHE FREEDOM TO LEARN IN AN ENVIRONMENT TO BENEFIT FROM NEW TECHNOLOGY USING IT AND ICT, ENSURING THAT A GREATER NUMBER OF LOCAL RESIDENTS HAVE THE OPPORTUNITY TO LEARN AN IMPORTANT KEY SKILL. 3.3 PROVIDING A FACILITY AND EXPERTISE THAT THE PUBLIC CANUTILISE TO OBTAIN IT SUPPORT WHICH WOULD ENABLE THEM TO FULLY TAKE ADVANTAGE OF NEW MEDIA TECHNOLOGY AS IT DEVELOPS IN THE FUTURE ENHANCING THEIR SKILLS FURTHER.

name: THE BEEHIVE AFTER SCHOOL CLUB
activities: A) TO PROVIDE THE NECESSARY FACILITIES FOR THE DAILY CARE, RECREATION AND EDUCATION OF CHILDREN DURING OUT OF SCHOOL HOURS AND SCHOOL HOLIDAYS. B) TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION AND TRAINING OF THE PERSONS IN THE PROVISION OF SUCH CARE EDUCATION AND RECREATIONAL FACILITIES.
objects: A) TO PROVIDE THE NECESSARY FACILITIES FOR THE DAILY CARE, RECREATION AND EDUCATION OF CHILDREN DURING OUT OF SCHOOL HOURS AND SCHOOL HOLIDAYS. B) TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION AND TRAINING OF THE PERSONS IN THE PROVISION OF SUCH CARE EDUCATION AND RECREATIONAL FACILITIES.

name: IOL EDUCATIONAL TRUST
activities: The IoL Educational Trust promotes the teaching and study of modern languages and of cognate educational subjects. It also promotes the advancement of educational learning in and the dissemination of knowledge of modern languages in all their aspects, in particular the determining of standards and criteria and the setting and holding of examinations for students of modern languages.
objects: The Company is established with the purpose of promoting the teaching, learning and study of modern languages in pursuit of the advancement of educational learning and the dissemination of information, understanding and knowledge of all aspects of modern languages. In particular it determines standards and criteria requisite to the setting and holding of exams for learners of modern languages and professional linguists such that they attain recognition of their proficiency in one or more such languages.

name: THE I W GRIFFITHS TRUST
activities: Support for Christian faith and ministry in education and support for those relieving poverty.

name: ECKINGTON VILLAGE DEVELOPMENT COMPANY
activities: Rental of the managed office space has proved challenging in the current economic climate. The festival was very successful and a Town Team has been formed to help increase footfall within the town centre
objects: THE PROMOTION FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC OF URBAN OR RURAL REGENERATION IN AREAS OF SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC DEPRIVATION AND IN PARTICULAR ECKINGTON BY THE FOLLOWING MEANS: 1) THE CREATION OF TRAINING AND EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITIES BY THE PROVISION OF WORKSPACE BUILDINGS AND/OR LAND USE ON FAVOURABLE TERMS 2) THE MAINTENANCE IMPROVEMENT OR PROVISION OF PUBLIC AMENITIES 3) THE PRESERVATION OF BUILDINGS OR SITES OF HISTORIC OR ARCHITECTURAL IMPORTANCE 4) THE PROTECTION OR CONSERVATION OF THE ENVIRONMENT 5) THE PROVISION OF RECREATIONAL FACILITIES FOR THE PUBLIC AT LARGE OR THOSE WHO BY REASON OF THEIR YOUTH AGE INFIRMITY OR DISABLEMENT POVERTY OR SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC CIRCUMSTANCES HAVE NEED OF SUCH FACILITIES 6) THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION TRAININGOR RETRAINING PARTICULARLY AMONG UNEMPLOYED AND PROVIDING UNEMPLOYED PEOPLE WITH WORK EXPERIENCE 7) THE PROVISION OF FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE OR BUSINESS ADVICE OR CONSULTANCY IN ORDER TO PROVIDE TRAINING AND EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITIESFOR UNEMPLOYED PEOPLE IN CASES OF FINANCIAL OR OTHER CHARITABLE NEED THROUGH HELP: I) IN SETTING UP THEIR OWN BUSINESS OR II) TO EXISTING BUSINESS 8) THE PROMOTION OF PUBLIC SAFETY AND THE PREVENTION OF CRIME 9) SUCH OTHER MEANS AS MAY FROM TIME TO TIME BE DETERMINED SUBJECT TO THE PRIOR WRITTEN CONSENT OF THE CHARITY COMMISSION FOR ENGLAND AND WALES IN ECKINGTON DERBYSHIRE

name: INSTITUTION OF OCCUPATIONAL SAFETY AND HEALTH BENEVOLENT FUND
activities: To relieve poverty amongst current and former members of IOSH and their families and dependants and former employees of IOSH
objects: To relieve hardship amongst current and former members of the Institution and their families and dependants and former employees of the Institution, in accordance with any grant making policy of the Charity.

name: LANCASTER ROYAL GRAMMAR SCHOOL BOARDING CHARITY
activities: TO ASSIST THE GOVERNORS OF THE LANCASTER ROYAL GRAMMAR SCHOOL IN PROMOTING THE EDUCATION OF THE PUPILS THEREIN.
objects: THE AWARD OF SCHOLARSHIPS TENABLE AT THE SCHOOL TO BOARDER PUPILS AND THEREBY FURTHER THEIR EDUCATION AND SUCH SCHOLARSHIPS MAY BE AWARDED TO PUPILS SELECTED ON GROUNDS OF ACADEMIC MERIT OR TO ASSIST WITH THE PAYMENT OF BOARDING FEES OF PUPILS WHO NEED FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO ENABLE THEM TO ATTEND THE SCHOOL AS BOARDERS

name: HALIFAX YOUNG SINGERS LIMITED
activities: Halifax Young Singers provides a programme of weekly rehearsals and regular performance opportunities for singers aged 9 upwards. The choir welcomes all singers, irrespective of experience, and links up with other young musicians to provide quality music-making opportunities for all.
objects: TO PROMOTE THE EDUCATION OF YOUNG PEOPLE IN THE ARTS AND SCIENCE OF MUSIC, BY THE PRESENTATION, PROMOTION AND PERFORMANCE OF CHORAL MUSIC, CONCERTS AND OTHER LEISURE TIME ACTIVITIES, SO AS TO DEVELOP THEIR PHYSICAL AND MENTAL CAPACITIES, SO THAT THEY MAY GROW TO FULL MATURITY AS INDIVIDUALS AND MEMBERS OF SOCIETY.

name: Ostro Fayre Share Foundation
activities: To make grants and donations to other charitable organisations.
objects: THE TRUSTEES SHALL HOLD THE CAPITAL AND INCOME OF THE TRUST FUND UPON TRUST TO APPLY THE INCOME  AND ALL OR SUCH PART OR PARTS OF THE CAPITAL AT SUCH TIME OR TIME AND IN SUCH MANNER TO OR FOR THE BENEFIT OF SUCH EXCLUSIVELY CHARITABLE OBJECTS AND PURPOSES IN ANY PART OF THE WORLD AS THE TRUSTEES MAY IN THEIR ABSOLUTE DISCRETION THINK FIT PROVIDED THAT THE TRUSTEES MAY AT THEIR ABSOLUTE DISCRETION FOR THE PERIOD OF 21 YEARS FROM THE DATE OF THIS DEED INSTEAD OF APPLYING THE INCOME OF THE CHARITY INANY YEAR ACCUMULATE ALL OR ANY PART OF SUCH INCOME AT COMPOUND INTEREST BY INVESTING THE SAME AND THE RESULTING INCOME IN ANY OF THE AUTHORISED INVESTMENTS AND HOLD THE SAME AS A ACCRETION TO AND AS PART OF THE CAPITAL OF THE CHARITY WITHOUT PREJUDICE TO THEIR RIGHT TO APPLY THE WHOLE OR ANY PART OF SUCH ACCUMULATED INCOME IN ANY SUBSEQUENT YEAR AS IF THE SAME WERE INCOME OF THE CHARITY ARISING IN THE THEN CURRENT YEAR.

name: KUUMBA IMANI MILLENNIUM CENTRE LIMITED
activities: The principle activity of the charity is to support racial minorities as priorities within a multi-racial approach, and to help them to reach their full potential through the provision of appropriate services.
objects: 1) TO PROMOTE FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC ANY CHARITABLE PURPOSE CONNECTED WITH URBAN REGENERATION IN AREAS OF SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC DEPRIVATION IN LIVERPOOL WITH PARTICULAR EMPHASIS ON THE NEEDS OF LIVERPOOL 8 BY ALL OR ANY OF THE FOLLOWING MEANS:-  A) TO PROMOTE EDUCATION AND TRAINING OPPORTUNITIES WITH SPECIAL EMPHASIS ON PROVIDING ACCESS TO SUCH OPPORTUNITIES FOR PEOPLE WHO ARE BY REASON OF SOCIAL OR ECONOMIC DISADVANTAGE ARE OTHERWISE UNABLE TO GAIN SUCH ACCESS.  B) TO PROVIDE ADVICE, INFORMATION AND ASSISTANCE IN RELATION TO CITIZENSHIP SO AS TO DEVELOP THEIR CAPACITY AND POTENTIAL OF INDIVIDUALS AS MEMBERS OF SOCIETY AND THAT THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE MAY BE IMPROVED.  C) TO PROTECT AND PRESERVE THE GOOD HEALTH OF THOSE WHO ARE IN DANGEROF BECOMING ADDICTED TO OR DEPENDANT UPON OR THOSE WHO HAVE ALREADY BECOME SO ADDICTED OR DEPENDANT ON LEGAL OR ILLEGAL DRUGS OF ANY DESCRIPTION.  D) TO RELIEVE UNEMPLOYMENT BY THE PROVISION OF ADVICE AND TRAINING TO UNEMPLOYED INDIVIDUALS CONCERNINGUNEMPLOYMENT, SELF-EMPLOYMENT AND THE ESTABLISHMENT OF CO-OPERATIVE ENTERPRISES AND THE PROVISION OF CV WRITING, JOB SEARCH AND JOB CLUB FACILITIES FOR THEM.  E) THE PROVISION OF PRACTICAL SUPPORT OF UNEMPLOYED PEOPLE BY CHILD CARE FACILITIES OR ASSISTANCE WITH TRAVEL.  F) THE PROVISION OF LAND AND BUILDINGS AT BELOW OR SUBSIDISED RENTS TO BUSINESSES STARTING UP.  G) THE PROVISION OF CAPITAL GRANTS FOR EQUIPMENT FOR NEW BUSINESSES, OR THE PAYMENT TO EXISTING COMMERCIAL BUSINESSES TO TAKE ON ADDITIONAL STAFF FROM AMONGST UNEMPLOYED PEOPLE.  H) TO RELIEVE HOUSING NEED BY THE PROVISION OF ADVICE, INFORMATION, ASSISTANCE AND REPRESENTATION TO THOSE IN CIRCUMSTANCES OF HOUSING NEED, OR FACILITATING THE PROVISION OF IMPROVEMENT OF SOCIAL HOUSING THROUGH CO-OPERATION AND PARTNERSHIP WITH OTHER AGENCIES.  I) TO PROVIDE OR PROMOTE THE PROVISION OR RECREATIONAL FACILITIES FOR THOSE IN NEED THROUGH CO-OPERATION AND PARTNERSHIP WITH OTHER AGENCIES.  J) TO RELIEVE POVERTY.  K) TO PROTECT, ENHANCE ANDCONSERVE THE ENVIRONMENT.  L) TO PROVIDE PUBLIC HEALTH FACILITIES AND CHILDCARE.  M) TO PROMOTE PUBLIC SAFETY AND PREVENTION OF CRIME.  N) SUCH OTHER MEANS WHICH MAY FROM TIME TO TIME BE DETERMINED.  2) TO PROVIDE SUPPORT, ADVICE, EDUCATION AND TRAINING FOR WOMEN OF DIVERSE CULTURE WHO HAVE EXPERIENCED OPPRESSION AND DISCRIMINATION.

name: THE LANGAGE CHARITABLE TRUST
activities: Investments only to provide income to make donations.
objects: TO SUPPORT SUCH CHARITIES AND TO PROMOTE SUCH CHARITABLE PURPOSES AS THE TRUSTEES FROM TIME TO TIME THINK FIT

activities: support for families with HME
objects: THE RELIEF OF SICKNESS AND THE PROTECTION AND PRESERVATION OF THE HEALTH OF PERSONS AFFECTED BY HME AND ANY RELATED CONDITION AND THEIR FAMILIES AND CARERS IN PARTICULAR BY BUT NOT RESTRICTED TO (A)  THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE EDUCATION OF THE MEDICAL PROFESSION AND THE GENERAL PUBLIC INTO HME AND ITS IMPLICATIONS FOR THE FAMILY. (B)  THE PROMOTION OF RESEARCH INTO THE CAUSES, EFFECTS, TREATMENT AND MANAGEMENT OF HME AND TO DISSEMINATE THE USEFUL RESULTS THEREOF.

name: NELSON MUSEUM
activities: A museum promoting the history of Admiral Lord Nelson's achievements to the general public and schools.
objects: TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUBLIC BY THE PROVISION OF A MUSEUM FOR THE DISPLAY, PRESERVATION AND STUDY OF, AND RESEARCH INTO, A COLLECTION OF PICTURES, MAPS, ENGRAVINGS AND OTHER ART FORMS, LETTERS, WRITINGS AND OTHER MEMORABILIA RELATING TO THE LIFE AND TIMES OF THE LATE VICE ADMIRAL HORATIO NELSON, HIS EARLY LIFE IN NORFOLK AND GREAT YARMOUTH AND THE POLITICAL, ECONOMIC, SOCIAL AND NAVAL HISTORY OF ENGLAND IN THE 18TH AND 19TH CENTURIES

name: THE HICKS LODGE TRUST
activities: To provide grants to promote the conservation, protection and improvement of the physical and natural environment in Oakthorpe, Donisthorpe, Ashby Woulds and Ashby de la Zouch and to provide facilities in the interests of social welfare for recreation and leisure time occupation with the objective of improving the conditions of life for those living or working in the area of benefit.
objects: TO PROVIDE GRANTS TO PROMOTE THE CONSERVATION, PROTECTION AND IMPROVEMENT OF THE PHYSICAL AND NATURAL ENVIRONMENT IN OAKTHORPE, DONISTHORPE, ASHBY WOLDS AND ASHBY DE LA ZOUCH AND THE PROVIDE FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATIONAND LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION WITH THE OBJECTIVE OF IMPROVING THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE FOR THOSE LIVING OR WORKING IN THE AREA OF BENEFIT.

name: PLYMOUTH MARINE LABORATORY
activities: PML undertakes cutting-edge, interdisciplinary research in the sunlit ocean in anticipation of growing societal needs and to promote stewardship of marine ecosystems.  PML's research is undertaken nationally and internationally and in collaboration with a wide range of partners to understand how the ocean works and to help monitor society's activities in, and impacts on, the ocean.
objects: TO CARRY OUT RESEARCH IN ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY INCLUDING MARINE AND ESTUARINE ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY, AND DISSEMINATE RESULTS OF SUCH RESEARCH AND DATA AND IDEAS GENERATED IN THE COURSE OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH SUCH RESEARCH FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC AND TO ADVANCE PUBLIC EDUCATION IN THE PRINCIPLES AND PRACTICE OF SUCH SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY.

name: THE SRI GURU HARKRISHAN SAHIB TRUST

objects: 1) TO ADVANCE THE SIKH RELIGION IN SALFORD (GREATER MANCHESTER ENGLAND)  2) TH ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUBLIC IN THE CULTURE AND HISTORY OF SIKHISM BY THE PROVISION OF LANGUAGE AND MUSIC CLASSES.  3) THE RELIEF OF POVERTY SICKNESS AND DISTRESS.

name: OPERATION SMILE UNITED KINGDOM
activities: Operation Smile is an international volunteer based medical services charity providing free reconstructive surgery and aftercare to children and young adults around the  world, primarily for cleft lips and/or palates. In the UK, we raise funds to treat facial deformities, recruit and supply medical volunteers, help train local medical teams/build infrastructure & public raise awareness.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CHARITY ARE TO PRESERVE AND PROTECT THE PHYSICAL, MENTAL AND EMOTIONAL HEALTH OF CHILDREN WITH FACIAL AND FUNCTIONAL DEFORMITIES THROUGHOUT THE WORLD.

name: KSB FOUNDATION

name: ALPHA OMEGA EVANGELICAL PENTECOSTAL CHURCH

objects: TO ADVANCE THE CHRISTIAN RELIGION IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE HOLY BIBLE, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT BY WAY OF LIMITATION BY PREACHING THE GOSPEL OF OUR LORD JESUS CHRIST AND BY TEACHING THE CHRISTIAN DOCTRINES IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE HOLY BIBLE

name: THE PILGRIMS' SCHOOL
activities: Operating the Pilgrims' School winchester
objects: TO PROMOTE AND PROVIDE FOR THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION IN ACCORDANCE WITH CHRISTIAN PRINCIPLES AND THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE CHRISTIAN RELIGION IN PARTICULAR BY OPERATING THE SCHOOL KNOWN AS THE PILGRIMS' SCHOOL, WINCHESTER AND PROVIDING EDUCATION AND TRAINING FOR THE CHORISTERS.

name: ONE LIFE INTERNATIONAL
activities: OLi helps social pioneers turn dreams into reality, vision into mission, stimulating creative thinking around evolving concepts and projects. Sharing experience and networks, building indigenous leadership capabilities in a culturally sensitive and sustainable way both in the UK and overseas, facilitating entrepreneurial action that builds and releases social capital and sustainability.
objects: TO RELIEVE POVERTY, UNEMPLOYMENT AND SOCIAL EXCLUSION CAUSED BY AGE AND INFIRMITY POVERTY OR OTHER SOCIAL OR ECONOMIC CIRCUMSTANCES (HEREINAFTER REFERRED TO AS "SOCIAL EXCLUSION") AND WHERE HEREAFTER REFERENCE IS MADE TO "SOCIALLY EXCLUDED PEOPLE" THAT SHALL MEAN PEOPLE SUFFERING FROM SOCIAL EXCLUSION AS SO DEFINED. TO ADVANCE EDUCATION AND TRAINING PARTICULARLY AMONG UNEMPLOYED AND SOCIALLY EXCLUDED PEOPLE. TO RELIEVE UNEMPLOYMENT FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT IN SUCH WAYS AS MAY BE THOUGHT FIT, INCLUDING ASSISTANCE TO FIND EMPLOYMENT. TO ADVANCE THE CHRISTIAN RELIGION ESPECIALLY BY (BUT NOT LIMITED TO) THE PROVISION OF CHRISTIAN ADVICE AND COUNSELLING AND TO PROVIDE OPPORTUNITIES FOR CHRISTIAN CHURCHES TO ENGAGE IN SOCIAL OUTREACH AND SERVICE AND FURTHER TO ENCOURAGE THE NETWORKING AND CO-ORDINATING OF THE RESOURCES OF THE CHRISTIAN CHURCH SO AS TO PROVIDE A FOCUS AND VEHICLE FOR CHRISTIAN SERVICE IN LOCAL COMMUNITIES (BOTH IN THE UK AND ABROAD). TO ENCOURAGE AND PROMOTE THE CONSERVATION, PROTECTION AND ENHANCEMENT OF THE NATURAL ENVIRONMENT, SUSTAINABILITY, WASTE REDUCTION AND WASTE RECYCLING.

name: THE OAKLEA TRUST
activities: Supporting children and adults with disabilities
objects: A) TO PROMOTE THE RELIEF AND CARE OF PEOPLE WITH LEARNING AND OTHER DISABILITIES, THE ELDERLY OR INFIRM, AND THOSE WHO ARE SOCIALLY DISADVANTAGED WHO NEED ASSISTANCE BY THE PROVISION OF A SUITABLE HOME ENVIRONMENT AND/OR CARE AND SUPERVISION TO ENABLETHEM TO DEVELOP THEIR MENTAL, PHYSICAL AND SPIRITUAL CAPACITY;  B) TO ADVANCE EDUCATION OF PEOPLE, IN PARTICULAR THOSE WITH LEARNING DISABILITIES OR WHO ARE SOCIALLY DISADVANTAGED, WHO REQUIRE EDUCATION, SPECIALIST TRAINING AND/OR SUPPORT TO ENABLETHEM TO ENTER EMPLOYMENT, TO ADVANCE IN THEIR EMPLOYMENT OR TO ENTER FURTHER STUDIES;  C) TO PROVIDE OR ASSIST IN THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION FOR INDIVIDUALS WHO HAVENEED FOR SUCH FACILITIES BY REASON OF THEIR LEARNING OR OTHER DISABILITY, YOUTH, AGE, INFIRMITY, FINANCIAL HARDSHIP OR SOCIAL CIRCUMSTANCES AND THE GENERAL PUBLIC WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE; AND  D) TO FURTHER SUCH EXCLUSIVELY CHARITABLE AND ANCILLARY PURPOSES ACCORDING TO THE LAW OF ENGLAND AND WALES AS THE TRUSTEES IN THEIR ABSOLUTE DISCRETION DETERMINE FROM TIME TO TIME

name: BRADFORD RAPE CRISIS AND SEXUAL ABUSE SURVIVORS SERVICE
activities: Specialist sexual violence support services. Core services include the telephone & text help line, email gateway, counselling , advocacy & support, shared support groups, Mindfulness. Supporting survivors to have a voice & influence. Jyoti, specialist services for Black, Asian and Minority Ethnic women and girls. Services for girls & young women.
objects: TO RELIEVE THE MENTAL AND PHYSICAL DISTRESS OF WOMEN SURVIVORS OF RAPE AND SEXUAL ASSAULT TO PROMOTE EDUCATION AND RESEARCH IN THE BRADFORD AREA INTO THE SUBJECT OF RAPE AND SEXUAL ASSAULT AND ITS EFFECTS ON WOMEN AND GIRLS, WHETHER THEN BE MEDICAL, SOCIAL AND/OR PSYCHOLOGICAL.

objects: TO, OR FOR THE BENEFIT OF, SUCH EXCLUSIVELY CHARITABLE OBJECTS AND PURPOSES IN ANY PART OF THE WORLD AS THE TRUSTEES MAY IN THEIR DISCRETION THINK FIT..

name: FRIENDS OF AMBERLEY MUSEUM AND HERITAGE CENTRE
activities: The Friends was established to support and assist the Museum and to promote its use and enjoyment by the public in co-operation with its Trustees and Director.  The Friends receive funds by donations, legacies and fund raising events.  All funds may only be used for making grants to the Museum and for the proper expenses of administering the Friends.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE ASSOCIATION ARE TO SUPPORT AND ASSIST  THE MUSEUM AND TO PROMOTE ITS USE AND ENJOYMENT BY THE PUBLIC IN CO-OPERATION WITH ITS TRUSTEES AND CEO.

name: CYNGOR AR BOPETH GWYNEDD CITIZENS ADVICE

name: MARTINEAU GARDENS
activities: Connecting education, well being and the natural environment. Therapeutic Horticulture for people with mental health issues and learning disabilities. objects: A) TO ADVANCED THE GENERAL EDUCATION OF THE PUBLIC OF BIRMINGHAM IN PARTICULAR, BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY IN I) ENVIRONMENT ISSUES II) THE SUSTAINABLE USES OF RESOURCES III) HORTICULTURAL THERAPY AND IV) THE VALUE OF ORGANICALLY GROWN FOOD  AND OTHER CROPS.B) TO PROTECT AND PRESERVE GOOD HEALTH FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE GENERAL PUBLIC, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY, THROUGH HORTICULTURE AND COMPLEMENTARY THERAPIES. name: NEW WRITING SOUTH
activities: ÔÇó	We inform and develop new writing through a programme of educational workshops, events and seminars open to the general public.  Our continuing education programme allows writers to share skills with schools and others in the community. We encourage new writing from untapped sources and who are socially excluded by being home bound or underprivileged.
objects: THE OBJECTS FOR WHICH THE COMPANY IS ESTABLISHED ARE:-  TO ADVANCE EDUCATION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY THE PROMOTION OF THE ARTS, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY ALL FORMS OF NEW WRITING.

name: SOLIHULL CARERS CENTRE
activities: We are an independent charity which has been providing local support to carers for over 12 years.  We offer emotional support, carer's assessments, practical information and advice, social activities and events, a strong voice for carers, support groups, and drop-in and home visit support through our outreach services to carers aged 5 to 105, living anywhere in the borough of Solihull.
objects: TO SUPPORT ADULT AND YOUNG CARERS WHO ARE, OR WERE, CARRYING OUT A CARING ROLE FOR PERSONS WHO ARE DISABLED, ELDERLY OR ILL, BY THE PROVISION OF PRACTICAL HELP, ADVICE, ASSISTANCE, SERVICE, ADVOCACY AND SUPPORT.  ALSO TO ADVANCE EDUCATION CONCERNING CARING AMONGST CARERS, PROFESSIONALS AND THE PUBLIC.

name: THE BURGATE SINGERS
activities: Our repertoire is exciting and wide-ranging and includes choral classics such as Mozart's Requiem, Handel's Messiah and Bach's Magnificat, as well as twentieth century music like Rachmaninoff's Vespers and works by Stravinsky. We perform mainly in local churches and The Diss Corn Hall. We also perform in London, and we sing at weddings and funerals.
objects: TO PROMOTE, DEVELOP AND MAINTAIN PUBLIC EDUCATION IN THE ART AND SCIENCE OF CHORAL MUSIC IN ALL ITS ASPECTS PARTICULARLY, BUT NOT BY WAY OF LIMITATION, BY THE PROVISION OF PUBLIC CHORAL CONCERTS AND RECITALS

name: WARLEY WOODS COMMUNITY TRUST LIMITED
activities: To ensure the long-term restoration and sustainability of Warley Woods Park, and to develop its facilities and events as a central focus for the local community, thus encouraging greater numbers and diversity of people to enjoy this unique environment.
objects: A) TO PROMOTE THE CONSERVATION, PROTECTION AND IMPROVEMENT OF THE PHYSICAL, NATURAL AND HISTORIC ENVIRONMENT OF THE AREA KNOWN AS WARLEY WOODS. B)THE PROVISION OF RECREATIONAL FACILITIES FOR THE PUBLIC AT LARGE OR THOSE WHO BY REASON OF THEIR YOUTH, AGE, INFIRMITY OR DISABILITY, POVERTY OR SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC CIRCUMSTANCES, HAVE NEED OF SUCH FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE. C) THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY BY THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES FOR STUDYING THE HISTORICAL, ARCHAEOLOGICAL ENVIRONMENTAL AND HORTICULTURAL IMPORTANCE OF THE AREA KNOWN AS WARLEY WOODS.

name: AL-BASEERA BRISTOL CENTRE
activities: To promote the benefits of the inhabitants of the City of Bristol in particular,  but not exclusively, those of somali descent, by associating together the inhabitants and the local authorities, voluntary and other organisations to advance education, welfare and leisure time occupations.
objects: 1. TO PROMOTE THE BENEFIT OF THE INHABITANTS OF THE CITY OF BRISTOL, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY THOSE OF SOMALI DESCENT, BY ASSOCIATING TOGETHER THE INHABITANTS AND THE LOCAL AUTHORITIES, VOLUNTARY AND OTHER ORGANISATIONS TO ADVANCE EDUCATION, SOCIAL WELFARE AND LEISURE TIME OCCUPATIONS. 2. TO ESTABLISH A COMMUNITY CENTRE AND TO MAINTAIN AND MANAGE SUCH A CENTRE FOR THE FURTHERANCE OF ABOVE OBJECTS. 3. OTHER SUCH CHARITABLE PURPOSES.

name: PLAISTOW & KIRDFORD SCHOOL ASSOCIATION
activities: Fund raising for the benefit of Plaistow and Kirdford Primary school
objects: TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF PUPILS IN THE SCHOOL IN PARTICULAR BY 1. DEVELOPING EFFECTIVE RELATIONSHIPS BETWEEN THE STAFF PARENTS AND OTHERS ASSOCIATED WITH THE SCHOOL; 2. ENGAGING IN ACTIVITIES OR PROVIDING FACILITIES OR EQUIPMENT WHICH SUPPORT THE SCHOOL AND ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUPILS;

name: TRELOAR TRUST
activities: THE CHARITY PROVIDES TWO EDUCATIONAL ESTABLISHMENTS AND VARIOUS OUTREACH SERVICES TO YOUNG PEOPLE WITH DISABILITIES
objects: TO PROMOTE THE RELIEF OF PERSONS WITH DISABILITIES (WHETHER PHYSICAL OR OTHERWISE) ("BENEFICIARIES") AND IN PARTICULAR BUT WITHOUT LIMITATION BY ANY OR ALL OF THE FOLLOWING:  1. THE PROMOTION, PROVISION AND MAINTENANCE OF SCHOOLS, COLLEGES AND OTHER EDUCATIONAL ESTABLISHMENTS;  2. THE PROMOTION AND PROVISION OF CARE, THERAPY, TREATMENT AND COUNSELLING TO BENEFICIARIES;  3. THE PROMOTION OF EMPLOYMENT OF BENEFICIARIES WHETHER BY WAY OF THE CREATION AND OPERATION OF WORKSHOPS AND FACILITIES OR OTHERWISE; AND  4. IMPROVEMENT OF THE KNOWLEDGE, UNDERSTANDING AND AWARENESS OF THE PUBLIC INTO THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE AND NEEDS OF BENEFICIARIES AND IN PARTICULAR BUT WITHOUT LIMITATION BY THE PROMOTION OF RESEARCH AND THE PUBLICATION OF THE USEFUL RESULTS OF SUCH RESEARCH.

name: LONG ROCK MEMORIAL INSTITUTE
activities: Village Hall
objects: (I) THE PREMISES SHALL BE USED FOR THE RECREATION EDUCATION AND SOCIAL EDIFICATION OF THE INHABITANTS OF THE SAID VILLAGE (II) NO INTOXICATING LIQUOR SHALL BE BROUGHT ON OR CONSUMED ON THE PREMISES OR ANY PART THERE OF (III) NO GAMBLING SHALL BE ALLOWED ON THE PREMISES OR ANY PART THEREOF

name: UPLEADON CHURCH HALL
activities: Maintaining Upleadon village hall organising events for local residents in hall encouraging local organisations to use the village hall.
objects: THE PROPERTY HEREBY DEMISED (HEREINAFTER CALLED "THE TRUST PROPERTY") SHALL BE HELD UPON TRUST FOR THE PURPOSES OF A VILLAGE HALL FOR THE USE OF THE INHABITANTS OF THE PARISH OF UPLEADON IN THE COUNTY OF GLOUCESTER WITHOUT DISTINCTION OF POLITICAL OR RELIGIOUS OR OTHER OPINIONS INCLUDING USE FOR MEETINGS LECTURES AND CLASSES AND OTHER FORMS OF RECREATION AND LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE FOR THE SAID INHABITANTS

name: REPTON SCHOOL
activities: The School's principal objective is to further the education of children and young persons.  The principal activity is the provision of academic education with pupils taking public exams.
objects: FOR SUCH CHARITABLE PURPOSES AS THE GOVERNORS SHALL FROM TIME TO TIME DECIDE IN PARTICULAR (BUT WITHOUT PREJUDICE TO THE GENERALITY OF THE FOREGOING):  1 TO FURTHER THE EDUCATION (INCLUDING SOCIAL AND PHYSICAL TRAINING) OF CHILDREN AND YOUNG PERSONS  2 TO APPLY (IF THE GOVERNORS SO DECIDE) A YEARLY SUM OF NOT LESS THAN é500 OUT OF THE INCOME OF THE CHARITY IN THE PROMOTION OF EDUCATION, INCLUDING SOCIAL AND PHYSICAL TRAINING, OF CHILDREN AND YOUNG PERSONS RESIDENT IN THE PARISHES OF REPTON OR ETWALL

name: WROXHAM RAILWAY HERITAGE TRUST
activities: Restoration of Wroxham Signalbox
objects: THE TRUSTEES SHALL HOLD THE TRUST FUND  AND ITS INCOME UPON TRUST TO APPLY THEM FOR THE FOLLOWING OBJECTS.  TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUBLIC IN THE HISTORY OF THE RAILWAYS PARTICULARLY WITH REGARD TO SIGNALLING AND SAFETY, BY PRESERVING FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT THE WROXHAM SIGNAL BOX.  TO MANAGE AND ADMINISTER THE BARTON HOUSE RAILWAY FOR THE EDUCATION AND ENJOYMENT OF THE GENERAL PUBLIC AND INTERESTED PARTIES SUCH AS RAILWAY ENTHUSIASTS AND TO ESTABLISH FUNDS TO MAINTAIN THE BARTON HOUSE RAILWAY IN WORKING CONDITION.

name: STEPNEY PRIMARY SCHOOL
activities: This year our children visited a variety of places depending on their age and topic of work within the class.  We had a class visit to the Hull New Theatre  and to Hull Truck Theatre.  Other visits included Hands on History Museum, The Deep and to a local park.
objects: TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUPILS OF STEPNEY PRIMARY SCHOOL (HEREINAFTER CALLED 'THE SCHOOL) BY PROVIDING OR ASSISTING IN THE PROVISION OF EDUCATIONAL, RECREATIONAL AND OTHER CHARITABLE FACILITIES IN AUGMENTATION OF SUCH FACILITIES FINANCED BY THE LOCAL EDUCATION AUTHORITY OR THE DEPARTMENT FOR EDUCATION AND EMPLOYMENT (DFEE)

name: THE HOTHOUSE AT REDHOUSE
activities: The Charity's objects are to advance Christian faith and the education of children, young people and families in particular by the provision of a safe environment for them to gather for educational and recreational activities so as to develop their physical, mental and spiritual capacities and their conditions of life may be improved.
objects: TO ADVANCE THE CHRISTIAN FAITH AND THE EDUCATION OF CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE, IN PARTICULAR BY THE PROVISION OF A SAFE ENVIRONMENT FOR THEM TO GATHER FOR EDUCATIONAL, RECREATIONAL AND OTHER LEISURE-TIME ACTIVITIES SO AS TO DEVELOP THEIR PHYSICAL, MENTAL AND SPIRITUAL CAPACITIES THAT THEY MAY GROW TO FULL MATURITY AS INDIVIDUALS AND MEMBERS OF SOCIETY AND THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE MAY BE IMPROVED.

name: FAIZUL QURAN JAMIA MOSQUE
activities: Faizul Quran Jamia Mosque provides public benefit through its programme of prayers and celebration of the key events in the Islamic Calender. Activities are open to everyone in the community. The mosque also provides Congregational Prayers, Friday Sermons and Eid Prayers. For younger children there are summer and winter schools during holiday period which are very popular with the local community.
objects: 1. TO ADVANCE RELIGION IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE TEACHINGS OF ISLAM; 2 TO ADVANCE EDUCATION 3 TO PROMOTE THE COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION IN HEALTHY RECREATION BY PROVIDING FACILITIES FOR THE PLAYING OF PARTICULAR SPORTS. 4 THE BUILDING AND MAINTENANCE OF A MOSQUE IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE LOCAL AND SURROUNDING MUSLIM COMMUNITY IN BIRMINGHAM, WEST MIDLANDS

name: INNER WHEEL CLUB OF IPSWICH EAST BENEVOLENT FUND
activities: We are part of the world wide Inner Wheel organisation where we believe that through friendship and service to others we can make a difference to other peoples lives. We fund raise, whilst having fun, for many local charities which are sometimes very personal to any, or many, of our members. We also raise funds for Overseas, helping many charities involved in the care of women and children.
objects: THE FUND (AND ANY INCOME DERIVING THEREFROM) SHALL BE APPLIED FOR THE RELIEF OF POVERTY, THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION OR FOR SUCH OTHER CHARITABLE PURPOSES OR SUCH CHARITY AS THE TRUSTEES OF THE FUND SHALL THINK FIT.

name: MERE PEACE MEMORIAL SPORTS AND RECREATION GROUND
activities: Recreation & sport
objects: 1) IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE, TO IMPROVE THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE FOR THE INHABITANTS OF THE AREA OF BENEFIT WITHOUT DISTINCTION OF POLITICAL, RELIGIOUS OR OTHER OPINIONS, BY THE PROVISION AND MAINTENANCE OF A SPORTS AND RECREATIONAL GROUND 2) SUBJECT TO THE PROVISIONS OF CLAUSE 10 THE LAND IDENTIFIED IN THE SCHEDULE TO THIS SCHEME MUST BE RETAINED BY THE TRUSTEE FOR USE FOR THE OBJECT OF THE CHARITY

name: ASHMOLE SCHOOL CHARITABLE TRUST
activities: General charitable activities relating to young people and education
objects: THE CHARITY'S OBJECTS ("THE CHARITY'S OBJECTS") SHALL BE TO APPLY THE TRUST FUND TO OR FOR SUCH CHARITIES OR CHARITABLE PURPOSES AS THE TRUSTEES SHALL FROM TIME TO TIME DECIDE AND IN PARTICULAR (BUT WITHOUT PREJUDICE TO THE GENERALITY OF THE FOREGOING): (A) TO FURTHER THE EDUCATION (INCLUDING PHYSICAL AND SOCIAL TRAINING) OF CHILDREN ATTENDING THE SCHOOL (B) THE RELIEF OF NEED AND SICKNESS AND THE DISTRESS CAUSED THEREBY AMONG CHILDREN ATTENDING THE SCHOOL

name: AMBER VALLEY STROKE GROUP
activities: to hold meetings fortnightly with entertainment and occasional outings to local  venues to promote a convivial and friendly atmosphere for local stroke victims
objects: TO RELIEVE PERSONS SUFFERING FROM STROKE BY THE PROVISION OF SUPPORT, ADVICE AND RECREATIONAL FACILITIES TO SUCH PERSONS AND THEIR CARERS, IN THE INTEREST OF SOCIAL WELFARE SO THAT THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE MAY BE IMPROVED.

name: DISABLEMENT ASSOCIATION HILLINGDON
activities: Dash provides information and advice to disabled people in the London Borough of Hillingdon enabling them to make choices about how they live their lives. Dash also runs a number of activities and sports sessions.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CHARITY ARE TO PROMOTE THE WELFARE OF PERSONS WHO HAVE A PHYSICAL OR SENSORY IMPAIRMENT AND/OR ANY LEARNING OR MENTAL HEALTH IMPAIRMENT AND THEIR CARERS, RELATIONS OR DEPENDANTS PRIMARILY (BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY) IN THE LONDON BOROUGH OF HILLINGDON.

name: FAIRFORD TOWN YOUTH FOOTBALL CLUB
activities: Providing structured facilities for organised youth football for boys and girls, 4 years to 18 years old.
objects: THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE PHYSICAL EDUCATION OF YOUNG PEOPLE BY THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES FOR PLAYING ASSOCIATION FOOTBALL.

name: THE DOROTHY PORTER CHARITABLE TRUST
activities: The main charity activity is to provide financial assistance for the repair and maintenance of St Paul's Church, Bedford
objects: THE TRUSTEES SHALL HOLD THE CAPITAL AND INCOME OF THE TRUST FUND UPON TRUST FOR THE SPECIFIC CHARITABLE OBJECT OF PROVIDING FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE FOR THE REPAIR AND MAINTENANCE OF THE PARISH CHURCH OF ST PAUL'S, BEDFORD

name: CHESS Homeless
activities: Initially to provide emergency accommodation and support for the homeless in Essex. Then to assess each individuals needs and work towards finding long term solutions as appropriate.
objects: TO RELIEVE HARDSHIP AND DISTRESS AMONGST THE HOMELESS PRIMARILY BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY WITHIN THE DISTRICT ADMINISTERED BY ESSEX COUNTY COUNCIL AND AMONG THOSE LIVING IN ADVERSE HOUSING CONDITIONS, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY BY (A) THE PROVISION OF EMERGENCY ACCOMMODATION AND ASSOCIATED SERVICES, AND (B) BY THE PROVISION OF ASSISTANCE TOWARDS ACQUIRING A SETTLED WAY OF LIFE THROUGH REHABILITATION  AND PERMANENT ACCOMMODATION.  THE RELIEF OF POVERTY OF PERSONS LIVING IN THE ABOVE-MENTIONED AREA.

name: COMMUNITY TRANSPORT CALDERDALE LTD
activities: Provision of transport to those residents of Calderdale and Kirklees who cannot access alternatives for reasons of disability (mental & physical), ill health, old age, geographical isolation, poverty or social exclusion.
objects: TO PROVIDE A COMMUNITY TRANSPORT SERVICE FOR SUCH OF THE INHABITANTS OF CALDERDALE AND ITS NEIGHBOURHOOD WHO ARE IN NEED OF SUCH A SERVICE BECAUSE OF AGE, SICKNESS OR DISABILITY (MENTAL OR PHYSICAL), OR POVERTY, OR BECAUSE OF A LACK OF AVAILABILITY OFADEQUATE AND SAFE PUBLIC PASSENGER SERVICES.

name: CHURCHES TOGETHER IN WILLENHALL
activities: The Charity leads cooperative working between eleven churches in Willenhall, Walsall. Our major activity, involving more than 90% of our finances, is the running of a community resource centre in the shopping area of our town. We provide various forms of help and support to any in the community, including signposting, debt and money advice, bereavement support, advocacy and a listening ear.
objects: 1  TO SPREAD AND INCREASE THE KNOWLEDGE OF CHRISTIANITY IN AND AROUND THE WILLENHALL AREA  2  THE RELIEF OF POVERTY, SICKNESS AND DISTRESS FOR THOSE PEOPLE WHO ARE IN NEED BY VIRTUE OF THEIR FINANCIAL CIRCUMSTANCES, SICKNESS OR SOCIAL ISOLATION, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY BY THE PROVISION OF AND SIGNPOSTING TOWARDS ADVICE, INFORMATION AND COUNSELLING.

name: ST. AGNES SCOUT AND GUIDE PARENTS' COMMITTEE
activities: Education/Training, Sport/Recreation, Environment/Conservation/Heritage Children/Young people/Elderly/Old people/People with disability/Special needs/General public/Mankind Makes grants to individuals Provides human resources Provides building facilities/open space Acts as umbrella or resource body
objects: THE COMMITTEES OBJECTS ARE TO HELP AND EDUCATE THE YOUNG THROUGH THEIR LEISURE TIME ACTIVITIES, SO TO DEVELOP THEIR PHYSICAL, MENTAL AND SPIRITUAL CAPACITIES THAT THEY MAY GROW TO FULL MATURITY AS INDIVIDUALS AND MEMBERS OF SOCIETY AND THAT THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE MAY BE IMPROVED.

name: THE KAY MASON FOUNDATION
activities: TO HELP BUILD A BRIDGE BETWEEN SOUTH AFRICA'S FIRST AND THIRD WORLD COMMUNITIES AND TO HEAL SOME OF THE WOUNDS OF THE APARTHEID ERA BY PROVIDING EQUAL OPPORTUNITY TO CHILDREN OF ALL COLOURS THROUGH EDUCATION.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE TRUST (THE "OBJECTS") ARE: THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE ACADEMIC AND TECHNICAL AND PHYSICAL EDUCATION OF YOUNG PERSONS UP TO THE AGE OF 25, OR SUCH OTHER AGE AS THE TRUSTEES MAY, FROM TIME TO TIME DETERMINE. (PLEASE SEE COPY OF THE DEED ON FILE FOR DETAILS).

name: THE FRIENDS OF DEEPALAYA
activities: To further education and self reliance amongst poor in India, particularly children.
objects: TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION AND TO RELIEVE POVERTY, SICKNESS AND DISTRESS OF CHILDREN IN INDIA WITH A VIEW TO IMPROVING THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE BY FURTHERING THE WORK OF DEEPALAYA (A REGISTERED INDIAN CHARITY).

name: THE LANGHORNE COMPANY
activities: To advance the religious and other charitable work of the Congregation
objects: TO ADVANCE THE RELIGIOUS AND OTHER CHARITABLE WORK OF THE CONGREGATION AS THE TRUSTEES WITH THE APPROVAL OF THE SUPERIOR SHALL THINK FIT.

name: HEARTLIFE
activities: Raising awareness of heart illness in Children
objects: THE RELIEF OF SICKNESS IN CHILDREN AND ADULTS, PARTICULARLY THOSE SUFFERING FROM HEART AND LUNG IRREGULARITIES

name: FOUR DEANS STROKE CLUB
activities: Information relating to a Stroke.   Therapeutic in form of exercise both physical and mental.  Recreational - visits to local places of interest.   Fundraising - 1 local Fair per annum.
objects: "TO RELIEVE THE NEEDS OF PERSONS WHO HAVE SUFFERED A STROKE, IN PARTICULAR BY THE PROVISION OF SUPPORT, THERAPEUTIC AND RECREATIONAL SERVICES FOR SUCH PERSONS AND THEIR CARERS, IN THE INTEREST OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND SO THAT THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE MAY BE APPROVED."

name: ST GEORGE'S LUPSET LTD
activities: The activities seek to the local community through a range of services which assist the regeneration within an area of disadvantage; main activities include pre school and after school childcare,adult learning and health promotion.
objects: TO PROMOTE THE BENEFIT OF THE INHABITANTS OF LUPSET AND THE NEIGHBOURHOOD THEREOF (HEREINAFTER CALLED 'THE AREA OF BENEFIT') WITHOUT DISTINCTION OF SEX, SEXUAL ORIENTATION, RACE OR OF POLITICAL RELIGIOUS OR OTHER OPINIONS, BY ASSOCIATING TOGETHER THE SAID INHABITANTS AND THE LOCAL AUTHORITIES, VOLUNTARY AND OTHER ORGANISATION IN A COMMON EFFORT TO ADVANCE EDUCATION AND TO PROVIDE FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION AND OTHER LEISURE-TIME OCCUPATION WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE FOR THE SAID INHABITANTS.

name: THE WOODLAND ASSOCIATION
activities: Parent Teachers Association.Raising funds for the benefit of the school community
objects: TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUPILS IN THE SCHOOL IN PARTICULAR BY 1. DEVELOPING EFFECTIVE RELATIONSHIPS BETWEEN STAFF PARENTS AND OTHERS ASSOCIATED WITH THE SCHOOL; 2. ENGAGING IN ACTIVITIES OR PROVIDING FACILITIES OR EQUIPMENT WHICH SUPPORT THE SCHOOL AND ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUPILS.

name: AGE UK CANTERBURY
activities: General Charitable Purposes
objects: TO PROMOTE THE RELIEF OF ELDERLY PEOPLE IN ANY MANNER WHICH NOW OR HEREAFTER MAY BE DEEMED BY LAW TO BE CHARITABLE IN AND AROUND CANTERBURY

name: EAST OF LONDON FAMILY HISTORY SOCIETY
activities: To promote and encourage the study of family history amongst those living in or having ancestral links with that area of Greater London north of the Thames extending from the edge of the City of London at Bishopsgate and Aldgate, eastwards through the London Borough of Hackney, Tower Hamlets, Newham, Redbridge and Dagenham, to the edge of Metropolitan Essex at Havering.
objects: 1) TO PROMOTE AND ENCOURAGE THE PUBLIC AND PRIVATE STUDY OF FAMILY HISTORY, GENEALOGY, HERALDRY AND LOCAL HISTORY WITH PARTICULAR REFERENCE TO THE EASTERN AREA OF GREATER LONDON 2) TO PROMOTE THE PRESERVATION, SECURITY AND ACCESSIBILITY OF ARCHIVAL MATERIAL

name: YAN KONG MORAL AND CULTURE ASSOCIATION
activities: Organisation of fund raising events, accepting donations and contributions and applying funds to benefit those in need through organised activities that include the advancement of education, religious and recreational practice aim to improve the quality, health and the general well being of life of the participants.
objects: THE ASSOCIATION IS ESTABLISHED TO ADVANCE PUBLIC EDUCATION, SPIRITUAL, MENTAL AND MORAL IMPROVEMENT PARTICULARLY BY PROMOTING THE TEACHING OF CONFUCIUS. 2.  TO ESTABLISH A PLACE OF WORSHIP FOR PERSONS PROFESSING THEIR BELIEFS IN CONFUCIANISM IN ORDER TO ADVANCE RELIGIOUS EDUCATION BASED ON THE DOCTRINES AND PRINCIPLES OF CONFUCIANISM AND TO ENCOURAGE FOLLOWERS TO LEAD INCREASINGLY PURER SPIRITUAL AND HEALTHIER LIVES.  (PLEASE SEE A COPY OF THE CONSTITUTION AND SPECIAL RESOLUTION ON FILE FOR DETAILS).

name: EAST MIDLAND BAPTIST ASSOCIATION
activities: Acts as umbrella resource body for the benefit of Baptist churches in the East Midland region.
objects: THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE CHRISTIAN RELIGION ESPECIALLY BE THE MEANS OF AND IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE PRINCIPLES OF THE BAPTIST DENOMINATION AS SET OUT FOR THE TIME BEING IN THE DECLARATION OF PRINCIPLE OF THE BAPTIST UNION OF GREAT BRITAIN.

name: SOLIHULL INDOOR BOWLS CLUB LIMITED
activities: The promotion of community participation in healthy recreation by the provision of facilities for playing bowls.
objects: THE PROMOTION OF COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION IN HEALTHY RECREATION BY THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES FOR PLAYING BOWLS

name: NORWICH CONSOLIDATED CHARITIES
activities: The Charity makes grants to individuals and other organisations with a charitable purpose.  It also owns two almshouses: Doughty's, providing support and care in 56 flats for older people; and Bakery Court for people with a mental health problem.  Beneficiaries must be resident in the City of Norwich.  Grants to individuals with at least 1 dependent child are mainly for household items.
objects: A) THE PROVISION OF HOUSING ACCOMMODATION FOR BENEFICIARIES; AND B) SUCH CHARITABLE PURPOSES FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE RESIDENTS AS THE TRUSTEES DECIDE; AND C) THE RELIEF OF PERSONS RESIDENT IN THE AREA OF BENEFIT WHO ARE: 1) IN FINANCIAL NEED, HARDSHIP OR DISTRESS; OR 2) IN FINANCIAL NEED AND SICK, CONVALESCENT, DISABLED OR INFIRM BY RELIEVING THEIR SUFFERING OR ASSISTING THEIR RECOVERY

name: BURY GATEWAY
activities: Running a drop-in centre Social Club Sports Training
objects: THE RELIEF OF PEOPLE WITH LEARNING DISABILITIES BY PROVIDING HELP AND SUPPORT FOR THEM AND THEIR FAMILIES, DEPENDANTS AND CARERS, AND TO PREVENT LEARNING DISABILITIES FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT. TO PROVIDE OR ASSIST IN THE COUNTIES OF LANCASHIRE AND GREATER MANCHESTER IN THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES FOR RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION FOR PEOPLE WHO HAVE NEED THEREOF BY REASON OF MENTAL HANDICAP AND WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE.

name: CURE INTERNATIONAL (UK)
activities: CURE provides life-changing surgery for children in resource-poor countries,  living with correctable conditions such as hydrocephalus, clubfoot, spinal deformities etc. CURE provides pastoral care in a culturally-sensitive way. CURE delivers surgical training for national medical practitioners and carries out research  to improve the healthcare infrastructures of the countries that we serve.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CHARITY ARE TO PROVIDE, FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT, PARTICULARLY IN AREAS OF LOW INCOME (I) MEDICAL TREATMENT AND CARE FOR INFANTS, CHILDREN AND YOUNG ADULTS SUFFERING FROM CORRECTABLE, DISABLING CONDITIONS, PARTICULARLY BY THE ESTABLISHMENT, MAINTENANCE, MANAGEMENT AND/OR DEVELOPMENT OF MEDICAL FACILITIES AND SERVICES, (II) CARE AND SUPPORT FOR THE FAMILIES AND CARERS OF SUCH INFANTS, CHILDREN AND YOUNG ADULTS, (III) APPROPRIATE TRAINING FOR MEDICAL PRACTITIONERS AND (IV) SUCH OTHER PURPOSES AS ARE CHARITABLE UNDER THE LAWS OF ENGLAND AND WALES BOTH WITHIN THE UNITED KINGDOM OF GREAT BRITAIN AND NORTHERN IRELAND AND ELSEWHERE IN THE WORLD, ALL SUCH OBJECTS TO BE CONDUCTED IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE ETHOS OF THE CHRISTIAN FAITH.

name: HILL CITY CHURCH LONDON
activities: To advance the Christian faith in accordance with the Statement of Faith
objects: THE CHARITY'S OBJECTS ("THE OBJECTS") ARE:  (A) TO ADVANCE THE CHRISTIAN FAITH IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE STATEMENT OF FAITH IN THE SCHEDULE AND TO PROVIDE A CHRISTIAN COUNSELLING CENTRE IN LONDON AND IN SUCH OTHER PARTS OF THE UNITED KINGDOM AND THE WORLD AS THE TRUSTEES MAY FROM TIME TO TIME THINK FIT;  (B) TO ADVANCE CHRISTIAN EDUCATION GENERALLY IN LONDON AND IN SUCH OTHER PART OF THE UNITED KINGDOM AND THE WORLD AS THE TRUSTEES MAY FROM TIME TO TIME THINK FIT;  (C) TO RELIEVE PERSONS WHO ARE IN CONDITION OF NEED OR HARDSHIP OR WHO ARE SICK AND TO RELIEVE THE DISTRESS CAUSED THEREBY IN SUCH PARTS OF LONDON, THE UNITED KINGDOM OR THE WORLD AS THE TRUSTEES MAY FROM TIME TO TIME THINK FIT;  (D) TO PROMOTE FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE INHABITANTS OF SUCH LOCAL COMMUNITIES IN LONDON, THE UNITED KINGDOM AND THE WORLD AS THE TRUSTEES FROM TIME TO TIME THINK FIT THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES FOR RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION OF INDIVIDUALS WHO HAVE NEED OF SUCH FACILITIES BY REASON OF THEIRYOUTH, AGE, INFIRMITY OR DISABLEMENT, FINANCIAL HARDSHIP OR SOCIAL ECONOMIC CIRCUMSTANCES OR FOR THE PUBLIC AT LARGE IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE OF THE SAID INHABITANTS.

name: LIVING THE GOSPEL (EAST RIDING) FUND
activities: To fulfil the objectives of the Living the Gospel initiative
objects: TO ADVANCE THE CHRISTIAN FAITH BY FULFILLING THE CENTRAL AIM OF THE ARCHBISHOP OF YORK'S INITIATIVE 'LIVING THE GOSPEL' WITHIN THE DIOCESE OF YORK ACCORDING TO THE MISSION STATEMENT IN THE SCHEDULE ATTACHED TO THIS DEED.

name: ALDERTON VILLAGE POND AND GREEN
activities: Maintenace of the village pond and green and the care of many species of ducks
objects: THE ALDERTON TRUSTEES HEREBY DECLARE THAT THEY AND THEIR SUCCESSORS IN TITLE WILL HOLD THE PROPERTY HEREBY CONVEYED UPON TRUST FOR THE USE OF AND ENJOYMENT BY PERSONS FROM TIME TO TIME FORMING PART OF THE COMMUNITY OF THE VILLAGE KNOWN AS ALDERTON AFORESAID.

name: BISHOP'S STORTFORD COMMUNITY HOSPITAL CHARITABLE TRUST
activities: No activities
objects: TO RELIEVE PATIENTS AND FORMER PATIENTS OF THE BISHOP'S STORTFORD COMMUNITY HOSPITAL AND OTHER INVALIDS IN THE COMMUNITY WHO ARE SICK, CONVALESCENT, DISABLED, HANDICAPPED, INFIRM OR IN NEED OF FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE AND, GENERALLY, TO SUPPORT THE CHARITABLE WORK OF THE SAID HOSPITAL.

name: PCOMNIBUS
activities: Computer recycling. Refurbish donated computers.
objects: IN THE AREA OF LANCASHIRE COUNTY COUNCIL TO PROMOTE THE EFFECTIVENESS AND EFFICIENCY OF CHARITIES OR THE CHARITABLE ACTIVITIES OF VOLUNTARY ORGANISATIONS AND/OR THE RELIEF OF INDIVIDUALS WHO ARE IN NECESSITOUS ECONOMIC CIRCUMSTANCES BY THE RECYCLING AND DISTRIBUTION OF INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY EQUIPMENT AND ASSOCIATED TRAINING CALCULATED TO RELIEVE SUCH NEEDS.

name: EASTLEIGH OPERATIC AND MUSICAL SOCIETY
activities: The production of musicals and operettas
objects: TO PROMOTE THE ADVANCEMENT AND IMPROVEMENT OF GENERAL EDUCATION IN RELATION TO ALL ASPECTS OF THE ART OF DRAMA AND MUSIC AND THE DEVELOPMENT OF PUBLIC APPRECIATION OF SUCH ART AND MUSIC.

name: EASTLEIGH OPERATIC AND MUSICAL SOCIETY
activities: The production of musicals and operettas
objects: TO PROMOTE THE ADVANCEMENT AND IMPROVEMENT OF GENERAL EDUCATION IN RELATION TO ALL ASPECTS OF THE ART OF DRAMA AND MUSIC AND THE DEVELOPMENT OF PUBLIC APPRECIATION OF SUCH ART AND MUSIC.

name: MIRZA FOUNDATION
activities: The relief of poverty, sickness and distress of any person who is suffering as a result of drough, earthquake, flood or other nutural disaster or who by reason of his her social economic conditions is need of such assistance.
objects: THE RELIEF OF POVERTY, SICKNESS AND THE DISTRESS OF ANY PERSON WHO IS SUFFERING AS A RESULT OF DROUGHT, EARTHQUAKE, FLOOD OR OTHER NATURAL DISASTER OR WHO BY REASON OF HIS OR HER SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC CONDITIONS IS IN NEED OF SUCH ASSISTANCE.

name: AL KHAIR TRUST
activities: Strengthening the Church through education.
objects: I.  TO ADVANCE THE CHRISTIAN FAITH IN BRITAIN AND ELSEWHERE BY FACILITATING AND CARRYING OUT CROSS CULTURAL WITNESSING; PROMOTING BIBLICAL AND MISSIOLOGICAL STUDY AND RESEARCH; AND DEVELOPING THEOLOGICAL EDUCATION PROGRAMMES.  II.  TO RELIEVE POVERTY AND TO PROMOTE THE PRESERVATION AND PROTECTION OF GOOD HEALTH AMONG PEOPLE IN NEED IN PAKISTAN, CENTRAL ASIA AND RELATED REGIONS BY THE PROVISION OF INFORMATION, ADVICE, FOOD, EQUIPMENT AND OTHER GOODS AND SERVICES CALCULATED TO RELIEVE SUCH NEEDS.  III.  TO ADVANCE EDUCATION IN PAKISTAN, CENTRAL ASIA AND RELATED AREAS BY THE PROVISION OF VOCATIONAL AND SKILLS TRAINING FOR ADULTS AND SUPPORT FOR FAMILIES TO ENABLE THEM TO SEND THEIR CHILDREN TO SCHOOL.LY BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY BY THE PROVISION OF GRANTS.

name: LEADING THE WAY EUROPE
activities: Leading The Way carries out its activities in accordance with its aims and objectives. Domestic radio broadcasts are carried by Premier Radio daily during weekdays on both terrestrial and satellite stations. The Leading The Way television program is broadcast on TBN and Daystar. LTW currently has dual language programming available in English and twenty two other languages.
objects: TO ADVANCE THE CHRISTIAN FAITH IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE STATEMENT OF BELIEFS APPEARING IN THE SCHEDULE HERETO IN THE UNITED KINGDOM AND EUROPE AND IN SUCH OTHER PARTS OF THE WORLD AS THE DIRECTORS OF THE CHARITY (HEREIN CALLED "THE TRUSTEES") MAY FROM TIME TO TIME THINK FIT AND TO FULFIL SUCH OTHER PURPOSES WHICH ARE EXCLUSIVELY CHARITABLE ACCORDING TO THE LAW OF ENGLAND AND WALES AND ARE CONNECTED WITH THE CHARITABLE WORK OF THE CHARITY

name: BEDFORD SCHOOL FOUNDATION
activities: FUND RAISING AND MAKING GRANTS IN ACCORDANCE WITH OBJECTIVES
objects: THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE EDUCATION OF PUPILS AND FORMER PUPILS OF BEDFORD SCHOOL BY PROVIDING FUNDS, ITEMS, SERVICES AND FACILITIES THAT IT IS NOT THE OBLIGATION OF ANY STATUTORY AUTHORITY TO PROVIDE.

name: THE WORSLEY VILLAGE TOWNSWOMEN'S GUILD
activities: Fund raising monthly raffle for local charities.
objects: A TOWNSWOMEN'S GUILD IS FORMED FOR SUCH PURPOSES GENERALLY AS MAY FROM TIME TO TIME BE CHARITABLE ACCORDING TO THE LAW OF ENGLAND AND WALES AND MORE SPECIFICALLY (WITHOUT PREJUDICE TO THE GENERALITY OF THE FOREGOING):- 1. TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF WOMEN IRRESPECTIVE OF RACE CREED AND PARTY  SO AS TO ENABLE THEM TO MAKE THE BEST CONTRIBUTION TOWARDS THE COMMON GOOD. 2. TO EDUCATE SUCH WOMEN IN THE PRINCIPLES OF GOOD CITIZENSHIP AND IN ALL PUBLIC QUESTIONS BOTH NATIONAL AND INTERNATIONAL. 3. TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUBLIC BY CARRYING OUT RESEARCH INTO ANY PUBLIC QUESTIONS WHETHER LOCAL NATIONAL OR INTERNATIONAL, AND PUBLISHING THE USEFUL RESULTS OF SUCH RESEARCH. 4. TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUBLIC BY PROMOTING PUBLIC UNDERSTANDING OF ANY SUBJECT OF EDUCATIONAL VALUE WHERE WOMEN HAVE PARTICULAR KNOWLEDGE OR EXPERIENCE. 5. TO PROVIDE OR ASSIST IN THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES FOR RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION FOR SUCH WOMEN IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND WITH A VIEW TO IMPROVING THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE.

name: ST FRANCIS COMMUNITY CHURCH
activities: Local Community Church providing both worship and practical support for all those living in the Headley Down area. The Church also runs a Food Bank, "Coffee Plus" mornings, KraftiKids and KraftiTots clubs, Ladies Lunches, The Headley Down Community Choir, San Fran Art, and San Fran Needle Craft classes. Annual events include a free day's outing to the seaside for KraftiKids &Tots families.
objects: THE TRUSTEES SHALL PERMIT THE SAID LAND BUILDINGS AND PREMISES TO BE USED OCCUPIED AND ENJOYED AS A CHURCH OR PLACE OR RELIGIOUS WORSHIP BY A CONGREGATION OF PROTESTANTS ACTING ACCORDING TO THE PURPOSES AND INTENTIONS OF THE COMMUNITY CHURCH IDEA AS SET OUT IN THE FIRST SCHEDULE HERETO AND FOR PUBLIC AND OTHER MEETINGS AND SERVICES HELD ACCORDING TO THE ABOVE MENTIONED PURPOSES AND INTENTIONS AND FOR RECREATION IN CONNECTION WITH THE SAID COMMUNITY CHURCH OR FOR THE BENEFIT OF ITS MEMBERS.  ALSO FOR THE INSTRUCTION OF CHILDREN AND ADULTS AND FOR THE PROMOTION OF SUCH OTHER RELIGIOUS PHILANTHROPIC EDUCATIONAL OR RECREATIVE PURPOSES AS THE TRUSTEES SHALL FROM TIME TO TIME DIRECT.

name: THE VINE DROP-IN CENTRE
activities: To provide a Centre in Aldershot which offers information, advice, counselling, and healthcare services and welfare and recreational facilities to it clients and particularly those disadvantaged by homelessness, unemployment, illness, addiction, poverty or other social deprivation; to reduce social isolation, enable change and improve quality of life,
objects: TO PROVIDE A CENTRE IN ALDERSHOT WHICH OFFERS INFORMATION, ADVICE, COUNSELLING AND HEALTHCARE SERVICES AND WELFARE AND RECREATIONAL FACILITIES TO ITS CLIENTS AND PARTICULARLY THOSE WHO ARE DISADVANTAGED BY HOMELESSNESS, UNEMPLOYMENT, ILLNESS, ADDICTION, POVERTY OR OTHER SOCIAL DEPRIVATION; TO REDUCE THEIR SOCIAL ISOLATION, ENABLE CHANGE AND IMPROVE THEIR QUALITY OF LIFE

name: HONEYBEEZ PRE-SCHOOL
activities: Provides Preschool education for children aged 2 years and 9 months to 4 years and 11 months old.
objects: TO ENHANCE THE DEVELOPMENT AND EDUCATION OF CHILDREN PRIMARILY UNDER STATUTORY SCHOOL AGE BY ENCOURAGING PARENTS TO UNDERSTAND AND PROVIDE FOR THE NEEDS OF THEIR CHILDREN THROUGH COMMUNITY GROUPS AND BY: (A) OFFERING APPROPRIATE PLAY FACILITIES AND TRAINING COURSES, TOGETHER WITH THE RIGHT OF PARENTS TO TAKE RESPONSIBILITY FOR AND TO BECOME INVOLVED IN THE ACTIVITIES OF SUCH GROUPS, ENSURING THAT SUCH GROUPS OFFER OPPORTUNITIES FOR ALL CHILDREN REGARDLESS OF RACE, CULTURE, RELIGION, MEANS OR ABILITY (B) ENCOURAGING THE STUDY OF THE NEEDS OF SUCH CHILDREN AND THEIR FAMILIES AND PROMOTING PUBLIC INTEREST IN AND RECOGNITION OF SUCH NEEDS IN THE LOCAL AREAS (C) INSTIGATING AND ADHERING TO AND FURTHERING THE AIM OF THE PRE-SCHOOL LEARNING ALLIANCE.

name: THE TRING COMMUNITY SPORTS TRUST
activities: For the benefit of the inhabitants of Tring and the surrounding areas
objects: FOR SUCH CHARITABLE PURPOSES FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE INHABITANTS OF TRING IN THE COUNTY OF HERTFORD AND THE SURROUNDING AREAS (HEREINAFTER CALLED "THE AREA OF BENEFIT") AS THE TRUSTEES FROM TIME TO TIME DETERMINE (HEREINAFTER CALLED "THE OBJECTS").

name: SAVE THE WORLD CLUB
activities: Environmental activities benefitting disadvantaged communities to: - make use of waste provisions; - upcycle materials for social and environmental benefit; - activities to raise awareness at a diverse range of community, public and social events; - use of music, art and humour to promote good practice in Kingston upon Thames, SW London, UK & Internationally.
objects: MEMORANDUM AND ARTICLES OF ASSOCIATION INCORPORATED ON THE 3RD OF OCTOBER 2002 AS AMENDED BY SPECIAL RESOLUTION ON THE 17TH OF DECEMBER 2002

name: WEST SURREY GUILD OF SPINNERS WEAVERS AND DYERS
activities: Promotion of the crafts of spinning, weaving and dyeing.
objects: TO MAINTAIN AND DEVELOP THE CRAFTS OF SPINNING WEAVING AND DYEING.

name: BOLTON NURSERY LIMITED
activities: Provide childcare and education
objects: THE CHARITY'S OBJECTS ("THE OBJECTS") ARE TO ENHANCE THE DEVELOPMENT AND EDUCATION OF CHILDREN PRIMARILY UNDER STATUTORY SCHOOL AGE BY ENCOURAGING PARENTS TO UNDERSTAND AND PROVIDE FOR THE NEEDS OF THEIR CHILDREN THROUGH COMMUNITY GROUPS AND BY:- (A) OFFERING APPROPRIATE PLAY FACILITIES COURSES, TOGETHER WITH THE RIGHTS OF PARENTS TO TAKE RESPONSIBILITY FOR AND TO BECOME INVOLVED IN THE ACTIVITIES OF SUCH GROUPS, ENSURING THAT SUCH GROUPS OFFER OPPORTUNITIES FOR ALL CHILDREN REGARDLESS OF RACE, CULTURE, RELIGION OR MEANS. (B) ENCOURAGING THE STUDY OF THE NEEDS OF SUCH CHILDREN AND THEIR FAMILIES AND PROMOTING PUBLIC INTEREST IN AND RECOGNITION OF SUCH NEEDS IN THE LOCAL AREA.

name: HANDCYCLING ASSOCIATION OF THE UNITED KINGDOM
activities: Promotion of handcycling to disabled people
objects: THE PROVISION OF RECREATIONAL FACILITIES FOR PEOPLE WITH A MOBILITY IMPAIRMENT WHO BY REASON OF THEIR YOUTH, AGE, INFIRMITY OR DISABLEMENT, POVERTY OR SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC CIRCUMSTANCES HAVE NEED OF SUCH FACILITIES IN PARTICULAR THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES FOR THE SPORT OF HANDCYCLING.

name: LIGHTS IN FRANCE 2002 UNINCORPORATED TRUST
activities: The method of achieving our Object has been mainly by financial support of our field workers, Wayne and Wendy Hadley, who work to improve the relationship between the different churches/congregations and their leaders in St Etienne. Their vision is to encourage and facilitate more church plants and more collaboration in the city-wide body of Christ and strengthening of the local church family.
objects: THE OBJECT OF THE TRUST IS TO ADVANCE THE CHRISTIAN FAITH PRIMARILY BY BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY CHRISTIAN WITNESS, LOVE AND CONCERN IN A PRACTICAL WAY;   THROUGH EVANGELISM, CHURCH PLANTING AND PASTORAL WORK,   BY PROVIDING TRAINING AND PASTORAL CARE ESPECIALLY OF YOUNG PEOPLE,   BY MEETING MENTAL, PHYSICAL AND SPIRITUAL NEEDS, AND   BY PROVIDING PRACTICAL AND FINANCIAL HELP TO THOSE IN NECESSITOUS CIRCUMSTANCES.

name: AGE CONCERN STOURBRIDGE AND HALESOWEN
activities: To promote the relief of elderly people in any manner which now or hereinafter may be deemed by law to be charitable in and around those parts of the Metropolitan Borough of Dudley which are known as Stourbridge and Halesowen.
objects: TO PROMOTE THE RELIEF OF ELDERLY PEOPLE IN ANY MANNER WHICH NOW OR HEREINAFTER MAY BE DEEMED BY LAW TO BE CHARITABLE IN AND AROUND STOURBRIDGE AND HALESOWEN AND SURROUNDING AREAS

name: THE SYMBOL TRUST
activities: -supporting  small scale specialist education services for young people with special needs for whom no mainstream  options are available  - developing a web based national educational resource for students with special needs, their teachers and families   - funding specialist after-school education for children whose parents have special needs in order to help them keep up with their peers
objects: 1. TO SUPPORT INDIVIDUALS WITH SPECIAL NEEDS AND THEIR CARERS THROUGH THE PROVISION OF DIRECT ASSISTANCE AND EDUCATION. 2. TO COMMISSION AND SUPPORT RESEARCH PROGRAMMES WHICH WILL INCREASE THE KNOWLEDGE BASE CONCERNED WITH THE NEEDS OF, AND APPROPRIATE INTERVENTIONS FOR, ADULTS AND CHILDREN WITH SPECIAL NEEDS. 3. TO ENABLE THE PUBLICATION OF WORK AND THE DISSEMINATION OF INFORMATION ABOUT THE MODELS OF BEST PRACTICE IN IMPROVING THE INDEPENDENCE, COMMUNICATION, EATING AND DRINKING SKILLS OF PEOPLEWITH SPECIAL NEEDS. 4. TO FUND PROJECTS AND ACTIVITIES OF DIRECT BENEFIT TO PEOPLE WITH SPECIAL NEEDS AND THEIR FAMILIES. 5. TO ORIGINATE, DEVELOP AND PROVIDE TRAINING PROGRAMMES FOR HEALTH, EDUCATION AND SOCIAL SERVICE PRACTITIONERS, AND PARENTS ANDCARERS IN ORDER TO DISSEMINATE BEST PRACTISE AND INCREASE EXPERTISE AND KNOWLEDGE AMONGST THOSE WORKING WITH, AND CARING FOR, ADULTS AND CHILDREN WITH SPECIAL NEEDS. 6. TO ASSIST THROUGH FUNDING, COMMISSIONING OR WORKING IN PARTNERSHIP WITH ANY OTHERORGANISATION TO ACHIEVE THE ABOVE OBJECTS.

name: FAMILIES MATTER AT HURC
activities: TO ADVANCE PUBLIC EDUCATION AND AWARENESS IN THE PROMOTION OF GOOD PARENTING AND OTHER AREAS OF FAMILY LIFE AND TO BUILD SELF CONFIDENCE AND RESILIENCE. THIS IS ACHIEVED THROUGH THE PROVISION OF SUPPORT, TRAINING. ADVICE AND INFORMATION.
objects: TO ADVANCE PUBLIC EDUCATION AND AWARENESS IN THE PROMOTION OF GOOD PARENTING THROUGH THE PROVISION OF ADVICE, INFORMATION, TRAINING AND SUPPORT

name: THE GOODMAN FOUNDATION
activities: To help the poor, the enderly, the sick and/or those with disability and other charitable causes the Trustees determine are worthy.
objects: BOTH IN THE UK AND OUTSIDE THE UK: I) TO HELP THE POOR, THE ELDERLY, THE SICK AND/OR THOSE WITH DISABILITY; AND /OR II) TO BENEFIT SUCH OTHER CHARITABLE CAUSE(S) THE TRUSTEES DETERMINE ARE WORTHY, PROVIDED ALWAYS THAT THE CAUSE IS OF BENEFIT TO THE PUBLIC INTEREST AND CONSTITUTES A 'CHARITABLE CAUSE' WITHIN THE MEANING OF THE CHARITIES ACT 1993 AND THE LAW OF ENGLAND AND WALES.

name: THE LANTERN PROJECT
activities: The Lantern Project provides counselling, support and information for victims of sexual abuse, domestic violence, racial abuse and bullying.
objects: TO PROVIDE FOR THE RELIEF OF SICKNESS AND DISTRESS ARISING THERE FROM AND TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION AMONGST MEN, WOMEN AND YOUNG PEOPLE IN MERSEYSIDE AND NEIGHBOURING REGIONS, IN PARTICULAR, BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY, THOSE WHO HAVE SUFFERED FROM SEXUAL ABUSE, DOMESTIC ABUSE, RACIAL ABUSE OR BULLYING IN CHILDHOOD AND/OR ADOLESCENCE OR AS ADULTS, BY ANY MEANS WHICH ARE CHARITABLE WITHIN THE LAW AS THE TRUSTEES DETERMINE.

name: BETTER DAYS
activities: To ensure that disabled people, particularly those with learning disabilities, have a choice of valued, interesting and fulfilling activities to take part in and have the power to exercise that choice.
objects: TO RELIEVE AND SUPPORT PEOPLE WITH PHYSICAL OR LEARNING DISABILITIES IN THE NORTH EAST OF ENGLAND PARTICULARLY BY THE PROVISION OF ACCESS TO SERVICES WHICH WILL ENABLE PEOPLE WITH SUCH DISABILITIES TO OBTAIN THEIR FULL RIGHTS AND PRIVILEGES AS CITIZENS.  THE PROVISION OF, OR ACCESS TO THE PROVISION OF, FACILITIES FOR RECREATIONAL OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION FOR PEOPLE WITH PHYSICAL OR LEARNING DISABILITIES IN THE NORTH EAST OF ENGLAND  IN THE INTEREST OF SOCIAL WELFARE WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE.

name: SPID THEATRE COMPANY LIMITED
activities: To advance education for the public benefit by the promotion of the arts and to advance citizenship and community development by making the community rooms and activities available to residents  of kensal house estate and the surrounding neighbourhood for skills workshops, events  and recreation which improve the quality of their lives, regardless of their race, class, background or gender.
objects: TO ADVANCE EDUCATION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY THE PROMOTION OF THE ARTS, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY THE ART OF DRAMA AND TO ADVANCE CITIZENSHIP OR COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT, IN PARTICULAR, BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY, BY MAKING COMMUNITY ROOMS AVAILABLE FOR THE USE OF RESIDENTS OF THE KENSAL HOUSE ESTATE AND THE NEIGHBOURHOOD, WITHOUT DISTINCTION OF POLITICAL, RELIGIOUS OR OTHER OPINIONS, INCLUDING USE FOR (A) MEETINGS, LECTURES AND CLASSES AND (B) OTHER FORMS OF RECREATION ANDLEISURE TIME OCCUPATIONS WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE FOR THE RESIDENTS.

name: KRISHAN ANAND HOSPITAL TRUST
activities: Relief of sickness & the promotion of health education/vocational training and preventive medicine at large. Provide resources for "mother and child" health & disabled needs. Co-operate w/well established institutions-hospitals in Western States of India, if needed throughout India.
objects: THE RELIEF OF SICKNESS AND THE PROMOTION OF HEALTH EDUCATION, VOCATIONAL TEACHING, AND PREVENTATIVE MEDICINE FOR THE POOR AND OTHER RESIDENTS LIVINGS IN PUNJAB, HAREYANA, HIMACHAL, PARDESH IN INDIA

name: One Housing Foundation
activities: Work with the homeless and disadvantaged to improve the quality of their lives by providing advice, opportunities and support in areas such as employment and training, financial management, health and education, leisure, sports and the arts.
objects: 1. TO RELIEVE HARDSHIP AND DISTRESS AMONGST THE HOMELESS AND AMONGST THOSE IN NEED;  2. THE RELIEF OF UNEMPLOYMENT;  3. THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION, TRAINING OR RETRAINING PARTICULARLY AMONG UNEMPLOYED PEOPLE, AND PROVIDING UNEMPLOYED PEOPLE WITH WORK EXPERIENCE;  4. THE PROVISION OF FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE, TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE OR BUSINESS ADVICE OR CONSULTANCY IN ORDER TO PROVIDE TRAINING AND EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITIES FOR UNEMPLOYED PEOPLE IN CASES OF FINANCIAL OR OTHER CHARITABLE NEED THROUGH HELP: (I) IN SETTING UP THEIR OWN BUSINESS OR (II) TO EXISTING BUSINESSES;  5. THE PROVISION OF RECREATIONAL FACILITIES OR EDUCATIONAL, LEISURE, SPORTS AND ARTS AND TRAINING OPPORTUNITIES FOR THE PUBLIC AT LARGE OR THOSE WHO BY REASON OF THEIR YOUTH, AGE,INFIRMITY OR DISABLEMENT, POVERTY OR SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC CIRCUMSTANCES, HAVE NEED OF SUCH FACILITIES; AND  6. ANY OTHER CHARITABLE PURPOSE.

name: PEWSHAM COMMUNITY CENTRE ASSOCIATION
activities: To provide an accessible and affordable local centre for:- Social,recreational and cultural activity. Service provision (eg. learning, ICT, clubs,health services etc). Voluntary activity. Local democracy. Family and community events.
objects: THE PROPERTY HEREBY DEMISED (HEREINAFTER IN THIS SCHEDULE CALLED "THE TRUST PROPERTY") SHALL BE HELD UPON TRUST FOR THE PURPOSES OF A COMMUNITY CENTRE FOR THE USE OF A COMMUNITY ASSOCIATION FORMED TO PROMOTE THE BENEFIT OF THE INHABITANTS OF CHIPPENHAM (HEREINAFTER CALLED "THE AREA OF BENEFIT") WITHOUT DISTINCTION OF SEX OR OF POLITICAL RELIGIOUS OR OTHER OPINIONS BY THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION AND THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION AND LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION (INCLUDING THE USE FOR MEETINGS LECTURES AND CLASSES) WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE FOR THE SAID INHABITANTS.

name: FRIENDS OF HARDWICK PRIMARY (FOHPS)
activities: Funding school children activities including workshops, equipment etc.
objects: TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUPILS IN THE SCHOOL IN PARTICULAR BY 1. DEVELOPING EFFECTIVE RELATIONSHIPS BETWEEN STAFF PARENTS AND OTHERS ASSOCIATED WITH THE SCHOOL; 2. ENGAGING IN ACTIVITIES OR PROVIDING FACILITIES OR EQUIPMENT WHICH SUPPORT THE SCHOOL AND ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUPILS;

name: UNITED CHURCHES HEALING MINISTRY LIMITED
activities: We are a Christian counselling, training and resource centre. We offer counselling to anyone over 16 years of age regardless of their faith, on a financial donation basis depending on income. No one is turned away due to inability to pay. We run Christian counselling training courses up to Diploma level 4. We have conference and sports hall facilities for hire by the community.
objects: I)  TO PROMOTE AND PROTECT THE GOOD MENTAL HEALTH OF PEOPLE RESIDENT IN THE UNITED KINGDOM, IN PARTICULAR IN THE COUNTY OF WEST YORKSHIRE BY THE PROVISION OF A CHRISTIAN COUNSELLING SERVICE.  II)  TO ADVANCE EDUCATION BY PROVIDING FACILITIES FOR THE TRAINING OF CHRISTIAN COUNSELLORS.  III)  TO PROMOTE GOOD STANDARDS IN PASTORAL CARE FOR THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE CHRISTIAN FAITH THROUGHOUT THE UNITED KINGDOM WITH REGARD BUT NOT RESTRICTED TO THE COUNTY OF WEST YORKSHIRE.

name: SKEGNESS DAY CENTRE LIMITED
activities: PROVIDE DAY CARE FOR THE ELDERLY AND DISABLED, PROVIDE A DOOR-TO-DOOR SERVICE, COLLECTING CLIENTS TO AND FROM THEIR HOMES AND BRINGING THEM TO THE DAY CENTRE TO BENEFIT FROM THE FACILITIES OFFERED.  PROVIDING FACILITIES IN THE INTEREST OF SOCIAL WELFARE, OR RECREATION OR OTHER SOCIAL LEISURETIME ACTIVITIES, IMPROVING CONDITIONS OF LIFE FOR SUCH PERSONS.
objects: TO PROVIDE AND MAINTAIN A MULTI-PURPOSE DAY CENTRE FOR THE RELIEF OF ELDERLY, HOUSEBOUND AND DISABLED PERSONS OF SKEGNESS AND THE NEIGHBOURHOOD THEREOF AND TO MAKE AVAILABLE THEREIN FACILITIES FOR THE SOCIAL WELFARE, RECREATION AND LEISURE-TIME OCCUPATION WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE FOR SUCH PERSONS TO PROVIDE MEALS AND REFRESHMENTS FOR SUCH PERSONS IN NEED WHETHER FINANCIALLY OR OTHERWISE AND FOR SUCH OTHER OBJECTS FOR THE WELFARE OF SUCH PERSONS AS NOW OR HEREAFTER MAY BEDEEMED BY LAW TO BE CHARITABLE. INCLUDING THE PROVISION OF TRANSPORT TO AND FROM THE DAY CENTRE AND TRANSPORT PROVIDING RECREATION  AND ASSISTANCE TO SUCH PERSONS

name: SAKUTU ORGANISATION
activities: We have recently registered to operate in some developing countries to give children better education especially advanced skills in numeracy and literacy including training of the five senses to promote all round development which we lack in most developing countries & schools. To train teachers who will deliver these areas of learning in due course.
objects: TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION THROUGH THE MONTESSORI METHOD IN PARTICULAR OF CHILDREN BELONGING TO ETHNIC MINORITIES IN THE LONDON BOROUGH OF BRENT.

name: WELLS VINEYARD CHRISTIAN FELLOWSHIP
activities: Introducing more people to Jesus,worship and supporting those in need.
objects: A) TO ADVANCE THE CHRISTIAN FAITH IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE STATEMENT OF BELIEFS APPEARING IN THE SCHEDULE HERETO IN WELLS AND IN SUCH OTHER PARTS OF THE UNITED KINGDOM OR THE WORLD AS THE TRUSTEES MAY FROM TIME TO TIME THINK FIT AND OTHER SUCH PURPOSES WHICH ARE EXCLUSIVELY CHARITABLE ACCORDING TO THE LAW OF ENGLAND AND WALES AND ARE CONNECTED WITH THE CHARITABLE WORK OF THE CHARITY; B) TO ADVANCE THE RELIGIOUS OR SECULAR EDUCATION IN THE SAID WELLS AND IN SUCH OTHER PARTS OF THE UNITED KINGDOM OR THE WORLD AS THE TRUSTEES MAY FROM TIME TO TIME THINK FIT; C) TO RELIEVE PERSONS WHO ARE IN CONDITIONS OF NEED HARDSHIP OR WHO ARE AGED OR SICK AND TO RELIEVE THE DISTRESS CAUSED THEREBY IN THE SAID WELLS AND IN SUCH OTHER PARTS OF THE UNITED KINGDOM OR THE WORLD AS THE TRUSTEES MAY FROM TIME TO TIME THINK FIT.

name: CLAYDON & BARHAM LOCAL COMMUNITY TRUST LIMITED
activities: To provide adequate recreational facilities, playing fields, playgrounds and community centres or other amenities for the benefit of the residents of Claydon & Barham in the interests of social welfare and the object of advancing education, furthering health, relieving poverty, distress or sickness by improving the life of those for whom the facilities are primarily intended.
objects: TO PROVIDE ADEQUATE RECREATIONAL FACILITIES, PLAYING FIELDS, PLAYGROUNDS, COMMUNITY CENTRES AND OTHER AMENITIES OF A SIMILAR CHARACTER FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE COMMUNITY RESIDING IN CLAYDON & BARHAM AND THE NEIGHBOURHOOD IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND THE OBJECT OF ADVANCING EDUCATION, FURTHERING HEALTH, RELIEVING POVERTY, DISTRESS AND SICKNESS OR IN PURSUING ANY OBJECTS WHICH NOW ARE OR HEREAFTER MAY BE DEEMED IN LAW TO BE CHARITABLE BY IMPROVING THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE OF THE PERSONS FOR WHOM THE FACILITIES ARE PRIMARILY INTENDED;

name: THE ARK TRUST CIO
activities: Providing access to and engagement with the arts and education for people with disabilities. Provide social activities, including holidays for people with disabilities. Provide a small day service. Run Healthwatch Bracknell Forest and Healthwatch WAM. Run Signal for Carers, providing support and information in Bracknell Forest and the Royal Borough of Windsor and Maidenhead for unpaid carers.
objects: TO RELIEVE THE NEEDS OF:  (1) (I) FIRSTLY PEOPLE WITH DISABILITIES AND/OR LONG TERM HEALTH  CONDITIONS; AND  (II) SECONDLY CARERS OF PEOPLE WITH DISABILITIES AND/OR LONG TERM  HEALTH CONDITIONS; AND  (III) THIRDLY YOUNG PEOPLE WHO ARE NOT IN EDUCATION, EMPLOYMENT OR  TRAINING  WHO ARE RESIDENT IN THE SOUTH EAST OF ENGLAND.  (2) SUBJECT TO THE ABOVE, PEOPLE SIMILARLY QUALIFIED WHO ARE RESIDENT  OUTSIDE OF THE SOUTH EAST OF ENGLAND BY SUPPORTING THE CHARITABLE WORK OF THE ARK.  (3) TO SUPPORT THE COMMUNITY AND VOLUNTARY SECTOR IN THE AREA OF OPERATION  OF THE CHARITY, FOR THE BENEFIT FOR THE PUBLIC AND TO ENSURE THE EQUALITY FOR ALL PEOPLE TO  ENGAGE IN CITIZENSHIP.

name: Heart of BS13 Ltd
activities: Our activities in South Bristol are designed to promote health and well-being by:   Developing knowledge of, and opportunities for food growing, nutrition and cooking;    Increasing access to affordable fresh produce and wholefoods; Offering one-to-one support to reduce mental and emotional  stress;  Providing opportunities for  regular physical activity.
objects: TO PRESERVE AND PROTECT HEALTH AND TO EDUCATE THE PUBLIC ABOUT THE ENVIRONMENT IN HARTCLIFFE AND THE SURROUNDING AREA

name: AID FOR ROMANIAN CHILDREN CHARITABLE TRUST
activities: Support for hospitals - paediatric & maternity. Transylvanian village projects - food, medicines, shelter, schools project, winter clothes, xmas project, summer camps.
objects: TO RELIEVE POVERTY TO ALLEVIATE SICKNESS AND DISTRESS AMONGST CHILDREN IN ROMANIA TO ADVANCE EDUCATION AMONG PERSONS, AND IN PARTICULAR CHILDREN RESIDENT IN ROMANIA

name: LINK TO CHANGE
activities: We support children and young people and their families and carers in the counties of Bedfordshire, Cambridgeshire and Peterborough who are being sexually exploited, involved in substance misuse and socially excluded. We also work closely with appropriate organisations to advocate for children and young people exploited and socially excluded, and to share knowledge and good practice.
objects: (A) TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION, PRESERVE AND PROTECT THE MENTAL AND PHYSICAL HEALTH AND RELIEVE SICKNESS AND POVERTY OF CHILDREN, YOUNG PEOPLE AND ADULTS.  (B) THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT IN THE ISSUES SURROUNDING CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE, THEIR FAMILIES AND CARERS, SEXUAL EXPLOTATION, SUBSTANCE MISUSE AND SOCIAL EXCLUSION.  IN RESPONSE TO THE NEEDS PRESENTED BY THE LOCAL COMMUNITIES OF CAMBRIDGESHIRE AND ADJACENT COUNTIES.

name: IDEAL CHARITY
activities: Charity is involved in activities related to diagnosis, management and rehabilitation of hearing impaired in less developed countries. It supports all activities which directly or indirectly benefit the hearing impaired. Charity also supports education related activities, both residential and non-residential of hearing impaired.
objects: TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF DEAF PERSONS IN LESS DEVELOPED COUNTRIES PARTICULARLY BY PROVISION OF EDUCATION, TRAINING, EQUIPMENT AND FUNDING

name: HAMPTON DENE PRIMARY SCHOOL PARENTS, TEACHERS AND  FRIENDS ASSOCIATION
activities: We raise money for Hampton Dene Primary School to ensure the children have the equipment and experiences they need to develop and learn. Activities have included - Summer Fayre, Christmas Fayre, Autumn Fayre, Cake Sales, School Discos, Fashion Shows and Craft Competitions.
objects: TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF PUPILS IN THE SCHOOL.

name: RYEDALE LEISURE CLUB
activities: Leisure activities --sports, arts, games, social activities-- for Adults with Learning Disabilities.
objects: (A)  THE RELIEF OF PEOPLE WITH A LEARNING DISABILITY IN PARTICULAR BY THE PROVISION OF HELP AND SUPPORT FOR THEM AND FOR THEIR FAMILIES, DEPENDANTS AND CARERS, AND TO PREVENT LEARNING DISABILITIES FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT; AND (B)  TO PROVIDE OR ASSIST IN THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES FOR THE RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION FOR PEOPLE WHO HAVE NEED THEREOF BY REASON OF LEARNING DISABILITY WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE. "LEARNING DISABILITY" MEANS ANY DEVELOPMENT DISABILITY OF THE MIND AND ANY ASSOCIATED CONDITION HOWSOEVER CAUSED AND WHETHER MILD, MODERATE OR SEVERE.

name: 4EDEN
activities: 4EDEN provides individualised support for children, young people & adults who have additional learning needs, learning disabilities and those on the autistic spectrum. Each person is supported to achieve their full potential, this is achieved through 1:1, group and peer support and working closely within our local community.
objects: 3.1 THE RELIEF OF PEOPLE WITH A LEARNING DISABILITY IN PARTICULAR BY THE PROVISION OF HELP AND SUPPORT FOR THEM AND FOR THEIR FAMILIES, DEPENDANTS AND CARERS, AND TO PREVENT LEARNING DISABILITIES FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT AND TO ADVANCE RELIGION AMONGST PERSONS WITH A LEARNING DISABILITY; AND 3.2 TO PROVIDE OR ASSIST IN THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES FOR THE RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION FOR PEOPLE WHO HAVE NEED THEREOF BY REASON OF LEARNING DISABILITY WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE. "LEARNING DISABILITY" MEANS ANY DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITY OF THE MIND AND ANY ASSOCIATED CONDITION HOWSOEVER CAUSED AND WHETHER MILD, MODERATE OR SEVERE.

name: DOWN SYNDROME FAMILY SUPPORT GROUP
activities: Advocacy, parental support, social events
