objects: (1)TO PREVENT AND RELIEVE POVERTY AMONG POOR PEOPLE, VICTIMS OF MAN-MADE AND NATURAL DISASTERS AND OTHER PEOPLE IN NEED, BY MEANS OF, BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY, MAKING GRANTS OR LOANS FOR PROVIDING OR PAYING FOR ITEMS, EQUIPMENT, SERVICES AND FACILITIES, INCLUDING THE ESTABLISHMENT OF WATER WELLS, ESTABLISHMENT OF SANITATION PROJECTS, CONSTRUCTION OR REHABILITATION OF IRRIGATIONAL CANALS, PROMOTION OF THE RIGHTS OF THOSE IN POVERTY, ESTABLISHMENT OF DIALOGUE TO REDUCE CONFLICT THAT CONTRIBUTES TOWARDS POVERTY, GENERATION OF SUSTAINABLE LIVELIHOODS AND THE PROVISION OF BASIC NECESSITIES SUCH AS CLOTHING AND ACCOMMODATION FOR THE SAID PERSONS;  (2)TO RELIEVE SICKNESS AND TO PRESERVE GOOD HEALTH AMONG PERSONS IN NEED, BY MEANS OF, BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY,THE PROVISION OR ASSISTANCE IN THE PROVISION OF EQUIPMENT, MEDICINES, HEALTH EDUCATION AND FACILITIES, SUCH AS TESTING AND TREATMENT CENTRES AND CLINICS FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE SAID PERSONS.  (3)TO ADVANCE EDUCATION FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE POOR, THE ILLITERATE, THE DISADVANTAGED WOMEN AND GIRLS, AND THE GENERAL PUBLIC BY MEANS OF, BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY, THE PROVISION OR REHABILITATION OF EDUCATIONAL RESOURCES, ACTIVITIES AND FACILITIES, SUCH AS SCHOOLS, LIBRARIES AND TRAINING CENTRES;  (4)TO PROMOTE SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC BY THE PRESERVATION, CONSERVATION AND THE PROTECTION OF THE ENVIRONMENT AND THE PRUDENT USE OF RESOURCES, AND THE PROMOTION OF SUSTAINABLE MEANS OF ACHIEVING ECONOMIC GROWTH AND REGENERATION, SUCH THAT SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT MEANS DEVELOPMENT WHICH MEETS THE NEEDS OF THE PRESENT WITHOUT COMPROMISING THE ABILITY OF FUTURE GENERATIONS TO MEET THEIR OWN NEEDS.

name: GO DHARMIC WELFARE UK
activities: Go Dharmic Welfare UK runs multiple charitable campaigns.  Go Dharmic serves food to the homeless, has developed seven libraries for underprivellaged children in India and assists with disaster relief. Go Dharmic is a platform for compassion in action.
objects: TO RELIEVE THE CHARITABLE NEEDS OF PERSONS LIVING IN THE UK, INDIA AND NEPAL BY:  A. THE RELIEF OF FINANCIAL HARDSHIP, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY BY THE PROVISION OF BASIC NECESSITIES, SUCH AS FOOD  B. THE PRESERVATION AND PROTECTION OF GOOD PHYSICAL AND MENTAL HEALTH BY FACILITATING ACCESS TO THE PROVISION OF HEALTHCARE  C. THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION AND TRAINING OF THOSE IN THE COMMUNITY WHO ARE IN NEED THEREOF SO AS TO ADVANCE THEM IN LIFE AND ASSIST THEM TO ADAPT WITHIN THE WIDER COMMUNITY BY THE PROVISION OF EDUCATIONAL FACILITIES  2. TO PROMOTE HUMANE BEHAVIOUR TOWARDS ANIMALS BY PROVIDING APPROPRIATE CARE, PROTECTION, TREATMENT AND SECURITY FOR ANIMALS WHICH ARE IN NEED OF CARE AND ATTENTION BY REASON OF SICKNESS, MALTREATMENT, POOR CIRCUMSTANCES OR ILL USAGE AND TO EDUCATE THE PUBLIC IN MATTERS PERTAINING TO ANIMAL WELFARE IN GENERAL AND THE PREVENTION OF CRUELTY AND SUFFERING AMONG ANIMALS.

name: PENTREDWR UNDER FIVE'S
activities: Pentredwr Under Fives Playgroup aims to: ?	Provide high quality day care that enhances the development, care and education of pre-school children in a safe and stimulating environment, where they learn through play ?	To provide an environment where children of all creeds, cultures and abilities feel happy, safe and secure ?	To introduce children to the new experiences at  playgroup
objects: TO ENHANCE THE DEVELOPMENT AND EDUCATION OF PRE-SCHOOL CHILDREN IN WALES, BY ENCOURAGING PARENTS TO UNDERSTAND AND PROVIDE FOR THE NEEDS THROUGH HIGH QUALITY PRE-SCHOOL PROVISION AND CHILDCARE.

name: PIPPA'S GROUP
activities: TO ENHANCE THE DEVELOPMENT AND EDUCATION OF CHILDREN OF PRE-PLAY GROUP AGE (2 TO 3YEARS APPROXIMATELY) WHO LIVE IN LEWES AND THE SURROUNDING RURAL AREAS OFFERING APPROPRIATE TEACHING, GUIDANCE, SUPERVISION, CARE AND HEALTH FACILITIES.
objects: TO ENHANCE THE DEVELOPMENT AND EDUCATION OF CHILDREN OF PRE-PLAY GROUP AGE (2 TO 3YEARS APPROXIMATELY) WHO LIVE IN LEWES AND THE SURROUNDING RURAL AREAS OFFERING APPROPRIATE TEACHING, GUIDANCE, SUPERVISION, CARE AND HEALTH FACILITIES.

name: NUESTROS PEQUE¥OS HERMANOS UNITED KINGDOM
activities: Nuestros Pequenos Hermanos UK, (NPH UK) supports the creation of a loving and safe family environment for vulnerable children living in extreme conditions. Through comprehensive education, healthcare and spiritual formation the children are given the opportunity to develop their potential, shaping better futures for themselves, their families and their communities.
objects: (1) THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO ARE:  (A) THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION;  (B) THE PREVENTION OR RELIEF OF POVERTY;  (C) THE RELIEF OF THOSE IN NEED BECAUSE OF ILL HEALTH, DISABILITY, FINANCIAL HARDSHIP OR OTHER DISADVANTAGE;  (D) THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE CHRISTIAN RELIGION;  WORLDWIDE, BUT IN PARTICULAR IN LATIN AMERICA AND THE UK, AMONGST YOUNG PEOPLE AND THEIR FAMILIES BY PROVIDING OR ASSISTING BY MAKING GRANTS TOWARDS THE PROVISION OF CARE, EDUCATION, TRAINING AND HEALTHCARE PROGRAMS; AND  (E) ADVANCING THE CHARITABLE OBJECTS, AND MISSION OF NPH INTERNATIONAL, AS MAY BE DETERMINED FROM TIME TO TIME, PROVIDED THAT SUCH OBJECTS AND MISSION REMAIN COMPATIBLE WITH THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO.  (2) NOTHING IN THIS CONSTITUTION SHALL AUTHORISE AN APPLICATIONOF THE PROPERTY OF THE CIO FOR PURPOSES WHICH ARE NOT CHARITABLE IN ACCORDANCE WITH SECTION 7 OF THE CHARITIES AND TRUSTEE INVESTMENT (SCOTLAND) ACT 2005 OR SECTION 2 OF THE CHARITIES ACT (NORTHERN IRELAND) 2008.

name: VILAJETI CHRISTIAN MINISTRIES
activities: This charity supports the work of the Albanian Christian Centre and the New Beginnings Children's Home both situated in Tirana, Albania. The former proclaims the Christian Faith and seeks to live that faith in the communities it serves.  The latter provides a home for up to 13 children who are either orphaned or have come from an abusive situation.
objects: 1) TO ADVANCE THE CHRISTIAN FAITH IN ALBANIA, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY BY PROVIDING GRANTS OF FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO SUPPORT THE WORK OF THE ALBANIAN CHRISTIAN CENTRE IN TIRANA, ALBANIA.    2) THE RELIEF OF POVERTY IN ALBANIA, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY BY PROVIDING GRANTS OF FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO SUPPORT THE WORK OF THE NEW BEGINNINGS CHILDREN'S HOME IN TIRANA, ALBANIA.

name: THE NACAO HEBREA FOUNDATION
activities: Research and education into the prosopography and genealogy of the historical Sephardi Jewish community.
objects: THE OBJECT OF THE CIO IS TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUBLIC IN GENERAL ON THE SUBJECT OF SEPHARDI JEWISH PROSOPOGRAPHY AND GENEALOGY AND TO PROMOTE RESEARCH FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT IN ALL ASPECTS OF THAT SUBJECT AND TO PUBLISH THE USEFUL RESULTS.

name: SADLERS WELLS COMMUNITY WOODLAND CIO
activities: To promote for the benefit of the public the conservation protection and improvement of Sadlers Wells Wood and such other land as may be acquired for similar purposes in the parishes of Bunbury and Spurstow, Cheshire and make the same available for public enjoyment education and instruction.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO ARE TO PROMOTE FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC THE CONSERVATION PROTECTION AND IMPROVEMENT OF SADLERS WELLS WOODLAND AND SUCH OTHER LAND AS MAY BE ACQUIRED FOR THE PURPOSES OF CONSERVATION AND PROTECTION IN THE PARISHES OF BUNBURYAND SPURSTOW IN THE COUNTY OF CHESHIRE AND MAKE THE SAME AVAILABLE FOR PUBLIC ENJOYMENT, EDUCATION AND INSTRUCTION

name: PORTSMOUTH CITY COUNCIL ELEMENTARY EDUCATION FOUNDATION
activities: To advance education in Portsmouth for those 12 or under
objects: OBJECTS OF THE CHARITY THE OBJECTS OF THE CHARITY ARE TO ADVANCE EDUCATION THROUGH: (1) THE PROVISION OF A SITE OR SITES IN THE AREA OF BENEFIT TO AN EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION OR EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS. (2) PROVIDING FOR ANY EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION INTHE AREA OF BENEFIT SUCH SPECIAL BENEFITS OF ANY KIND NOT NORMALLY PROVIDED BY THE LOCAL AUTHORITY OR THE DEPARTMENT FOR EDUCATION AS MAY FROM TIME TO TIME BE AGREED BETWEEN THE TRUSTEE AND THE GOVERNORS OF THE EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION CONCERNED. (3)PROVIDING GRANTS OR LOANS FOR OR TOWARDS IMPROVEMENTS TO ANY EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION IN THE AREA OF BENEFIT AS MAY FROM TIME TO TIME BE AGREED BETWEEN THE TRUSTEE AND THE GOVERNORS OF THE EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION CONCERNED. ASSISTANCE CAN ONLY BE PROVIDED IF THE IMPROVEMENTS ARE, IN THE OPINION OF THE TRUSTEE, NECESSARY TO EITHER: (A) RAISE THE STANDARD OF EDUCATION OF; OR (B) IMPROVE ACCESS TO THE EDUCATION BEING PROVIDED FOR, THE BENEFICIARIES AT THAT EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION; AND (C) THE LOCAL AUTHORITY OR THE DEPARTMENT FOR EDUCATION ARE NOT ABLE TO MEET THE COSTS IN FULL OR IN PART. (4) PROMOTING THE EDUCATION (INCLUDING SOCIAL AND PHYSICAL TRAINING) OF BENEFICIARIES WHO ARE IN NEED OF FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE BY PROVIDING FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE(INCLUDING ASSISTANCE WITH THE COST OF EDUCATIONAL TRIPS), UNIFORMS, CLOTHING, TOOLS, INSTRUMENTS OR BOOKS TO ASSIST THEM TO PURSUE THEIR EDUCATION (INCLUDING THE STUDY OF MUSIC AND OTHER ARTS). (5) SUBJECT TO CLAUSE (6) BELOW, THE TRUSTEES MUST PERMIT THE LAND IDENTIFIED IN PART 2 OF THE SCHEDULE TO THIS SCHEME TO BE USED IN FURTHERANCE OF THE OBJECT DESCRIBED AT CLAUSE 4(1) OF THIS SCHEME, AND THIS MAY BE BY GRANTING A LEASE OF THAT LAND TO AN EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION AT SUCH RENT (WHICH MAY BE ONE PEPPERCORN) AS MAY BE AGREED BY THE TRUSTEES. (6) THE TRUSTEES MUST PERMIT THE LAND NUMBERED 10 IN PART 2 OF THE SCHEDULE TO THIS SCHEME TO BE USED AS A PLAYING FIELD IN CONNECTION WITH AN EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION IN THE AREA OF BENEFIT FOR SO LONGAS IT IS REQUIRED FOR THAT PURPOSE.

name: DAVID AND YUKO JUDA ART FOUNDATION
activities: The Foundation's main objective is to advance such charitable purposes as the Charity Trustees see fit from time to time and in particular, but not limited to, the advancement of the arts by making grants to individuals.
objects: TO ADVANCE SUCH CHARITABLE PURPOSES (ACCORDING TO THE LAW OF ENGLAND AND WALES) AS THE CHARITY TRUSTEES SEE FIT FROM TIME TO TIME, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE ARTS BY MAKING GRANTS TO INDIVIDUALS.

name: LEEDS ART FUND
activities: The principal aim of the charity is to provide the promotion of arts in Leeds and surrounding areas through the establishment, extension and enhancement of art collections open to the public, the promotion of the appreciation of art by the public and the promotion of education and learning in art and allied subjects. The charity continues the work of unincorporated charity number 529300.
objects: (A) THE ESTABLISHMENT, EXTENSION AND ENHANCEMENT OF ART COLLECTIONS OPEN TO THE PUBLIC IN THE METROPOLITAN DISTRICT OF THE CITY OF LEEDS IN THE COUNTY OF WEST YORKSHIRE OR IN SUCH OTHER AREAS AS THE CHARITY TRUSTEES SHALL DETERMINE. (B) THE PROMOTION OF THE APPRECIATION OF ART BY THE PUBLIC. (C) THE PROMOTION OF EDUCATION AND LEARNING IN ART AND ALLIED SUBJECTS.

name: BOSTON MUNICIPAL NON-EDUCATIONAL CHARITIES
activities: 1.	The prevention or relief of poverty in the Borough of Boston Lincolnshire 2.	To advance Christian religion for the benefit of the public in the Borough of Boston Lincolnshire by supporting with grants the activities and Mission of all Christian Churches in that area. 3.	To preserve and protect the health of patients and the public in the Borough of Boston Lincolnshire
objects: 1.	THE PREVENTION OR RELIEF OF POVERTY IN THE BOROUGH OF BOSTON LINCOLNSHIRE BY PROVIDING: GRANTS, ITEMS AND SERVICES TO INDIVIDUALS IN NEED AND/OR CHARITIES, OR OTHER ORGANISATIONS WORKING TO PREVENT OR RELIEVE POVERTY.  2.	TO ADVANCE CHRISTIAN RELIGION FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC IN THE BOROUGH OF BOSTON LINCOLNSHIRE BY SUPPORTING WITH GRANTS THE ACTIVITIES AND MISSION OF ALL CHRISTIAN CHURCHES IN THAT AREA.  3.	TO PRESERVE AND PROTECT THE HEALTH OF PATIENTS AND THE PUBLIC IN THE BOROUGH OF BOSTON LINCOLNSHIRE BY PROVIDING AND ASSISTING IN THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES, SUPPORT SERVICES AND EQUIPMENT NOT NORMALLY PROVIDED BY THE STATUTORY AUTHORITIES.

name: SRI SELVA VINAYAGAR TEMPLE
activities: Advancement of the Hindu religion for the benefit of the public in the London Borough of Redbridge . To encourage the organisation of educational and cultural events based both at the Temple and in the vicinity generally
objects: TO ADVANCE THE HINDU RELIGION FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC IN REDBRIDGE AND THE SURROUNDING AREA THROUGH MAINTAINING A SAIVA HINDU TEMPLE WHERE RITUALS ARE CONDUCTED WITH SPECIAL EMPHASIS ON SAIVAM ACCORDING TO THE TRADITION OF TAMILNADU AND SRI LANKA, TO ENCOURAGE THE ORGANISATION OF EDUCATIONAL AND CULTURAL EVENTS BASED BOTH AT THE TEMPLE AND IN THE AREA OF BENEFIT AND THROUGH ORGANISING OTHER RELATED ACTIVITIES AS THE TRUSTEES SHALL DETERMINE.

name: FIVE K FOUNDATION
activities: To provide and distribute grants and donations to Orthodox Jewish Charities.
objects: A. THE RELIEF OF POVERTY BY PROVIDING GRANTS TO INDIVIDUALS IN NEED AND/OR CHARITIES, OR OTHER ORGANISATIONS WORKING TO PREVENT OR RELIEVE POVERTY.  B. THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION BY PROVIDING GRANTS TO INDIVIDUALS AND/OR CHARITIES, OR OTHER ORGANISATIONS.  C. THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE ORTHODOX JEWISH RELIGION BY THE PROVISION OF GRANTS TO INDIVIDUALS AND/OR CHARITIES, OR OTHER ORGANISATIONS.  D. ANY OTHER PURPOSE CURRENTLY RECOGNISED AS CHARITABLE BY ANALOGY TO, OR WITHIN THE SPIRIT OF, PURPOSES OFTHE ABOVE MENTIONED OR ANY OTHER PURPOSE RECOGNISED AS CHARITABLE UNDER THE LAW OF ENGLAND AND WALES.

name: AL-IKHLAS CULTURE AND EDUCATION CENTRE
activities: Providing and supporting Islamic Education through the study of the Quran and Arabic language Providing facilities regular prayers Fostering interfaith relationships and promoting religious harmony in Cardiff and surrounding area. Providing assistance to those in need through Islamic Counselling and dispute resolution. Providing support to young people through leisure-time activities.
objects: THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE ISLAMIC RELIGION IN CARDIFF BY:  1)PROVIDING AND SUPPORTING ISLAMIC EDUCATION INCLUDING THROUGH THE STUDY OF QURAN AND THE ARABIC LANGUAGE;  2)PROVIDING FACILITIES FOR REGULAR PRAYER MEETINGS FOR THE MUSLIM COMMUNITY;  3)FOSTERING INTERFAITH RELATIONSHIPS AND PROMOTING RELIGIOUS HARMONY IN CARDIFF AND THE SURROUNDING AREA BY WORKING IN PARTNERSHIP WITH OTHER FAITHS;  4)PROVIDING ASSISTANCE TO THOSE IN NEED THROUGH ISLAMIC COUNSELLING AND DISPUTE RESOLUTION;  5)PROVIDING SUPPORT TO YOUNG PEOPLE, INCLUDING THROUGH LEISURE-TIME ACTIVITIES CONDUCTED WITH A RELIGIOUS ETHOS, SO AS TO DEVELOP THEIR CAPABILITIES.

name: DONISTHORPE YOUTH CLUB
activities: To provide for the benefit of children and young people residing in Donisthorpe, Leicestershire and surrounding communities by providing facilities for education, recreation and other leisure time occupation who have need of such facilities by reason of their youth, poverty, financial hardship or social or economic circumstances in the interests of social welfare.
objects: TO PROVIDE FOR THE BENEFIT OF CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE RESIDING IN DONISTHORPE LEICESTERSHIRE AND SURROUNDING COMMUNITIES BY PROVIDING FACILITIES FOR EDUCATION, RECREATION AND OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION WHO HAVE NEED OF SUCH FACILITIES BY REASON OF THEIR YOUTH, POVERTY, FINANCIAL HARDSHIP OR SOCIAL OR ECONOMIC CIRCUMSTANCES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND WITH THE OBJECT OF (I) IMPROVING THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE AND (II) DEVELOPING THEIR POTENTIAL SKILLS, CAPACITIES AND CAPABILITIES TOENABLE THEM TO PARTICIPATE IN SOCIETY AS MATURE AND RESPONSIBLE ADULTS.

name: THE FRESHWATER FOUNDATION
activities: To provide charities, voluntary and community entities with:  - funds for development purposes;  - marketing, advocacy, educational and other support services;  - encouragement and facilitation of coordination and cooperation amongst themselves; - encouragement and facilitation of engagement with broader public life;
objects: TO FURTHER SUCH CHARITABLE PURPOSES FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT (CHARITABLE UNDER ENGLISH LAW) AS THE DIRECTORS SEE FIT FROM TIME TO TIME IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY:  (A) THE PROMOTION OF THE VOLUNTARY SECTOR; AND  (B) THE PROMOTION OF THE EFFICIENCY AND EFFECTIVENESS OF CHARITIES AND THE EFFECTIVE USE OF RESOURCES FOR CHARITABLE PURPOSES BY CHARITIES OR OTHER ORGANISATIONS BY THE FOLLOWING MEANS: THE DONATION OF FUNDS TO CHARITIES, VOLUNTARY AND COMMUNITY ENTITIES FOR DEVELOPMENT PURPOSES; THEPROVISION OF MARKETING, ADVOCACY, EDUCATIONAL AND OTHER SUPPORT SERVICES TO CHARITIES, VOLUNTARY AND COMMUNITY ENTITIES; THE ENCOURAGEMENT AND FACILITATION OF COORDINATION AND COOPERATION AMONGST CHARITIES, VOLUNTARY AND COMMUNITY ENTITIES; THE ENCOURAGEMENT AND FACILITATION OF ENGAGEMENT WITH THE BROADER PUBLIC BY CHARITIES, VOLUNTARY AND COMMUNITY ENTITIES; AND BY AIDING AND EMPOWERING CHARITIES, VOLUNTARY AND COMMUNITY ENTITIES IN ANY WAY THE DIRECTORS DEEM FIT FROM TIME TO TIME, CONSISTENT WITH CHARITY LAW.  (C) THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION (INCLUDING TRAINING AND RESEARCH)

name: NEW LIFE COMMUNITY CHURCH LOUGHBOROUGH
activities: The church meets weekly to worship God, fellowship, prayer and Bible study, and reach out to those in need both in the surrounding area and further afield. A number of activities are run for young people, and discussion has been taking place on how to further help in the community.
objects: 1) THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE CHRISTIAN FAITH IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE BASIS OF FAITH PRIMARILY BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY WITHIN LOUGHBOROUGH AND THE SURROUNDING NEIGHBOURHOOD; AND  2) SUCH OTHER CHARITABLE PURPOSES AS SHALL, IN THE OPINION OF THE MEMBERS OF THE CHURCH IN GENERAL MEETING FURTHER THE WORK OF THE CHURCH.

name: BANTOU SOLUTION
activities: Bantou Solution offer support to excluded Africans Refugees, asylum seekers and migrants in the City of Leicester and Leicestershire. We deliver Community Solution Project to empower those in needs as there are marginalised. We run community cohesion programme to get people together through musical and arts activities. We run information, advice and advocacy programmes.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CHARITY ARE:  THE PROMOTION OF SOCIAL INCLUSION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT AMONG PEOPLE WHO ARE REFUGEES AND ASYLUM SEEKERS AND OTHER MIGRANTS WHO ARE SOCIALLY EXCLUDED ON THE GROUNDS OF THEIR SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC POSITION (THE BENEFICIARIES), BY PROVIDING:  I) A LOCAL NETWORK GROUP THAT ENCOURAGES AND ENABLES THE BENEFICIARIES TO PARTICIPATE MORE EFFECTIVELY WITH THE WIDER COMMUNITY;  II) OPPORTUNITIES FOR THE BENEFICIARIES TO ENGAGE WITH SERVICE PROVIDERS, TO ENABLE THOSE PROVIDERSTO ADAPT SERVICES TO BETTER MEET THEIR NEEDS; AND  III) EDUCATION AND TRAINING IN THE ENGLISH LANGUAGE AND IN VOCATIONAL SKILLS.

name: GOSPEL OAK ACTION LINK YOUTH CLUB (GOAL)
activities: We are located in Gospel Oak, Camden. We provide a range of free activities to young people aged 8 to 19 years. With partners we open five evenings a week and operate holiday programmes.  The provision of these activities is designed to achieve outcomes for the young people which would not otherwise be available for them and to provide a safe space for the young people to meet and have fun.
objects: FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE INHABITANTS OF GOSPEL OAK WARD AND THE NEIGHBOURHOOD ("THE AREA OF BENEFIT") BY;  (1) THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION  (2) THE PROTECTION AND PRESERVATION OF GOOD HEALTH  (3) THE PROTECTION AND PRESERVATION AND MAINTENANCE OF THENATURAL AND BUILT ENVIRONMENT IN THE AREA OF BENEFIT  (4) THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES FOR RECREATION AND LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION OF THE SAID INHABITANTS IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE ANDIN PARTICULAR THE PROVISION OF SUCH FACILITIES FOR CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE TO ASSIST THEM TO GROW TO FULL MATURITY AS INDIVIDUALS AND AS MEMBERS OF SOCIETY.

name: AIL GYFLE-SECOND CHANCE LTD
activities: Ail Gyfle is a charitable social enterprise that produces home and garden furniture and craft from recycled pallets and other discarded items. We offer a safe context for those on the margins to learn life skills alongside Open College Network qualifications in Confidence building, substance misuse, Health and Safety at work, wood working, recycling and building a work portfolio.
objects: THE PROMOTION OF SOCIAL INCLUSION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY PREVENTING PEOPLE FROM BECOMING SOCIALLY EXCLUDED, RELIEVING THE NEEDS OF THOSE PEOPLE WHO ARE SOCIALLY EXCLUDED AND ASSISTING THEM TO INTEGRATE INTO SOCIETY BY;  PROVIDING EDUCATION, TRAINING, ADVICE, SUPPORT AND ACCESS TO EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITIES TO ENABLE THEM TO DEVELOP NEW SKILLS AND CHANGE THE DIRECTION OF THEIR LIVES;    THE PREVENTION OR RELIEF OF POVERTY BY THE PROVISION OF GOODS, SERVICES, ADVICE AND SUPPORT AND    SUCH OTHER CHARITABLE MEANS AS THE TRUSTEES SEE FIT IN FURTHERANCE OF SAID OBJECT.    FOR THE PURPOSE OF THIS CLAUSE 'SOCIALLY EXCLUDED' MEANS BEING EXCLUDED FROM SOCIETY, OR PARTS OF SOCIETY, AS A RESULT OF ONE OF MORE OF THE FOLLOWING FACTORS: UNEMPLOYMENT; FINANCIAL HARDSHIP; YOUTH; ILL HEALTH (PHYSICAL OR MENTAL); SUBSTANCE ABUSE OR DEPENDENCY INCLUDING ALCOHOL AND DRUGS OR AS AN OFFENDER REHABILITATING INTO SOCIETY"

name: DARTINGTON COMMUNITY CHOIR
activities: Dartington Community Choir is a choir of amateur singers drawn from the local community which aims to promote, improve, develop and maintain public education in and the appreciation of the art and science of music in all its aspects by the presentation of public concerts ad recitals and by such other ways as the charity through its committee shall determine from time to time.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO ARE TO PROMOTE, IMPROVE, DEVELOP AND MAINTAIN PUBLIC EDUCATION IN AND APPRECIATION OF THE ART AND SCIENCE OF MUSIC IN ALL ITS ASPECTS BY THE PRESENTATION OF PUBLIC CONCERTS AND RECITALS AND BY SUCH OTHER WAYS AS THE CIO THROUGH ITS COMMITTEE SHALL DETERMINE FROM TIME TO TIME.

name: THE HARVESTER MINISTRY
activities: Religious activities - Christian Church
objects: TO ADVANCE THE CHRISTIAN RELIGION IN EMERSON PARK AND HORNCHURCH FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC THROUGH THE HOLDING OF PRAYER MEETINGS, LECTURES PRODUCING AND/OR DISTRIBUTING LITERATURE ON CHRISTIANITY TO ENLIGHTEN OTHERS ABOUT THE CHRISTIAN RELIGION.

name: SOCIAL ALCHEMY
activities: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO ARE  1. THE PROMOTION OF COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION IN HEALTHY RECREATION IN PARTICULAR BY THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES FOR THE PLAYING OF SPORTS.  2. THE RELIEF OF THE MENTAL SICKNESS OF PERSONS IN NEED BY REASON OF ADDICTION TO DRUGS, IN PARTICULAR BY THE PROVISION OF COUNSELLING AND SUPPORT.  NOTHING IN THIS CONSTITUTION SHALL AUTHORISE AN APPLICATION OF THE PROPERTY  OF THE CIO FOR THE PURPOSES WHICH ARE NOT CHARITABLE IN ACCORDANCE WITH  SECTION 7 OF THE CHARITIES AND TRUSTEE INVESTMENT (SCOTLAND) ACT 2005  AND SECTION 2 OF THE CHARITIES ACT (NORTHERN IRELAND)2008.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO ARE  1. THE PROMOTION OF COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION IN HEALTHY RECREATION IN PARTICULAR BY THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES FOR THE PLAYING OF SPORTS.  2. THE RELIEF OF THE MENTAL SICKNESS OF PERSONS IN NEED BY REASON OF ADDICTION TO DRUGS, IN PARTICULAR BY THE PROVISION OF COUNSELLING AND SUPPORT.  NOTHING IN THIS CONSTITUTION SHALL AUTHORISE AN APPLICATION OF THE PROPERTY  OF THE CIO FOR THE PURPOSES WHICH ARE NOT CHARITABLE IN ACCORDANCE WITH  SECTION 7 OF THE CHARITIES AND TRUSTEE INVESTMENT (SCOTLAND) ACT 2005  AND SECTION 2 OF THE CHARITIES ACT (NORTHERN IRELAND)2008.

name: SAINT FAITH'S PLAYERS
activities: Production of amateur plays with reasonably priced tickets available to all members of the local community. Two or three productions are presented every year at local venues including a fabulous Christmas pantomime.  Social activities within the group are promoted with every effort made to be inclusive with all people welcome.
objects: TO EDUCATE THE PUBLIC IN THE DRAMATIC AND OPERATIC ARTS, TO FURTHER THE DEVELOPMENT OF PUBLIC APPRECIATION AND TASTE IN THE SAID ARTS.

name: FOOTBALL FOR KAMPUCHEA
activities: FOOTBALL FOR KAMPUCHEA WAS FOUNDED IN 2016 AFTER A NUMBER OF CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE IN POVERTY SAW THE OPPORTUNITY TO LEARN FOOTBALL FROM TWO QUALIFIED ENGLISH COACHES IN PHNOM PENH, CAMBODIA. THE ORGANISATION EXISTS TO ADDRESS THE NEEDS OF YOUNG PEOPLE UP TO BUT NOT RESTRICTED TO THE AGE OF 18 IN PHNOM PENH, CAMBODIA, SPECIFICALLY WORKING WITH YOUNG PEOPLE IN POVERTY. FOOTBALL FOR KAMPUCHEA SEEKS TO DO THIS BY: 1.	THE PROVISION OF RECREATIONAL AND LEISURE TIME ACTIVITIES PROVIDED IN THE INTEREST OF SOCIAL WELFARE, DESIGNED TO IMPROVE THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE; 2.	TO ACT AS A RESOURCE FOR YOUNG PEOPLE UP TO THE AGE OF 18 LIVING IN THE KINGDOM OF CAMBODIA. 3.	BY ORGANISING PROGRAMMES OF PHYSICAL, EDUCATIONAL AND OTHER ACTIVITIES AS A MEANS OFHELPING YOUNG PEOPLE. THE ULTIMATE AIM OF THE ORGANISATION IS TO REDUCE THE NUMBER OF YOUNG PEOPLE IN THE REGION FALLING INTO DEEPER POVERTY WITH NO OUTLET, AND TO TEACH YOUNG PEOPLE TO BECOME STRONG COMMUNITY ROLE MODELS FOR OTHER VULNERABLE YOUNG PEOPLE.
objects: FOOTBALL FOR KAMPUCHEA WAS FOUNDED IN 2016 AFTER A NUMBER OF CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE IN POVERTY SAW THE OPPORTUNITY TO LEARN FOOTBALL FROM TWO QUALIFIED ENGLISH COACHES IN PHNOM PENH, CAMBODIA. THE ORGANISATION EXISTS TO ADDRESS THE NEEDS OF YOUNG PEOPLE UP TO BUT NOT RESTRICTED TO THE AGE OF 18 IN PHNOM PENH, CAMBODIA, SPECIFICALLY WORKING WITH YOUNG PEOPLE IN POVERTY. FOOTBALL FOR KAMPUCHEA SEEKS TO DO THIS BY: 1.	THE PROVISION OF RECREATIONAL AND LEISURE TIME ACTIVITIES PROVIDED IN THE INTEREST OF SOCIAL WELFARE, DESIGNED TO IMPROVE THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE; 2.	TO ACT AS A RESOURCE FOR YOUNG PEOPLE UP TO THE AGE OF 18 LIVING IN THE KINGDOM OF CAMBODIA. 3.	BY ORGANISING PROGRAMMES OF PHYSICAL, EDUCATIONAL AND OTHER ACTIVITIES AS A MEANS OFHELPING YOUNG PEOPLE. THE ULTIMATE AIM OF THE ORGANISATION IS TO REDUCE THE NUMBER OF YOUNG PEOPLE IN THE REGION FALLING INTO DEEPER POVERTY WITH NO OUTLET, AND TO TEACH YOUNG PEOPLE TO BECOME STRONG COMMUNITY ROLE MODELS FOR OTHER VULNERABLE YOUNG PEOPLE.

name: THE MAVIS NYE FOUNDATION
activities: To offer grants to enable clinical research into producing new drugs to fight Mesothelioma.
objects: A) THE RELIEF OF FINANCIAL HARDSHIP BY PROVIDING AID TO THOSE PERSONS IN THE UNITED KINGDOM REQUIRING ASSISTANCE TO ACCESS MEDICAL TREATMENT, IN PARTICULAR EXPERIMENTAL MEDICAL TREATMENT, AND;  I) HAVE BEEN DIAGNOSED WITH MESOTHELIOMA OR OTHER LIFE THREATENING DISEASE CAUSED FROM EXPOSURE TO ASBESTOS; AND  II) ARE NOT ENTITLED OR ARE UNABLE TO PURSUE A CIVIL CLAIM OR OTHER AVENUE OF LEGAL RECOURSE TO OBTAIN COMPENSATION; AND  III) ARE IN NEED BY REASON OF A LACK OF MEANS.  B) THE ADVANCEMENT OF LABORATORY AND CLINICAL RESEARCH IN THE UNITED KINGDOM FOR THE TREATMENT OF MESOTHELIOMA AND OTHER ASBESTOS RELATED DISEASES FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT AND THE DISSEMINATION OF THE USEFUL RESULTS OF THAT RESEARCH.  C) TO ASSIST IN THE TREATMENT AND CARE OFPERSONS SUFFERING FROM MESOTHELIOMA IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY BY AWARDING SCHOLARSHIPS OR GRANTS TENABLE AT ANY BRITISH UNIVERSITY OR INSTITUTION OF HIGHER EDUCATION FOR HEALTH PROFESSIONALS IN FINANCIAL NEED AND ENDEAVOURING TO WORK PRIMARILYIN THE FIELD OF MESOTHELIOMA NURSING IN THE UNITED KINGDOM.

name: THE HOVE DEANERY SYNOD MISSION FUND
activities: To apply the clear income and at the discretion of the Trustees the whole or any part of the property in furthering the work of the Church of England in the Deanery of Hove  in the Diocese of Chichester (the Area of Benefit). In this regard Loans may be made to any Anglican Parishes within the area of benefit  where the purpose of the Loan is to further mission.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO ARE TO FURTHER THE WORK OF THE CHURCH OF ENGLAND IN THE AREA COMPRISING THE DEANERY OF HOVE WITHIN THE ARCHDEACONRY OF BRIGHTON AND LEWES IN THE DIOCESE OF CHICHESTER ("THE AREA OF BENEFIT").

name: BISHOP SUTTON PRE-SCHOOL AND FOREST CLUB
activities: We are an Ofsted inspected Pre-School & Forest Club, registered as a provider of Childcare on non-domestic premises on the Early Years Register, and the Child Care Register, providing Early Years education and care, in a safe, secure and stimulating environment for 2-5year olds.  We comply with the requirements set out in The Statutory Framework for The Early Years Foundation Stage.
objects: THE AIMS OF THE PRE-SCHOOL ARE TO ENHANCE THE DEVELOPMENT AND EDUCATION OF CHILDREN PRIMARILY UNDER STATUTORY SCHOOL AGE BY ENCOURAGING PARENTS TO UNDERSTAND AND PROVIDE FOR THE NEEDS OF THEIR CHILDREN THROUGH COMMUNITY GROUPS AND BY:  (A) OFFERING APPROPRIATE PLAY, EDUCATION AND CARE FACILITIES, FAMILY LEARNING AND EXTENDED HOURS GROUPS, TOGETHER WITH THE RIGHT OF PARENTS TO TAKE RESPONSIBILITY FOR AND TO BECOME INVOLVED IN THE ACTIVITIES OF SUCH GROUPS, ENSURING THAT SUCH GROUPS OFFER OPPORTUNITIES FOR ALL CHILDREN WHATEVER THEIR RACE, CULTURE, RELIGION, MEANS OR ABILITY  (B) ENCOURAGING THE STUDY OF THE NEEDS OF SUCH CHILDREN AND THEIR FAMILIES AND PROMOTING PUBLIC INTEREST IN AND RECOGNITION OF SUCH NEEDS IN THE LOCAL AREAS  (C) INSTIGATING AND ADHERING TO AND FURTHERING THE AIMS AND OBJECTS OF THE PRE-SCHOOL LEARNING ALLIANCE.

name: FRIENDS OF FREETHORPE
activities: Christmas Fayre, Christmas Disco Valentines Disco Easter Fayre Summer BBQ Leavers Disco Shopping Fayre Garage Sale
objects: TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF PUPILS IN THE SCHOOL IN PARTICULAR BY:    2.1 DEVELOPING EFFECTIVE RELATIONSHIPS BETWEEN THE STAFF, PARENTS AND    OTHERS ASSOCIATED WITH THE SCHOOL    2.2 ENGAGING IN ACTIVITIES OR PROVIDING FACILITIES OR EQUIPMENT WHICH  SUPPORT THE SCHOOL AND ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUPILS.

name: HOUSE OF PRAISE TRUST
activities: The main activity of our charity is to advance the Christian faith particularly in London and at the discretion of the Trustees elsewhere in the United Kingdom or the world. We also aim to (i) relieve persons in need or hardship or who are aged or sick; (ii) advance education and (iii) undertake and fulfil such other charitable activities and purposes for the benefit of the community.
objects: (1) THE RELIEF OF PERSONS WHO ARE IN CONDITIONS OF NEED OR HARDSHIP OR WHO ARE AGED OR SICK INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE DISTRIBUTION OF WELFARE AID/PAYMENTS TO ALLEVIATE THE POOR AND OR SUFFERING;  (2) TO ADVANCE THE CHRISTIAN FAITH IN LONDON ANDAT THE DISCRETION OF THE TRUSTEES ELSEWHERE IN THE UNITED KINGDOM OR THE WORLD, IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE FOLLOWING STATEMENT OF BELIEFS:  A) THE SOVEREIGNTY AND GRACE OF GOD THE FATHER GOD THE SON AND GOD THE HOLY SPIRIT IN CREATION PROVIDENCE REVELATION REDEMPTION AND FINAL JUDGEMENT;  B) THE DIVINE INSPIRATION OF HOLY SCRIPTURE AND ITS CONSEQUENT ENTIRE TRUSTWORTHINESS AND SUPREME AUTHORITY IN ALL MATTERS OF FAITH AND CONDUCT:  C) THE UNIVERSAL SINFULNESS AND GUILT OF FALLEN MAN MAKING HIM SUBJECT TO GOD'S WRATH AND CONDEMNATION;  D) THE SUBSTITUTIONARY SACRIFICE OF THE INCARNATE SON OF GOD AS THE SOLE AND ALL-SUFFICIENT GROUND OF REDEMPTION FROM THE GUILT AND POWER OF SIN AND FROM ITS ETERNAL CONSEQUENCES;  E) THE JUSTIFICATION OF THE SINNERSOLELY BY THE GRACE OF GOD THROUGH FAITH IN CHRIST CRUCIFIED AND RISEN FROM THE DEAD;  F) THE ILLUMINATING REGENERATING INDWELLING AND SANCTIFYING WORK OF GOD THE HOLY SPIRIT;  G) THE PRIESTHOOD OF ALL BELIEVERS WHO FORM THE UNIVERSAL CHURCH THE BODYOF WHICH CHRIST IS THE HEAD AND WHICH IS COMMITTED BY HIS COMMAND TO THE PROCLAMATION OF THE GOSPEL THROUGHOUT THE WORLD;  H) THE EXPECTATION OF THE PERSONAL VISIBLE RETURN OF THE LORD JESUS CHRIST IN POWER AND GLORY;  I) MARRIAGE IS ORDAINED BY GODFOR THE LIFELONG RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN ONE MAN AS HUSBAND AND ONE WOMAN AS WIFE. IT IS THE MOST INTIMATE OF HUMAN RELATIONSHIPS, A SACRED AND HOLY INSTITUTION, AND SHOULD BE HONOURED BY ALL.  (3) TO RELIEVE, PERSONS WHO ARE IN CONDITIONS OF NEED OR HARDSHIP OR WHO ARE AGED OR SICK AND TO RELIEVE THE DISTRESS CAUSED THEREBY IN PARTICULAR IN THE SAID CITY AND AT THE DISCRETION OF THE TRUSTEES ELSEWHERE IN THE UNITED KINGDOM OR THE WORLD  (4) TO ADVANCE EDUCATION AND TRAINING FOR EMPLOYMENT AND IN PARTICULAR AMONGST REFUGEES IN LONDON AND ELSEWHERE IN THE UNITED KINGDOM  (5) TO UNDERTAKE AND FULFIL SUCH OTHER CHARITABLE ACTIVITIES AND PURPOSES FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE COMMUNITY IN THE SAID CITY AS THE TRUSTEES MAY FROM TIME TO TIME THINK FIT

name: MY BODY BACK PROJECT CIO
activities: Providing healthcare services for women who have experienced sexual violence.
objects: TO RELIEVE MENTAL AND PHYSICAL SICKNESS FOR WOMEN IN THE UNITED KINGDOM WHO HAVE EXPERIENCED SEXUAL VIOLENCE.  TO PRESERVE AND PROTECT THE HEALTH OF THE ABOVE MENTIONED DEMOGRAPHIC.

name: OLIVER'S BATTERY COMMUNITY CENTRE LIMITED
activities: To benefit the residents of Olivers Battery  and the neighbourhood  to provide facilities in the interests of communbity health and well-being, social welfare for recreation and leisure time occupation with the objective of improving the conditions of life for the residents.To establish or secure a community centre, to manage activities promoted by the charity in furtherance of the above objects.'
objects: THE CHARITY'S OBJECTS ('OBJECTS') ARE SPECIFICALLY RESTRICTED TO THE FOLLOWING:  4.1. TO FURTHER OR BENEFIT THE RESIDENTS OF OLIVER'S BATTERY WINCHESTER AND THE NEIGHBOURHOOD  WITHOUT DISTINCTION OF SEX, SEXUAL ORIENTATION, RACE OR OF POLITICAL, RELIGIOUS OR OTHER OPINION BY  ASSOCIATING TOGETHER THE SAID RESIDENTS AND THE LOCAL AUTHORITIES, VOLUNTARY AND OTHER  ORGANISATIONS IN A COMMON EFFORT TO ADVANCE EDUCATION AND TO PROVIDE FACILITIES IN THE  INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION AND LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION WITH THE OBJECTIVE OF  IMPROVING THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE FOR THE RESIDENTS.  4.2. IN FURTHERANCE OF THESE OBJECTS BUT NOT OTHERWISE THE TRUSTEES SHALL HAVE THE POWER TO  ESTABLISH OR SECURE THE ESTABLISHMENT OF A COMMUNITY CENTREAND TO MAINTAIN OR MANAGE OR  CO-OPERATE WITH ANY STATUTORY AUTHORITY IN THE MAINTENANCE AND MANAGEMENT OF SUCH A CENTRE  FOR ACTIVITIES PROMOTED BY THE CHARITY IN FURTHERANCE OF THE ABOVE OBJECTS.

name: BIG CHRISTMAS WIND ORCHESTRA AND CHOIR
activities: The charity runs an amateur orchestra and choir that meets irregularly to perform mass participation musical events, particularly around Christmas.
objects: TO ADVANCE, IMPROVE, DEVELOP AND MAINTAIN PUBLIC EDUCATION IN, AND APPRECIATION OF, THE ART AND SCIENCE OF MUSIC IN ALL ITS ASPECTS BY ANY MEANS THE TRUSTEES SEE FIT, INCLUDING THROUGH THE PRESENTATION OF PUBLIC CONCERTS AND RECITALS.

name: RUFF SQWAD  ARTS FOUNDATION
activities: Ruff Sqwad Arts Foundation (RSAF) helps disadvantaged young people reach their full potential in creative careers and life.  RSAF creates meaningful cultural engagement opportunities and access to mainstream resources by innovatively integrating high quality arts, youth work, industry connections, and enterprise.  We deliver music sessions and partnership projects.
objects: TO ACT AS A RESOURCE FOR YOUNG PEOPLE LIVING IN LONDON BY PROVIDING ADVICE AND ASSISTANCE AND ORGANISING PROGRAMMES OF PHYSICAL, EDUCATIONAL AND OTHER ACTIVITIES AS A MEANS OF:    (A) ADVANCING IN LIFE AND HELPING YOUNG PEOPLE BY DEVELOPING THEIR SKILLS, CAPACITIES AND CAPABILITIES TO ENABLE THEM TO PARTICIPATE IN SOCIETY AS INDEPENDENT, MATURE AND RESPONSIBLE INDIVIDUALS;  (B) ADVANCING EDUCATION;  (C) RELIEVING UNEMPLOYMENT;  (D) PROVIDING RECREATIONAL AND LEISURE TIME ACTIVITY IN THE INTERESTSOF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR PEOPLE LIVING IN THE AREA OF BENEFIT WHO HAVE NEED BY REASON OF THEIR YOUTH, AGE, INFIRMITY OR DISABILITY, POVERTY OR SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC CIRCUMSTANCES WITH A VIEW TO IMPROVING THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE OF SUCH PERSONS.

name: ANATOLIA CULTURE AND EDUCATION
activities: The charity works to advance the Islamic faith in the Worcestershire area for the benefit of the public through the holding prayer meetings and public celebration of religious festival, in particular but not exclusively members of the Turkish community, in the interests of social welfare and with the object of improving their conditions of life.
objects: 1. TO ADVANCE THE ISLAMIC FAITH IN THE WORCESTERSHIRE AREA FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC THROUGH THE HOLDING PRAYER MEETINGS AND PUBLIC CELEBRATION OF RELIGIOUS FESTIVALS.  2. TO PROVIDE AND ASSIST IN THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES FOR THE EDUCATION, RECREATION AND OTHER LEISURE-TIME OCCUPATION OF THE INHABITANTS OF THE WORCESTERSHIRE AREA, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY MEMBERS OF THE TURKISH COMMUNITY, IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE.

name: FRIENDS OF RADNOR HOUSE SEVENOAKS
activities: Giving grants to charities chosen by the pupils of Radnor House Sevenoaks
objects: TO ADVANCE SUCH CHARITABLE PURPOSES (ACCORDING TO THE LAW OF ENGLAND AND WALES) AS THE TRUSTEES SEE FIT FROM TIME TO TIME.

name: GET INVOLVED VOLUNTEERING
activities: GI-V aims to advance in life and help young people between the ages of 12 to 18, within the unitary authority of Milton Keynes, through: (a) The provision of recreational and leisure time activities provided in the interest of social welfare, designed to improve their conditions of life; (b) Providing support and activities which develop their skills, capacities and capabilities
objects: THE OBJECT OF THE CIO IS TO ADVANCE IN LIFE AND HELP YOUNG PEOPLE BETWEEN THE AGES OF 12 TO 18, WITHIN THE UNITARY AUTHORITY OF MILTON KEYNES, THROUGH:  (A) THE PROVISION OF RECREATIONAL AND LEISURE TIME ACTIVITIES PROVIDED IN THE INTEREST OF SOCIAL WELFARE, DESIGNED TO IMPROVE THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE;  (B) PROVIDING SUPPORT AND ACTIVITIES WHICH DEVELOP THEIR SKILLS, CAPACITIES AND CAPABILITIES TO ENABLE THEM TO PARTICIPATE IN SOCIETY AS MATURE AND RESPONSIBLE INDIVIDUALS

name: OLD SOUTHENDIAN ORGAN SOCIETY
activities: The society supports education and appreciation of music by hosting public concerts and encouraging performances and demonstrations from a range of instruments and voice, with a particular emphasis on the organ at Southend High School for Boys. Additionally, the organ's upkeep is supported by the society, and we undertake various fundraising activities to provide this support.
objects: THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE ARTS, IN PARTICULAR BY THE PROMOTION OF PUBLIC EDUCATION AND APPRECIATION OF MUSIC, WITH SPECIAL REFERENCE TO PIPE ORGANS, ORGAN MUSIC, AND ORGAN PRESERVATION IN THE AREA SURROUNDING SOUTHEND HIGH SCHOOL FOR BOYS, PRITTLEWELL CHASE, SOUTHEND-ON-SEA.

name: THE CONNECT MINISTRY TRUST
activities: The Charity aims to advance the Christian Faith enabling the Church and other Christian organisations, in the UK and overseas, to be more effective in the communities within which they serve and operate,  sharing God's love in word and action and impacting the lives of individuals and communities. We seek to do this by providing effective training in communication skills for teaching and preaching
objects: THE OBJECT OF THE CIO IS, FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT, THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE CHRISTIAN FAITH, IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE STATEMENT OF FAITH, IN SUCH WAYS AS THE CHARITY TRUSTEES MAY FROM TIME TO TIME DECIDE.

name: GREBALL
activities: As per the registered governing document the objects of the CIO are to advance the education of pupils at Great Ballard School, Eartham.
objects: TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF PUPILS AT GREAT BALLARD SCHOOL ("THE SCHOOL") LOCATED AT EARTHAM, NEAR CHICHESTER. IN PARTICULAR BY:  1) DEVELOPING EFFECTIVE RELATIONSHIPS BETWEEN THE STAFF, PARENTS AND OTHERS ASSOCIATED WITH THE SCHOOL; AND  2) ENGAGING IN ACTIVITIES OR PROVIDING FACILITIES, RESOURCES OR EQUIPMENT WHICH SUPPORTS THE SCHOOL AND ADVANCES THE EDUCATION OF ITS PUPILS; AND  3) PROVIDING GRANTS, BURSARIES OR OTHER PAYMENTS OR FORMS OF SUPPORT TO PUPILS WHO ARE IN NEED OF FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE, TO ATTEND THE SCHOOL OR TO TAKE PART IN EXTRA-CURRICULAR ACTIVITIES.

name: CEEBEE GOLD FOUNDATION INTERNATIONAL
activities: Promotion of social inclusion for the public benefit by preventing people from becoming socially excluded, relieving the needs of those people who are socially excluded and assisting them to integrate into society. Provision of recreational and leisure time activities provided in the interest of social welfare. The prevention or relief of poverty.
objects: 1) TO PROMOTE SOCIAL INCLUSION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY PREVENTING PEOPLE FROM BECOMING SOCIALLY EXCLUDED, RELIEVING THE NEEDS OF THOSE PEOPLE WHO ARE SOCIALLY EXCLUDED AND ASSISTING THEM TO INTEGRATE INTO SOCIETY.    FOR THE PURPOSE OF THIS CLAUSE 'SOCIALLY EXCLUDED' MEANS BEING EXCLUDED FROM SOCIETY, OR PARTS OF SOCIETY, AS A RESULT OF ONE OF MORE OF THE FOLLOWING FACTORS: UNEMPLOYMENT; FINANCIAL HARDSHIP; YOUTH OR OLD AGE; ILL HEALTH (PHYSICAL OR MENTAL); SUBSTANCE ABUSE OR DEPENDENCY INCLUDING ALCOHOL AND DRUGS; DISCRIMINATION ON THE GROUNDS OF SEX, RACE, DISABILITY, ETHNIC ORIGIN, RELIGION, BELIEF, CREED, SEXUAL ORIENTATION OR GENDER RE-ASSIGNMENT; POOR EDUCATIONAL OR SKILLS ATTAINMENT; RELATIONSHIP AND FAMILY BREAKDOWN; POOR HOUSING (THAT IS HOUSING THAT DOES NOT MEET BASIC HABITABLE STANDARDS; CRIME (EITHER AS A VICTIM OF CRIME OR AS AN OFFENDER REHABILITATING INTO SOCIETY)."    2) TO ADVANCE IN LIFE AND HELP YOUNG PEOPLE THROUGH:    (A) THE PROVISION OF RECREATIONAL AND LEISURE TIME ACTIVITIES PROVIDED IN THE INTEREST OF SOCIAL WELFARE, DESIGNED TO IMPROVE THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE;    (B) PROVIDING SUPPORT AND ACTIVITIES WHICH DEVELOP THEIR SKILLS, CAPACITIES AND CAPABILITIES TO ENABLE THEM TO PARTICIPATE IN SOCIETY AS MATUREAND RESPONSIBLE INDIVIDUALS.    3) THE PREVENTION OR RELIEF OF POVERTY IN SUCH PARTS OF THE WORLD AS THE TRUSTEES SHALL DECIDE THROUGH THE PROVISION OF GRANTS, ITEMS AND SERVICES TO INDIVIDUALS IN NEED AND/OR OTHER ORGANISATIONS WORKING TO PREVENT ORRELIEVE POVERTY.

name: SWARDESTON CRICKET CLUB
activities: Swardeston Cricket Club CIO is one of the leading cricket clubs in the East Anglia region. The Club runs four open-age Saturday teams, an open-age Sunday team, a women's team and youth teams for boys and girls ranging from Under 9's up to Under 19's.
objects: THE PROMOTION OF COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION IN HEALTHY RECREATION BY THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES FOR PLAYING CRICKET

name: PRIORY PRE-SCHOOL
activities: The main purpose of the charity is to provide high  quality childcare to the local community and surrounding area. The main aim of the pre-school is to enhance the development and education of children and to provide support and information to parents on how to provide for the needs of their children.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO ARE:    TO ENHANCE THE DEVELOPMENT AND EDUCATION OF PRE-SCHOOL CHILDREN IN WALES, BY ENCOURAGING PARENTS TO UNDERSTAND AND PROVIDE FOR THEIR NEEDS THROUGH HIGH QUALITY PRE-SCHOOL PROVISION AND CHILDCARE.

name: MIFAL TZEDUKAS
activities: (I) THE ADVANCEMENT OF ORTHODOX JEWISH RELIGIOUS EDUCATION (II) THE RELIEF OF POVERTY, SICKNESS AND INFIRMITY AMONGST MEMBERS OF THE PUBLIC, AND (III) SUCH OTHER CHARITABLE PURPOSES AS ARE FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT AND RECOGNISED AS CHARITABLE ACCORDING TO THE LAWS OF ENGLAND AND WALES.
objects: (I) THE ADVANCEMENT OF ORTHODOX JEWISH RELIGIOUS EDUCATION  (II) THE RELIEF OF POVERTY, SICKNESS AND INFIRMITY AMONGST MEMBERS OF THE PUBLIC, AND  (III) SUCH OTHER CHARITABLE PURPOSES AS ARE FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT AND RECOGNISED AS CHARITABLE ACCORDING TO THE LAWS OF ENGLAND AND WALES.

name: THE FORGET ME NOT CLUB (CRAWLEY)
activities: The Forget Me Nots ensure no carer, loved one, friend or family member of someone living with dementia in Crawley and surrounding area would ever feel alone. We exist to provide friendship, help, advice and a hand to hold when needed.  Our Friday meet includes lunch and activities in the form of quizzes, games or live music and dancing.  Tuesday evenings focus on support and advice for Carers
objects: TO RELIEVE THE NEEDS OF CARERS, FAMILY MEMBERS, FRIENDS OR COLLEAGUES OF PEOPLE AFFECTED BY DEMENTIA IN CRAWLEY AND THE SURROUNDING AREA BY:  1) PROVIDING OPPORTUNITIES FOR SAFE SOCIAL INTERACTION, EMOTIONAL AND SOCIAL SUPPORT, THEREBY REDUCING SOCIALISOLATION  2) RAISING AWARENESS OF DEMENTIA AMONGST THOSE AFFECTED AND WITH VOLUNTARY AND STATUTORY ORGANISATIONS THAT PROVIDE SERVICES FOR THOSE WITH DEMENTIA  3) EDUCATING THE GENERAL PUBLIC IN ALL AREAS RELATING TO DEMENTIA AND THEREBY RAISING AWARENESS OF THE SUPPORT AND EDUCATION AVAILABLE TO THOSE AFFECTED BY DEMENTIA

name: WATFORD CHRISTADELPHIAN ECCLESIA
activities: Our main purpose is to advance the Christian faith through the teachings of the Bible and preaching the gospel. We hold Bible talks, family sessions, praise meetings, Bible study groups and Sunday School at our hall, plus monthly talks at Watford Central Library. We make a regular dispatch of literature on Bible topics, free of charge. We provide spiritual and pastoral care to our members.
objects: THE PRINCIPAL OBJECT OF THE ECCLESIA IS THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE CHRISTIAN FAITH AS SET OUT IN THE TEACHINGS OF THE BIBLE, THE INSPIRED WORD OF GOD, AND PREACHING THE GOSPEL OF JESUS CHRIST FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC. THIS IS UNDERTAKEN IN ACCORDANCEWITH THE ' CHRISTADELPHIAN BIRMINGHAM AMENDED STATEMENT OF FAITH', WHICH FORMS THE DOCTRINAL BASIS FOR OUR FELLOWSHIP, THROUGH ACTIVITIES WHICH INCLUDE BUT ARE NOT LIMITED TO: PUBLIC PREACHING, BIBLE READING GROUPS, BIBLE STUDY CLASSES, SUNDAY SCHOOL, PERSONAL WITNESS, THE DISTRIBUTION OF LITERATURE, PROVIDING INFORMATION ON THE INTERNET, THE PROMOTION OF CHARITABLE WORKS AND THE SPIRITUAL AND PASTORAL CARE OF OUR MEMBERS.

name: EPSOM BAPTIST CHURCH
activities: Regular public worship, prayer, Bible study, preaching and teaching; baptism; the Communion of the Lord?s Supper; evangelism and mission; teaching, encouragement, welcome and inclusion of young people; nurture and growth of Christian disciples; giving and encouraging pastoral care; supporting and encouraging charitable social action; supporting Baptists and other Christians.
objects: 1. THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE CHRISTIAN FAITH ACCORDING TO THE PRINCIPLES OF THE BAPTIST DENOMINATION.  2. THE CHURCH MAY ALSO ADVANCE EDUCATION AND CARRY OUT OTHER CHARITABLE PURPOSES IN THE UNITED KINGDOM AND/OR OTHER PARTS OF THE WORLD.

name: BISHOP'S STORTFORD COMMUNITY CENTRES CIO
activities: Provides buildings for hire by the general public and local activity groups i.e. playschools, exercise classes, dance classes, language classes, youth club, church groups, etc.
objects: TO PROMOTE THE BENEFIT OF THE INHABITANTS OF BISHOP'S STORTFORD AND THE SURROUNDING AREA WITHOUT DISTINCTION OF SEX OR OF POLITICAL, RELIGIOUS OR OTHER OPINIONS BY THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES IN THE INTEREST OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION AND LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE FOR THE SAID INHABITANTS AND IN PARTICULAR TO MANAGE AND RUN COMMUNITY CENTRES AND FACILITIES IN FURTHERANCE OF THESE OBJECTS.

name: BISHOP'S STORTFORD COMMUNITY CENTRES CIO
activities: Provides buildings for hire by the general public and local activity groups i.e. playschools, exercise classes, dance classes, language classes, youth club, church groups, etc.
objects: TO PROMOTE THE BENEFIT OF THE INHABITANTS OF BISHOP'S STORTFORD AND THE SURROUNDING AREA WITHOUT DISTINCTION OF SEX OR OF POLITICAL, RELIGIOUS OR OTHER OPINIONS BY THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES IN THE INTEREST OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION AND LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE FOR THE SAID INHABITANTS AND IN PARTICULAR TO MANAGE AND RUN COMMUNITY CENTRES AND FACILITIES IN FURTHERANCE OF THESE OBJECTS.

name: NORTH MANCHESTER COMMUNITY PARTNERSHIP
activities: We seek to improve the capacity and skills of our socially and disadvantaged community. We provide I.A.G. to North Manchester residents seeking employment, training or volunteering. We deliver 10 outreach sessions offering work club activities, benefits advice service, Digital Skills Training. Accredited Online& classroom training, volunteering opportunities and access to community led activities
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO ARE FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT OF THE SOCIALLY AND ECONOMICALLY DISADVANTAGED COMMUNITY OF NORTH MANCHESTER:-  1)TO PROMOTE SOCIAL INCLUSION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY PREVENTING PEOPLE FROM BECOMING SOCIALLY EXCLUDED, RELIEVING THE NEEDS OF THOSE PEOPLE WHO ARE SOCIALLY EXCLUDED AND ASSISTING THEM TO INTEGRATE INTO SOCIETY.  FOR THE PURPOSE OF THIS CLAUSE 'SOCIALLY EXCLUDED' MEANS BEING EXCLUDED FROM SOCIETY, OR PART OF SOCIETY, AS A RESULT OF BEING A MEMBER OF A SOCIALLY AND ECONOMICALLY DEPRIVED COMMUNITY; AND  2)TO DEVELOP THE CAPACITY AND SKILLS OF THE MEMBERS OF THE SOCIALLY AND ECONOMICALLY DISADVANTAGED COMMUNITY IN SUCH A WAY THAT THEY ARE BETTER ABLE TO IDENTIFY, AND HELP MEET, THEIR NEEDS AND TO PARTICIPATE MORE FULLY IN SOCIETY.  THE ORGANISATION WILL CARRY OUT THE ABOVE TWO PURPOSES BY PROVIDING INFORMATION, ADVICE AND GUIDANCE TO HELP IMPROVE THEIR PROSPECTS OF GAINING EMPLOYMENT OR TRAINING.  NOTHING IN THIS CONSTITUTION SHALL AUTHORISE AN APPLICATION OFTHE PROPERTY OF THE CIO FOR THE PURPOSES WHICH ARE NOT CHARITABLE IN ACCORDANCE WITH [SECTION 7 OF THE CHARITIES AND TRUSTEE INVESTMENT (SCOTLAND) ACT 2005] AND [SECTION 2 OF THE CHARITIES ACT (NORTHERN IRELAND) 2008].

name: UNIVERSITY OF EAST LONDON STUDENTS' UNION
activities: UEL Students' Union promotes the interests of students and provides representation, advice, support and social activities.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE UNION ARE THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION OF STUDENTS AT UNIVERSITY OF EAST LONDON FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY:  2.1 PROMOTING THE INTERESTS AND WELFARE OF STUDENTS AT UNIVERSITY OF EAST LONDON DURING THEIR COURSE OF STUDY AND REPRESENTING, SUPPORTING AND ADVISING STUDENTS;  2.2 BEING THE RECOGNISED REPRESENTATIVE CHANNEL BETWEEN STUDENTS AND UNIVERSITY OF EAST LONDON AND ANY OTHER EXTERNAL BODIES; AND  2.3 PROVIDING SOCIAL, CULTURAL, SPORTING AND RECREATIONAL ACTIVITIES AND FORUMS FOR DISCUSSIONS AND DEBATE FOR THE PERSONAL DEVELOPMENT OF ITS STUDENTS.

name: KENNET VALLEY FREE CHURCH
activities: Kennet Valley Free Church is an independent evangelical church based in Calcot, Reading, Berkshire. The church's charitable aim is the advancement of the Christian religion, in particular by the provision and maintenance of a Free Church and by (1) encouraging and facilitating the practice of the Christian religion, and (2) seeking new followers.
objects: THE PURPOSES OF THE CHURCH ARE:  1) THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE CHRISTIAN FAITH IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE BASIS OF FAITH PRIMARILY BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY WITHIN THE BURGHFIELD GARDENS, FORDS FARM AND BEANSHIEF ESTATES IN CALCOT, READING AND THE SURROUNDING NEIGHBOURHOOD; AND  2) SUCH OTHER CHARITABLE PURPOSES AS SHALL, IN THE OPINION OF THE MEMBERS OF THE CHURCH IN GENERAL MEETING, PUT INTO PRACTICE THE CHRISTIAN FAITH IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE BASIS OF FAITH, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO: THE PREVENTION AND RELIEF OF NEED, HARDSHIP AND SICKNESS; THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION; AND THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION OF INDIVIDUALS WHO HAVE NEED OF SUCH FACILITIES BY REASON OF THEIR YOUTH, AGE INFIRMITY OR DISABILITY, FINANCIAL HARDSHIP OR SOCIAL CIRCUMSTANCES WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE.

name: 2ND CHANZI MOBILE HUB
activities: the charity's base Enfield and is mobile identifying and operating from poor boroughs in London according the poverty idex. Poverty alleviation projects are set up which are borough specific which help the elderly and youths improve the physical health and mental wellbeing through programmes like computer literacy, aerobic exercises, legal advice, entrepreneurship training and group exercising.
objects: ") TO ADVANCE IN LIFE AND RELIEVE NEEDS OF YOUNG PEOPLE AGED 16-25 THROUGH:  (A) THE PROVISION OF RECREATIONAL AND LEISURE TIME ACTIVITIES PROVIDED IN THE INTEREST OF SOCIAL WELFARE, DESIGNED TO IMPROVE THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE;  (B) PROVIDING SUPPORTAND ACTIVITIES WHICH DEVELOP THEIR SKILLS, CAPACITIES AND CAPABILITIES TO ENABLE THEM TO PARTICIPATE IN SOCIETY AS MATURE AND RESPONSIBLE INDIVIDUALS.  2) TO PROVIDE OR ASSIST IN THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION FOR THE ELDERLY (65+) WHO HAVE NEED OF SUCH FACILITIES BY REASON OF THEIR AGE WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE; AND  3)TO PROMOTE AND PROTECT GOOD HEALTH BY HOLDING WORKSHOPS FOR THE ELDERLYTO HELP ALLEVIATE SICKNESS WITH ADVICE ON SUBJECTS SUCH AS GOOD DIETARY PRACTICES TO COMPLEMENT THE RECREATIONAL ACTIVITIES.

name: 2ND CHANZI MOBILE HUB
activities: the charity's base Enfield and is mobile identifying and operating from poor boroughs in London according the poverty idex. Poverty alleviation projects are set up which are borough specific which help the elderly and youths improve the physical health and mental wellbeing through programmes like computer literacy, aerobic exercises, legal advice, entrepreneurship training and group exercising.
objects: ") TO ADVANCE IN LIFE AND RELIEVE NEEDS OF YOUNG PEOPLE AGED 16-25 THROUGH:  (A) THE PROVISION OF RECREATIONAL AND LEISURE TIME ACTIVITIES PROVIDED IN THE INTEREST OF SOCIAL WELFARE, DESIGNED TO IMPROVE THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE;  (B) PROVIDING SUPPORTAND ACTIVITIES WHICH DEVELOP THEIR SKILLS, CAPACITIES AND CAPABILITIES TO ENABLE THEM TO PARTICIPATE IN SOCIETY AS MATURE AND RESPONSIBLE INDIVIDUALS.  2) TO PROVIDE OR ASSIST IN THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION FOR THE ELDERLY (65+) WHO HAVE NEED OF SUCH FACILITIES BY REASON OF THEIR AGE WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE; AND  3)TO PROMOTE AND PROTECT GOOD HEALTH BY HOLDING WORKSHOPS FOR THE ELDERLYTO HELP ALLEVIATE SICKNESS WITH ADVICE ON SUBJECTS SUCH AS GOOD DIETARY PRACTICES TO COMPLEMENT THE RECREATIONAL ACTIVITIES.

name: THE NELL BANK CHARITABLE TRUST
activities: Nell Bank  provides unique outdoor learning day and residential experiences for children, their families and friends, from all walks of life. Over 20,000 children visit the centre each year & a significant proportion of them are from the most deprived areas of the district.  Programmes are curriculum linked and bring children's learning to life, whilst developing a love & respect for the outdoors.
objects: THE CHARITY'S OBJECTS ("OBJECTS") ARE SPECIALLY RESTRICTED TO THE FOLLOWING: THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT, IN PARTICULAR, OF YOUNG PEOPLE THROUGH THE PROVISION OF OUTDOORS, EDUCATION AND LEARNING EXPERIENCE TO DEVELOP THEIR APPRECIATION OF THE NATURAL ENVIRONMENT FOR BOTH DAY AND RESIDENTIAL STUDENTS.    TO HELP YOUNG PEOPLE, ESPECIALLY BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY THROUGH LEISURE TIME ACTIVITIES SO AS TO DEVELOP THEIR CAPABILITIES THAT THEY MAY GROW TO FULL MATURITY AS INDIVIDUALSAND MEMBERS OF SOCIETY.    TO PROVIDE OR ASSIST IN THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION OF INDIVIDUALS WHO HAVE NEED OF SUCH FACILITIES BY REASON OF THEIR YOUTH, AGE INFIRMITY OR DISABILITY, FINANCIAL HARDSHIP OR SOCIAL CIRCUMSTANCES WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE.

name: WESTCLIFF NATIONAL SPIRITUALIST CHURCH
activities: To provide a place of worship where religious services can be conducted in accordance with the Spiritualist National Union.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CHURCH ARE TO ADVANCE THE RELIGION AND THE RELIGIOUS PHILOSOPHY OF SPIRITUALISM ON THE BASIS OF THE SEVEN PRINCIPLES OF SNU SPIRITUALISM.

name: CONNECT 120
activities: To facilitate resource and strengthen the Christian presence in the schools within the benefices of Takeley, Stansted and Great Dunmow. This is achieved by a missioner who visits the schools, gets to know the senior staff and once their confidence has been established, invites local volunteers in to help. We lead assemblies in the schools, play lunchtime games with children and special projects.
objects: THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE CHRISTIAN RELIGION BY FACILITATING RESOURCES AND STRENGTHENING THE CHRISTIAN PRESENCE IN THE SCHOOLS WITHIN THE BENEFICES OF TAKELEY, STANSTED AND GREAT DUNMOW (PART OF THE COLCHESTER EPISCOPAL AREA IN THE DIOCESE OF CHELMSFORD)AND IN THE COMMUNITIES AROUND THEM.

name: OASIS CHURCH (BIRMINGHAM)
activities: To promote the Christian Faith through worship and Bible teaching while providing services to the wider community, including 'The Bridge,' which provides a home and recovery program to those with a history of drug and alcohol addiction. Additionally, the 'Oasis Community Hub' is an emerging initiative aiming to promote and provide for wellbeing to our neighbours across the city.
objects: 1) THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE CHRISTIAN RELIGION IN THE UNITED KINGDOM AND OVERSEAS  2) THE ADVANCEMENT FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT OF RELIGIOUS AND OTHER EDUCATION  3) THE RELIEF OF THE AGED POOR SICK AND DISABLED  4) SUCH OTHER CHARITABLE PURPOSES AS THE TRUSTEES IN THEIR ABSOLUTE DISCRETION THINK FIT

name: MONDAY CHARITABLE TRUST
activities: NO UNSOLICITED REQUESTS ARE ACCEPTED. SUPPORT OF HOUSING, SUPPORT OF EDUCATION, INDEPENDENT HOSPICES, ASSISTANCE TO PERSONS HOLDING OR WHO HELD LICENCES TO RIDE AS JOCKEYS OR ENGAGED OR FORMERLY ENGAGED WITH HORSERACING AND THEIR WIVES, WIDOWS AND DEPENDANTS, ASSISTANCE TO MEMBERS OR FORMER MEMBERS OF THE ARMED FORCES.  THE TRUSTEES DO NOT ACCEPT ANY PERSONAL APPLICATIONS.
objects: ARTICLE 4: THE CHARITYS OBJECTS ARE RESTRICTED SPECIFICALLY TO THE FOLLOWING:  4.1	TO ADVANCE SUCH CHARITABLE PURPOSES (ACCORDING TO THE LAW OF ENGLAND AND WALES) IN ANY PART OF THE WORLD AS THE TRUSTEES SEE FIT FROM TIME TO TIME

name: THE ROMAN CATHOLIC CONGREGATION OF THE MISSIONARY FRANCISCAN SISTERS (OF THE IMMACULATE CONCEPTION )(BRAINTREE) CHARITABLE TRUST
activities: To support the advancement of the religious and other charitable works of the order
objects: FOR SUCH CHARITABLE PURPOSES AS SHALL ADVANCE THE RELIGIOUS AND OTHER CHARITABLE WORK OF THE ORDER AS THE TRUSTEES WITH THE APPROVAL OF THE SUPERIOR SHALL FROM TIME TO TIME THINK FIT AND IF AT ANY TIME THE ORDER SHALL CEASE TO EXIST OR SHALL CEASE TO CARRY ON RELIGIOUS OR OTHER CHARITABLE WORK THEN FOR SUCH LAWFUL CHARITABLE PURPOSES CONNECTED WITH THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE ROMAN RELIGION AS THE TRUSTEES SHALL DETERMINE.

name: BRYMBO HERITAGE TRUST
activities: To restore Brymbo's purpose by turning a decaying underused area into a nationally recognised visitor/educational centre and to provide studios, apprentice workshops and office spaces for start up businesses. By this re-use of our historical industrial buildings for this wide variety of purposes the Trust aims to promote the social and economic regeneration of Brymbo.
objects: 1. TO PROMOTE FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC THE PRESERVATION, PROTECTION AND IMPROVEMENT OF HISTORICAL ARTEFACTS, STRUCTURES, BUILDINGS AND LANDSCAPES WHICH ARE OF HISTORIC OR ARCHITECTURAL IMPORTANCE RELATING TO WREXHAM'S INDUSTRIAL HERITAGE.  2. TO PROMOTE FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC THE CONSERVATION OF THE BRYMBO FOSSIL FOREST.  3. TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUBLIC IN THE GEOGRAPHY, HISTORY, NATURAL HISTORY AND ARCHITECTURE OF BRYMBO AND ADJACENT AREAS.  4. THE PROMOTION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT OF URBAN OR RURAL REGENERATION IN AREAS OF SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC DEPRIVATION AND IN PARTICULAR BRYMBO BY THE FOLLOWING MEANS:  - TO PROVIDE EDUCATION, TRAINING AND RE-TRAINING OPPORTUNITIES AND WORK EXPERIENCE, ESPECIALLY FOR UNEMPLOYED PEOPLE;- TO PROVIDE, MAINTAIN AND IMPROVE RECREATIONAL FACILITIES;  - TO PROVIDE PUBLIC AMENITIES.

name: GLENDALE CHURCH
activities: The Object of the Church is, for the public benefit, to advance the Christian faith, advancing his Kingdom by means of public worship, Bible teaching, prayer, fellowship, partaking of the Lord?s supper and evangelism. The Church also desires to serve the local community in various ways with Youth and Children?s work and donates to various appropriate organisations
objects: THE OBJECT OF THE CHURCH IS, FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT, TO ADVANCE THE CHRISTIAN FAITH, THUS GLORIFYING GOD AND ADVANCING HIS KINGDOM BY MEANS OF PUBLIC WORSHIP, BIBLE TEACHING, PRAYER, FELLOWSHIP, PARTAKING OF THE LORDS SUPPER AND EVANGELISM AND SUCH OTHER WAYS AS THE CHARITY TRUSTEES MAY FROM TIME TO TIME DECIDE (AFTER CONSULTATION WITH THE GLENDALE LEADERSHIP TEAM), IN ACCORDANCE WITH HOLY SCRIPTURE.

name: YOUNG STAR MENTORING
activities: To help young people, especially but not exclusively through leisure time activities, so as to develop their capabilities that they may grow to full maturity as individuals and members of society.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO ARE:  1. TO HELP YOUNG PEOPLE (BEING INDIVIDUALS AGED 30 YEARS OLD AND YOUNGER) ESPECIALLY BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY THROUGH LEISURE TIME ACTIVITIES, SO AS TO DEVELOP THEIR CAPABILITIES THAT THEY MAY GROW TO FULL MATURITY AS INDIVIDUALS AND MEMBERS OF SOCIETY, AND  2. TO RELIEVE NEED AND/OR REHABILITATE EX-OFFENDERS OR CARE-LEAVERS (WITHOUT LIMITATION OF AGE) THROUGH LEISURE TIME ACTIVITIES WITH A VIEW TO PROMOTING THEIR POSITIVE ENGAGEMENT IN SOCIETY.

name: SUNDERLAND LIONS CLUB
activities: Promoting the principles of good citizenship; active interest in the civic, cultural, social and moral welfare of the local community; supporting youth to develop their skills, capacities and capabilities; promoting the Voluntary Sector for public benefit in the interests of social welfare for recreation; relief of poverty; relief internationally by providing humanitarian aid and disaster relief
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CLUB ARE SUCH PURPOSES AS ARE EXCLUSIVELY CHARITABLE IN ENGLAND & WALES, INCLUDING IN PARTICULAR:  3.1.1 THE ADVANCEMENT OF CITIZENSHIP BY:  3.1.1.1 PROMOTING THE PRINCIPLES OF GOOD CITIZENSHIP;  3.1.1.2 ENCOURAGING MEMBERS TO TAKE AN ACTIVE INTEREST IN THE CIVIC, CULTURAL, SOCIAL AND MORAL WELFARE OF THE COMMUNITY;  3.1.1.3 PROVIDING A FORUM FOR THE OPEN DISCUSSION OF ALL MATTERS OF PUBLIC INTEREST; PROVIDED THAT PARTISAN POLITICS AND SECTARIAN  RELIGION SHALL NOT BE DEBATED BYMEMBERS;  3.1.1.4 ENCOURAGING SERVICE-MINDED PEOPLE TO SERVE THEIR COMMUNITY WITHOUT PERSONAL REWARD AND ENCOURAGING THE PROMOTION OF HIGH ETHICAL STANDARDS IN COMMERCE, INDUSTRY, PROFESSIONS, PUBLIC WORKS AND PRIVATE ENDEAVOURS;  3.1.1.5 SUPPORTINGYOUTH TO DEVELOP THEIR SKILLS, CAPACITIES AND CAPABILITIES TO ENABLE THEM TO PARTICIPATE IN SOCIETY AS MATURE  AND RESPONSIBLE INDIVIDUALS;  3.1.2 PROMOTING THE VOLUNTARY SECTOR FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY ASSOCIATING WITH LOCAL AUTHORITIES IN A COMMONEFFORT TO ADVANCE  EDUCATION AND PROVIDE FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION TO IMPROVE THE  CONDITIONS OF LIFE OF PEOPLE IN LOCAL, NATIONAL AND INTERNATIONAL COMMUNITIES;  3.1.3 PROMOTING VOLUNTEERING;  3.1.4 THE RELIEF OF POVERTY AND THE RELIEF OF THOSE IN NEED IN PARTICULAR BY PROVIDING HUMANITARIAN AID AND DISASTER RELIEF;  3.1.5 THE ADVANCEMENT OF HEALTH OR THE SAVING OF LIVES BY PREVENTING AVOIDABLE BLINDNESS, ASSISTING DISABLED PEOPLE TO LEAD INDEPENDENT LIVES OR HELPING TO PREVENT OR MANAGE HEALTH ISSUES;  3.1.6 PROMOTING FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC THE CONSERVATION PROTECTION AND IMPROVEMENT OF THE PHYSICAL AND NATURAL ENVIRONMENT; AND/OR  3.1.7 PROMOTING COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION IN HEALTHY RECREATION.

name: KAMBIA DISTRICT FOUNDATION
activities: For the benefit of the public and in particular the benefit of children in the district of Kambia, Sierra Leone, the trustees will further the following charitable purposes: (i) the advancement of education (ii) the prevention of relief of poverty
objects: FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC AND IN PARTICULAR THE BENEFIT OF CHILDREN IN THE DISTRICT OF KAMBIA, SIERRA LEONE THE TRUSTEES WILL FURTHER THE FOLLOWING CHARITABLE PURPOSES:  (I) THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION;  (II) THE PREVENTION OR RELIEF OF POVERTY.

name: WATERLOOVILLE MEN'S SHED
activities: The Waterlooville Men?s Shed aims to promote social inclusion, particularly but not exclusively of older men, within the Waterlooville area and the surrounding area, through the provision of workshops, tools and equipment together with social activities where tasks for the local community, groups and individuals can be undertaken.
objects: TO PROMOTE SOCIAL INCLUSION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY PREVENTING PEOPLE (PARTICULARLY BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY OLDER MEN), WITHIN THE WATERLOOVILLE AREA AND THE SURROUNDING AREA, FROM BECOMING SOCIALLY EXCLUDED, RELIEVING THE NEEDS OF THOSE PEOPLE WHO ARE SOCIALLY EXCLUDED AND ASSISTING THEM TO INTEGRATE INTO SOCIETY THROUGH THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES IN WHICH THEY CAN MEET TO UNDERTAKE, JOINTLY OR INDIVIDUALLY, CREATIVE,PHYSICAL OR RECREATIONAL ACTIVITIES, LEARN OR PASS ON SKILLS AND KNOWLEDGE AND SUPPORT EACH OTHER SOCIALLY. FOR THE PURPOSE OF THIS CLAUSE 'SOCIALLY EXCLUDED' MEANS BEING EXCLUDED FROM SOCIETY, OR PARTS OF SOCIETY, AS A RESULT OF ONE OF MORE OF THE FOLLOWING FACTORS: UNEMPLOYMENT; FINANCIAL HARDSHIP; BEREAVEMENT OR OLD AGE; ILL HEALTH (PHYSICAL OR MENTAL).

name: BOLLINGTON CHAMBER CONCERTS
activities: a. The provision of an annual series of professional chamber concerts b. The provision of educational classes in all aspects of classical music and to organize other associated educational activities c. Collaborating with other music societies in arranging concerts and musical educational activities.
objects: TO ADVANCE, IMPROVE AND MAINTAIN PUBLIC EDUCATION IN AND APPRECIATION OF THE ARTS, IN PARTICULAR THE ART OF MUSIC, IN BOLLINGTON AND THE SURROUNDING AREAS BY:    A.THE PROVISION OF AN ANNUAL SERIES OF PROFESSIONAL CHAMBER CONCERTS    B.THE PROVISION OF EDUCATIONAL CLASSES IN ALL ASPECTS OF CLASSICAL MUSIC AND TO ORGANIZE OTHER ASSOCIATED EDUCATIONAL ACTIVITIES    C. COLLABORATING WITH OTHER MUSIC SOCIETIES IN ARRANGING CONCERTS AND MUSICAL EDUCATIONAL ACTIVITIES.

name: THE YOUNG-NILSSON FOUNDATION
activities: The trust intends to make grants to charities in the UK and overseas. It will support charities on a long term basis but each year this list will be reviewed and new charities may be added. The trust will make grants to registered charities and not to individuals.
objects: THE TRUSTEES SHALL HOLD THE CAPITAL AND INCOME OF THE TRUST FUND UPON TRUST TO APPLY THE INCOME, AND ALL OR SUCH PART OR PARTS OF THE CAPITAL, AT SUCH TIME OR TIMES AND IN SUCH MANNER TO, OR FOR THE BENEFIT OF, SUCH EXCLUSIVELY CHARITABLE OBJECTS AND PURPOSES IN ANY PART OF THE WORLD AS THE TRUSTEES MAY IN THEIR DISCRETION THINK FIT.

name: FROME ACTIVITIES AND SPORTS TRUST
activities: To promote for the benefit of the inhabitants of Frome, Somerset and the surrounding area the provision of facilities for and support for recreation or other leisure time occupation of individuals who have need of such facilities and support, by reason of their youth, age, infirmity or disablement, financial hardship or social and economic circumstances or for the public at large in the interests
objects: TO PROMOTE FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE INHABITANTS OF FROME, SOMERSET AND THE SURROUNDING AREA THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES FOR AND SUPPORT FOR RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION OF INDIVIDUALS WHO HAVE NEED OF SUCH FACILITIES AND SUPPORT, BY REASON OF THEIR YOUTH, AGE, INFIRMITY OR DISABLEMENT, FINANCIAL HARDSHIP OR SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC CIRCUMSTANCES OR FOR THE PUBLIC AT LARGE IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THE CONDITION OF LIFE OF THE SAID INHABITANTS.

name: ACTION FOR SOUTHERN AFRICA
activities: Campaigning & Advocacy work this lies at the core of what we do. We support local actors in southern Africa and lobby key stakeholders in the UK to push for change and secure rights, equality and development for the region.  Advancing education of the public on Southern Africa, by highlighting the causes of underdevelopment, poverty and conflict and exposing the destructive legacies of apartheid
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO ARE FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT:  TO PROMOTE HUMAN RIGHTS (AS SET OUT IN THE UNIVERSAL DECLARATION OF HUMAN RIGHTS AND SUBSEQUENT UNITED NATIONS CONVENTIONS AND DECLARATIONS) IN SOUTHERN AFRICA BY:  MONITORING ABUSES OF HUMAN RIGHTS;OBTAINING REDRESS FOR THE VICTIMS OF HUMAN RIGHTS ABUSE;  RELIEVING NEED AMONG THE VICTIMS OF HUMAN RIGHTS ABUSE;  RESEARCH INTO HUMAN RIGHTS ISSUES;  EDUCATING THE PUBLIC ABOUT HUMAN RIGHTS;  COMMENTING ON PROPOSED HUMAN RIGHTS LEGISLATION;  RAISING AWARENESS OF HUMAN RIGHTS ISSUES;  PROMOTING PUBLIC SUPPORT FOR HUMAN RIGHTS;  PROMOTING RESPECT FOR HUMAN RIGHTS AMONG INDIVIDUALS AND CORPORATIONS;  INTERNATIONAL ADVOCACY OF HUMAN RIGHTS;  ELIMINATING INFRINGEMENTS OF HUMAN RIGHTS.  THE RELIEF OFPOVERTY AND THE IMPROVEMENT OF THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE IN SOCIALLY AND ECONOMICALLY DISADVANTAGED COMMUNITIES IN SOUTHERN AFRICA  TO PROMOTE PUBLIC EDUCATION AND RESEARCH, ON A RANGE OF ISSUES WHICH CONTRIBUTE TO THE RELIEF AND ERADICATION OF POVERTYAND THE ADVANCEMENT OF HUMAN RIGHTS, EQUALITY AND DIVERSITY IN SOUTHERN AFRICA, PARTICULARLY WITH RESPECT TO THE NATURE, CAUSES AND EFFECTS OF POVERTY, SOCIAL INEQUITY, HUMAN RIGHTS VIOLATIONS, AND ENVIRONMENTAL DEGRADATION.

name: TRACKS OF PEACE
activities: Support tangible projects that advance the well-being and prosperity of people in conflict zones.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO ARE TO ADVANCE, FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT, THE RECONCILIATION AND RESOLUTION OF INTERNATIONAL CONFLICTS, PARTICULARLY THE ISRAELI-PALESTINIAN CONFLICT, AND TO PROMOTE RELIGIOUS AND RACIAL HARMONY BY:    A) PROMOTING KNOWLEDGE AND MUTUAL UNDERSTANDING AND RESPECT OF THE BELIEFS AND PRACTICES OF DIFFERENT RELIGIOUS FAITHS AND RACIAL GROUPS;    B) ADVANCING EDUCATION AND PROMOTING DIALOGUE BETWEEN NATIONS IN CONFLICT;    C) INITIATING AND SUPPORTING PROJECTS AIMED AT TRUST BUILDING, CONCILIATION AND COOPERATION BETWEEN NATIONS IN CONFLICT;    PROVIDED THAT ALL ACTIVITIES SHALL BE BALANCED AND IMPARTIAL

name: BRISTOL INVESTMENT FUND
activities: 1) TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF STUDENTS ATTENDING THE UNIVERSITY OF BRISTOL IN INVESTING IN FINANCIAL MARKETS AND INVESTMENT STRATEGIES.    2) TO FURTHER SUCH CHARITABLE PURPOSES FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT AS ARE EXCLUSIVELY CHARITABLE ACCORDING TO THE LAWS OF ENGLAND AND WALES AS THE TRUSTEES MAY FROM TIME TO TIME DETERMINE BY THE MAKING OF GRANTS AND DONATIONS.
objects: 1) TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF STUDENTS ATTENDING THE UNIVERSITY OF BRISTOL IN INVESTING IN FINANCIAL MARKETS AND INVESTMENT STRATEGIES.    2) TO FURTHER SUCH CHARITABLE PURPOSES FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT AS ARE EXCLUSIVELY CHARITABLE ACCORDING TO THE LAWS OF ENGLAND AND WALES AS THE TRUSTEES MAY FROM TIME TO TIME DETERMINE BY THE MAKING OF GRANTS AND DONATIONS.

name: ALL NATIONS CHRISTIAN MINISTRIES
activities: THE REGULAR HOLDING OF WORSHIP SERVICES TO PROMOTE THE CHRISTIAN FAITH IN THE COMMUNITY
objects: TO ADVANCE THE CHRISTIAN RELIGION FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC IN ACCORDANCE WITH  THE STATEMENT OF FAITH ATTACHED HERETO

name: THE MANNY AND BRIGITTA DAVIDSON CHARITABLE FOUNDATION
activities: The advancement of education, the arts, culture and heritage by providing support for capital and infrastructure projects in the United Kingdon and Israel, and by holding, maintaining and exhibiting works of art.  The relief of those in need by reason of youth, old age, ill-health, disability or financial hardship by the provision of support for organisations in the United Kingdom and Israel.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO (THE OBJECTS) ARE FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC: (A)	THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION, THE ARTS, CULTURE AND HERITAGE PRIMARILY BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY BY: (I)	PROVIDING SUPPORT FOR CAPITAL AND INFRASTRUCTURE PROJECTS IN THE UNITED KINGDOM AND ISRAEL; AND (II)	HOLDING, MAINTAINING AND EXHIBITING WORKS OF ART; (B)	THE RELIEF OF THOSE IN NEED BY REASON OF YOUTH, OLD AGE, ILL-HEALTH, DISABILITY OR FINANCIAL HARDSHIP BY THE PROVISION OF SUPPORT FOR ORGANISATIONS IN THE UNITED KINGDOMAND ISRAEL.

name: ADFERIAD RECOVERY
activities: We help people with co-occurring problems to recover through:  Developing a unified therapeutic model and service structure which combines the best practice from both mental health and substance misuse services.  Developing and delivering unified services and learning from these.  Sharing our approach and learning widely to enable other providers  to reform and improve their services.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO ARE FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT THROUGHOUT ENGLAND AND WALES TO PROVIDE RELIEF AND SUPPORT TO PEOPLE OF ANY AGE WHO ARE IN NEED DUE TO ILLNESS OR DISABILITY, AND THEIR FAMILIES, RELATIVES AND CARERS, INCLUDING IN PARTICULAR THOSE AFFECTED BY ISSUES RELATING TO MENTAL HEALTH AND SUBSTANCE ABUSE.

name: GREEN LANE COMMUNITY CENTRE
activities: To promote facilities for worship and the teachings and tenets of Islam in accordance with the teaching of the Quran and the sunnah of Prophet Muhammad p.b.u.h.
objects: (1)TO ADVANCE THE RELIGION OF ISLAM, BY MEANS OF, BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY, PROMOTING THE TEACHINGS AND TENETS OF ISLAM, PROVISION OR ASSISTANCE IN THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES FOR WORSHIP AND ISLAMIC EDUCATION IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE TEACHINGS OF THE QURAN AND SUNNAH OF THE PROPHET MUHAMMAD (PEACE AND BLESSINGS BE UPON HIM) AS INTERPRETED BY THE AHLE SUNNAH WAL JAMAAH SCHOOL OF THOUGHT;  (2)TO PROVIDE OR ASSIST IN THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION OF INDIVIDUALS WHO HAVE NEED OF SUCH FACILITIES BY REASON OF THEIR YOUTH, AGE INFIRMITY OR DISABILITY, FINANCIAL HARDSHIP OR SOCIAL CIRCUMSTANCES WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE;  (3)TO RELIEVE FINANCIAL HARDSHIP, DISTRESS AND SUFFERING AMONG POOR PEOPLE, HOMELESS, REFUGEES, AND OTHER PEOPLE IN NEED, BY MEANS OF, BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY, PROVISION OR ASSISTANCE IN THE PROVISION OF FOOD AND BASIC NECESSITIES FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE SAID PERSONS.

name: NEW LIFE CHURCH, NEW MILTON
activities: An independent Christian church, protestant, evangelical, charismatic, we meet on Sundays for worship, prayer, teaching and fellowship, and in smaller weekday groups; serving the local community through: mums and toddlers group, youth work, care homes outreach, CAP work (Christians Against Poverty), Street Pastors, and evangelism (including Alpha courses), and we support international mission.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO ARE, FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT:  4.1.	THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE CHRISTIAN FAITH IN NEW MILTON, HAMPSHIRE AND SUCH OTHER PARTS OF THE UNITED KINGDOM AND THE WORLD IN SUCH WAYS AS THE CHARITY TRUSTEES MAY FROM TIME TO TIME DECIDE.  4.2.TO RELIEVE PERSONS WHO ARE IN CONDITION OF NEED OR DISTRESS BY REASON OF FINANCIAL HARDSHIP, AGE, ILL-HEALTH, DISABILITY OR SUCH OTHER ECONOMIC OR SOCIAL DISADVANTAGE IN SUCH PARTS OF THE UNITED KINGDOM AND THE WORLD IN SUCH WAYS AS THE CHARITY TRUSTEES MAY FROM TIME TO TIME DECIDE.

name: THE HANS ALBRECHT FOUNDATION
activities: The charity organises a lecture that promotes and advances human rights issues.
objects: OBJECTS TO PROMOTE HUMAN RIGHTS (AS SET OUT IN THE UNIVERSAL DECLARATION OF HUMAN RIGHTS AND SUBSEQUENT UNITED NATIONS CONVENTIONS AND DECLARATIONS) THROUGHOUT THE UNITED KINGDOM BY: EDUCATING THE PUBLIC ABOUT HUMAN RIGHTS AND RAISING AWARENESS OF HUMAN RIGHTS ISSUES BY MEANS OF LECTURES DELIVERED BY EMINENT PRACTITIONERS AND ESTABLISHING AN AWARD TO HONOUR AN INDIVIDUAL OR ORGANISATION THAT HAS MADE AN OUTSTANDING CONTRIBUTION TO HUMAN RIGHTS.

name: LEEDS BUDDHIST VIHARA TRUST
activities: To act as a centre for the teaching Buddhism (Theravada) as well as Meditation and Mindfulness. The charity works to enhance the psychological and social well being of community groups in the North of England and encourage fostering of harmony and cohesion among them. The charity also engages in organising Buddhist cultural events.
objects: FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT, TO ADVANCE BUDDHISM IN THE NORTH OF ENGLAND, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY BY:    (A) FACILITATING THE TEACHING OF THERAVADA BUDDHISM AND TO PROVIDE OPPORTUNITIES FOR THE STUDY AND PRACTICE OF BUDDHIST PHILOSOPHY, MEDITATION AND MINDFULNESS FOR THE BENEFIT OF THOSE WHO PRACTICE BUDDHISM IN THE NORTH OF ENGLAND.    (B) CONDUCTING REGULAR LESSONS IN BUDDHISM FOR DEVOTEES.    (C) ESTABLISHING CENTRES WHERE THOSE WHO PRACTICE BUDDHISM IN THE NORTH OF ENGLAND CAN VISIT TO WORSHIP AND DISCUSS BUDDHIST PHILOSOPHY AND PRACTICE MEDITATION & MINDFULNESS. THIS WILL ACT AS A CENTRE OF LEARNING WITH ACCESS TO RESOURCES FOR THOSE WHO WISH TO FURTHER THEIR KNOWLEDGE AND UNDERSTANDING OF BUDDHIST PHILOSOPHY.    (D) ORGANISING FESTIVALS RELATED TO BUDDHIST TRADITION FOR THOSE WHO PRACTICE BUDDHISM IN THE NORTH OF ENGLAND.    (E) PROVIDING RESIDENTIAL FACILITIES FOR BUDDHIST MONKS TO TEACH AND PRACTICE BUDDHISM.

name: WOLFIE'S LEGACY
activities: Our aim is to heal, rehabilitate and rehome as many disabled dogs as possible, and in the process demonstrate to the public the pleasure of owning a disabled dog
objects: TO PROMOTE HUMANE BEHAVIOUR TOWARDS DISABLED DOGS BY PROVIDING APPROPRIATE CARE, PROTECTION, TREATMENT AND SECURITY FOR DISABLED DOGS WHICH ARE IN NEED OF CARE AND ATTENTION BY REASON OF SICKNESS, MALTREATMENT, POOR CIRCUMSTANCES OR ILL USAGE AND TO EDUCATE THE PUBLIC IN ALL MATTERS PERTAINING TO DISABLED DOG WELFARE.

name: INLAND WATER SAFETY GROUP
activities: Providing Inland Water safety information, education and training to the community. Preventing water related deaths by knowledge transfer and assisting with Search & Rescue operations as required.
objects: THE PRESERVATION AND PROTECTION OF HEALTH AND THE SAVING OF LIVES BY AIMING TO REDUCE THE RISK OF DROWNING BY:  A) EDUCATING THE PUBLIC AND RAISING AWARENESS ABOUT WATER DANGERS AND HOW TO ENJOY WATER-BASED ACTIVITIES SAFELY  B) PROVIDING LIFESAVING TRAINING AND SKILLS TO THE PUBLIC  C) ASSISTING IN THE SEARCH OR RESCUE OF PERSONS AS REQUIRED

name: EAGLE LEARNING CENTRE
activities: Eagle Learning Centre provides supplementary school to underachieving children and young people from low income families free of charge. We also support and guide children and young people with anti social behaviour. We operate in Manchester.
objects: TO ADVANCE EDUCATION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT FOR CHILDREN AGED 8 AND UPWARDS IN THE MANCHESTER AREA BY PROVIDING SUPPLEMENTARY EDUCATION IN SUBJECTS INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, MATHS AND ENGLISH.

name: ASHARAF UNION TRUST
activities: Asharaf Union Trust (AUT) works to relieve poverty locally in the UK and internationally. We support the poor and needy with their every need - food, housing, delivering emergency aid in response to crisis situations and providing healthcare. We also empowering societies through education and training.
objects: FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT TO PROMOTE THE EDUCATION (INCLUDING SOCIAL AND PHYSICAL TRAINING) OF YOUNG PEOPLE [BETWEEN THE AGE OF 18 AND 25 YEARS] IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY IN THE HORN OF AFRICA AND MIDDLE EAST AND UK IN SUCH WAYS AS THE CHARITY TRUSTEES THINK FIT, INCLUDING BY: 1.	AWARDING TO SUCH PERSONS SCHOLARSHIPS, MAINTENANCE ALLOWANCES OR GRANTS TENABLE AT ANY UNIVERSITY, COLLEGE OR INSTITUTION OF HIGHER OR FURTHER EDUCATION. 2.	PROVIDING THEIR EDUCATION , TO UNDERTAKE TRAVEL IN FURTHERANCE OF THAT EDUCATION OR TO PREPARE FOR ENTRY TO ANY OCCUPATION, TRADE OR PROFESSION ON LEAVING ANY EDUCATIONAL ESTABLISHMENT. 3.	PROMOTION OF COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION IN HEALTHY RECREATION IN PARTICULAR BY THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES FOR THE PLAYING OF A VARIETY OF SPORTING ACTIVITIES. 4.	ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUBLIC IN GENERAL ABOUT THE ISSUES RELATING TO REFUGEES AND THOSE SEEKING ASYLUM.

name: BEIS HAMEDRASH IMREI SHEFER LIMITED
