name: HERITAGE HOUSE CHRISTIAN CENTRE
activities: TO ADVANCE THE CHRISTIAN RELIGION FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC THROUGH THE HOLDING OF PRAYER MEETINGS, LECTURES, PUBLIC CELEBRATION OF RELIGIOUS FESTIVALS, PRODUCING AND/OR DISTRIBUTING LITERATURE TO ENLIGHTEN OTHERS ABOUT THE CHRISTIAN RELIGION.
objects: TO ADVANCE THE CHRISTIAN RELIGION FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC THROUGH THE HOLDING OF PRAYER MEETINGS, LECTURES, PUBLIC CELEBRATION OF RELIGIOUS FESTIVALS, PRODUCING AND/OR DISTRIBUTING LITERATURE TO ENLIGHTEN OTHERS ABOUT THE CHRISTIAN RELIGION.

name: HELPING MINDS
activities: TO ADVANCE SUCH CHARITABLE PURPOSES (ACCORDING TO THE LAW OF ENGLAND AND WALES) AS THE TRUSTEES SEE FIT FROM TIME TO TIME, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT LIMITED TO ADVANCING THE EDUCATION OF ALL PEOPLE REGARDLESS OF THEIR RESPECTIVE AGE FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFITBY:  1. MAKING GRANTS TO STUDENTS IN FULL-TIME EDUCATION IN ENGLAND AND WALES TENABLE AT ANY UNIVERSITY, COLLEGE OR INSTITUTION OF HIGHER OR FURTHER EDUCATION.  2. PROVIDING ADVICE AND INFORMATION TO ALLOW THE PUBLIC TO MAKE EDUCATED DECISIONS REGARDING THE CONTINUATION OF THEIR FUTURE EDUCATION BASED UPON THEIR INDIVIDUAL CAPABILITIES, COMPETENCIES, INTERESTS AND SKILLS.
objects: TO ADVANCE SUCH CHARITABLE PURPOSES (ACCORDING TO THE LAW OF ENGLAND AND WALES) AS THE TRUSTEES SEE FIT FROM TIME TO TIME, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT LIMITED TO ADVANCING THE EDUCATION OF ALL PEOPLE REGARDLESS OF THEIR RESPECTIVE AGE FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFITBY:  1. MAKING GRANTS TO STUDENTS IN FULL-TIME EDUCATION IN ENGLAND AND WALES TENABLE AT ANY UNIVERSITY, COLLEGE OR INSTITUTION OF HIGHER OR FURTHER EDUCATION.  2. PROVIDING ADVICE AND INFORMATION TO ALLOW THE PUBLIC TO MAKE EDUCATED DECISIONS REGARDING THE CONTINUATION OF THEIR FUTURE EDUCATION BASED UPON THEIR INDIVIDUAL CAPABILITIES, COMPETENCIES, INTERESTS AND SKILLS.

name: WOODFALLS BAND
activities: - HELPING TO CONTINUE THE EXISTENCE AND DEVELOPMENT OF THE BRASS BAND MOVEMENT THROUGH DEDICATED REHEARSALS, PERFORMANCES IN CONCERTS, COMPETITIONS,  RECORDINGS AND OTHER RELATED ACTIVITIES  - MUSICIAN DEVELOPMENT THROUGH TEACHING AND MENTORING, AND THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES AND INSTRUMENTS  - SUPPORTING THE FUNDRAISING EFFORTS OF OTHER CHARITIES THROUGH LIVE PERFORMANCE
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE BAND ARE THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE EDUCATION OF MEMBERS AND THE PUBLIC IN THE STUDY, PRACTICE AND APPRECIATION OF MUSIC AND THE ALLIED ARTS, AND IN PARTICULAR (BUT WITHOUT LIMITATION):  (A) THE ADVANCEMENT, IN THE SOUTH OF ENGLAND ANDTHE WIDER COUNTRY, OF THE BRASS BAND MOVEMENT; THE PLAYING OF BRASS BAND MUSIC AND THE PROVISION OF OPPORTUNITIES TO PARTICIPATE IN REHEARSALS, CONCERTS, RECORDING SESSIONS AND ISSUE AND SALE OF RECORDINGS, RADIO BROADCASTS, TELEVISION BROADCASTS ANDMUSICAL COMPETITIONS; THE ENCOURAGEMENT OF THE COMMISSIONING OF NEW WORKS OF BRASS BAND MUSIC EITHER ALONE OR IN ASSOCIATION WITH ANY OTHER ORGANISATION AND/OR PERSON OR PERSONS; THE TEACHING, MENTORING, APPRENTICESHIP OF MUSICIANS AND THE PLAYING OFINSTRUMENTS NORMALLY ASSOCIATED WITH BRASS BANDS AND THE ENGAGEMENT OR EMPLOYMENT OF ANY PERSON OR PERSONS FOR THESE PURPOSES;  (B) THE PROVISION OF CONCERTS OR OTHER ENTERTAINMENTS FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC OR SECTION OF THE PUBLIC (WHETHER ORNOT PAYMENT FOR ADMISSION IS REQUIRED) INCLUDING SO DOING IN ORDER TO RAISE FUNDS FOR ANY OTHER CHARITABLE OR PHILANTHROPIC ORGANISATION OPERATING WITHIN THE ABOVE AREA AND THE PROVISION OF BAND MUSIC FOR CEREMONIAL OCCASIONS AND PUBLIC FUNCTIONS IN OR AROUND SUCH AREA;  (C) THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES AND THE USE OF MUSICAL INSTRUMENTS FOR MEMBERS OF THE BAND AND OTHERS WITHIN THE SAID AREAS DESIROUS OF USING THE SAME IN SUCH MANNER AS THE CHARITY TRUSTEES AT THEIR ABSOLUTE DISCRETION SHALL FROMTIME TO TIME SEE FIT;  (D) THE ENTRY OF THE BAND INTO MEMBERSHIP OF ANY ASSOCIATIONS, FEDERATIONS OR OTHER BODIES FORMED FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE BRASS BAND MOVEMENT AS THE CHARITY TRUSTEES AT THEIR ABSOLUTE DISCRETION SHALL FROM TIME TO TIME SEE FIT;AND  (E) THE MAINTENANCE OF THE HIGHEST POSSIBLE STANDARDS OF MUSICIANSHIP AND PRESENTATION BOTH IN AND OUT OF THE PUBLIC EYE.

name: THE SEATON SLUICE 'PUBLIC ACCESS DEFIBRILLATOR' SUPPORT GROUP
activities: Fundraising for the installation and maintenance of defibrfillators. Free CPR and defibrillator awareness training to local schools and the general public.
objects: TO RAISE FUNDS, PURCHASE AND SUPPLY PUBLIC ACCESS DEFIBRILLATORS FOR THE VILLAGE OF SEATON SLUICE. TO RAISE AWARENESS OF THE PURPOSE AND LOCATION OF THE DEFIBRILLATORS INCLUDING THE PLACEMENT OF APPROPRIATE SIGNAGE. TO PROVIDE TRAINING IN THE USE OF DEFIBRILLATORS WITHIN THE LOCAL COMMUNITY.

name: THEOTOKOS NORTHAMPTON 'NIHIL SINE DEO'
activities: To advance  the Romanian Orthodox Faith in Northampton for the benefit of the public and in particular but without limitation through the holding of prayer meetings, lectures, public celebration of religious festivals producing and distributing literarure to enlighten others about the Romanian Christian Orthodox. We organize events with Charitable purpose to raise money  providing Church building.
objects: TO ADVANCE THE ROMANIAN CHRISTIAN ORTHODOX FAITH IN NORTHAMPTON FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC AND IN PARTICULAR BUT WITHOUT LIMITATION THROUGH THE HOLDING OF PRAYER MEETINGS, LECTURES, PUBLIC CELEBRATION OF RELIGIOUS FESTIVALS PRODUCING AND DISTRIBUTING LITERATURE TO ENLIGHTEN OTHERS ABOUT THE ROMANIAN CHRISTIAN ORTHODOX FAITH.

name: ONE VOICE CHOIR
activities: One Voice Choir operates in the Weymouth and surrounding areas, rehearsing 38 weeks per year and giving 4 or more public performances each year.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE SOCIETY SHALL BE:  1. TO ADVANCE, IMPROVE, DEVELOP AND MAINTAIN PUBLIC EDUCATION IN, AND APPRECIATION OF, THE ART AND SCIENCE OF MUSIC IN ALL ITS ASPECTS BY ANY MEANS THE TRUSTEES SEE FIT, INCLUDING THROUGH THE PRESENTATION OF PUBLIC CONCERTS AND RECITALS.

name: DANCEWEST LONDON LIMITED
activities: Dance classes, community dance programmes, dance services for schools and public sector.
objects: THE CHARITY'S OBJECTS ("OBJECTS") ARE SPECIFICALLY RESTRICTED TO THE FOLLOWING: TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE GENERAL PUBLIC (OF ALL AGES AND ABILITIES) FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT IN THE ART OF DANCE THROUGH CLASSES, WORKSHOPS AND PERFORMANCES ACROSS WEST LONDON, AND IN SO DOING NURTURE TALENT, DIVERSITY AND EXCELLENCE IN DANCE THROUGH PARTICIPATION AND LEARNING. TO IMPROVE THE MENTAL AND PHYSICAL HEALTH AND WELLBEING OF THE GENERAL PUBLIC FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT THROUGH DANCE AND PERFORMING ARTS RELATED ACTIVITY.

name: THE JOSHUA LANCASTER FOUNDATION
activities: The Joshua Lancaster Foundation charity was formed to help children in the northwest of England whom are suffering from a cancer diagnosis. Whether that be financial support, gifts or experiences. Also working with Ward 84 at the Royal Manchester Children's Hospital by supporting new avenues in improving the children's experience of their stay.
objects: 1) FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT, THE RELIEF OF SICKNESS AMONG CHILDREN WITH A CANCER DIAGNOSIS BY PROVIDING TOYS, GIFTS AND ITEMS TO ENHANCE THEIR PHYSICAL AND EMOTIONAL HEALTH AND EASE THEIR SUFFERING.    2) THE RELIEF OF FINANCIAL HARDSHIP AMONG PARENTS AND CARERS OF CHILDREN WITH A CANCER DIAGNOSIS BY MAKING GRANTS OF MONEY FOR ITEMS, SERVICES OR FACILITIES.

name: THE JORJA-ROSE FOUNDATION
activities: Dedicated to raising awareness for childhood brain tumours The Jorja-Rose Foundation was established after the death of Jorja-Rose from pineoblastoma brain tumour aged just 2years 10 months. The lack of awareness for this devastating disease is forefront of our goals whilst also supporting families at Queens Medical Center Nottingham. We engage various in fundraising activities within Nottingham.
objects: 1 THE RELIEF OF CHILDREN UP TO THE AGE OF 18, THEIR FAMILIES AND SUPPORT STAFF, BEING TREATED IN NOTTINGHAM, NOTTINGHAMSHIRE AND NEIGHBOURHOOD COUNTIES AND WHERE PRACTICABLE WITHIN THE UNITED KINGDOM GENERALLY, WHO HAVE SUFFERED OR ARE SUFFERING FROM ALL TYPES OF CHILDHOOD CANCER BY PROVIDING OR ASSISTING IN THE PROVISION OF SERVICES AND OTHER ACTIVITIES WHICH CREATE EVERLASTING GOOD MEMORIES BY ANY MEANS AS THE TRUSTEES SEE FIT  2 THE PRESERVATION AND PROTECTION OF GOOD HEALTH BY THE PROVISION OFSUPPORT AND SERVICES FOR BEREAVED FAMILIES WHO HAVE SUFFERED A LOSS DUE TO CHILDHOOD BRAIN TUMOUR  3 ADVANCING EDUCATION AMONG MEDICAL PROFESSIONALS, CARERS, FAMILIES AND THE CHILDREN WHO ARE OR WHO WERE SUFFERING OR RECOVERING FROM BRAIN TUMOURS BYANY MEANS THE TRUSTEES THINK APPROPRIATE.

name: WEBS TRAINING
activities: THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION THROUGH THE PROMOTION AND DELIVERY OF APPRENTICESHIPS AND OTHER VOCATIONAL TRAINING TO YOUNG PEOPLE AND ADULTS EMPLOYED OR INTENDING TO BECOME EMPLOYED IN INDUSTRY AND COMMERCE INCLUDING FURNITURE MANUFACTURING AND ENGINEERING.
objects: THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION THROUGH THE PROMOTION AND DELIVERY OF APPRENTICESHIPS AND OTHER VOCATIONAL TRAINING TO YOUNG PEOPLE AND ADULTS EMPLOYED OR INTENDING TO BECOME EMPLOYED IN INDUSTRY AND COMMERCE INCLUDING FURNITURE MANUFACTURING AND ENGINEERING.

name: MARLBOROUGH & DISTRICT LIONS CLUB
activities: Marlborough & District Lions club provides grants to Lions charities internationally as well as supporting deserving local people and organisations within the Marlborough district with help that they may need.
objects: 1.1	THE OBJECTS OF THE CLUB ARE SUCH PURPOSES AS ARE EXCLUSIVELY CHARITABLE IN ENGLAND & WALES, INCLUDING IN PARTICULAR:    1.1.1	THE ADVANCEMENT OF CITIZENSHIP BY:    1.1.1.1	PROMOTING THE PRINCIPLES OF GOOD CITIZENSHIP;    1.1.1.2	ENCOURAGING MEMBERS TO TAKE AN ACTIVE INTEREST IN THE CIVIC, CULTURAL, SOCIAL AND MORAL WELFARE OF THE COMMUNITY;    1.1.1.3	PROVIDING A FORUM FOR THE OPEN DISCUSSION OF ALL MATTERS OF PUBLIC INTEREST; PROVIDED THAT PARTISAN POLITICS AND SECTARIAN RELIGION SHALL NOT BEDEBATED BY MEMBERS;    1.1.1.4	ENCOURAGING SERVICE-MINDED PEOPLE TO SERVE THEIR COMMUNITY WITHOUT PERSONAL REWARD AND ENCOURAGING THE PROMOTION OF HIGH ETHICAL STANDARDS IN COMMERCE, INDUSTRY, PROFESSIONS, PUBLIC WORKS AND PRIVATE ENDEAVOURS;    1.1.1.5	SUPPORTING YOUTH TO DEVELOP THEIR SKILLS, CAPACITIES AND CAPABILITIES TO ENABLE THEM TO PARTICIPATE IN SOCIETY AS MATURE AND RESPONSIBLE INDIVIDUALS;    1.1.2	PROMOTING THE VOLUNTARY SECTOR FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY ASSOCIATING WITH LOCAL AUTHORITIES IN A COMMON EFFORT TO ADVANCE EDUCATION AND PROVIDE FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION TO IMPROVE THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE OF PEOPLE IN LOCAL, NATIONAL AND INTERNATIONAL COMMUNITIES;    1.1.3	PROMOTING VOLUNTEERING;    1.1.4	THE RELIEF OF POVERTY AND THE RELIEF OF THOSE IN NEED IN PARTICULAR BY PROVIDING HUMANITARIAN AID AND DISASTER RELIEF;    1.1.5	THE ADVANCEMENT OF HEALTH OR THE SAVING OF LIVES BY PREVENTING AVOIDABLE BLINDNESS, ASSISTING DISABLED PEOPLE TO LEAD INDEPENDENT LIVES OR HELPING TO PREVENT OR MANAGE HEALTH ISSUES;    1.1.6	PROMOTING FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC THE CONSERVATION PROTECTION AND IMPROVEMENT OF THE PHYSICAL AND NATURAL ENVIRONMENT; AND/OR    1.1.7	PROMOTING COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION IN HEALTHY RECREATION.

name: THE SAMUEL TRUST
activities: TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE IN SRI LANKA BY:  (I) THE PROVISION OF GRANTS AND SCHOLARSHIPS TO POOR OR DISADVANTAGED CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE OF PRE-SCHOOL, SCHOOL AND FIRST DEGREE AGE IN SRI LANKA  (II) THE PROVISION OF BOOKS, EQUIPMENT AND FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO NURSERIES, SCHOOLS AND UNIVERSITIES IN SRI LANKA.
objects: TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE IN SRI LANKA BY:  (I) THE PROVISION OF GRANTS AND SCHOLARSHIPS TO POOR OR DISADVANTAGED CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE OF PRE-SCHOOL, SCHOOL AND FIRST DEGREE AGE IN SRI LANKA  (II) THE PROVISION OF BOOKS, EQUIPMENT AND FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO NURSERIES, SCHOOLS AND UNIVERSITIES IN SRI LANKA.

name: YOUTH ACROSS HEMEL
activities: The advancement of the Christian faith for the public benefit in Hemel Hempstead, Kings Langley and the surrounding area by supporting Christian organisations and individuals who are serving the young people of our area in such ways as the trustees think fit
objects: THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE CHRISTIAN FAITH FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT IN HEMEL HEMPSTEAD, KINGS LANGLEY AND THE SURROUNDING AREA BY SUPPORTING CHRISTIAN ORGANISATIONS AND INDIVIDUALS WHO ARE SERVING THE YOUNG PEOPLE OF OUR AREA IN SUCH WAYS AS THE TRUSTEES THINK FIT AND INCLUDING:    PROVIDING RESOURCES TO SUPPORT YOUNG PEOPLE TO EXPLORE THE CHRISTIAN FAITH AND WHAT IT MEANS TO HAVE A PERSONAL RELATIONSHIP WITH JESUS;    WORKING WITH SCHOOLS BY TAKING LESSONS AND SUPPORTING LESSON PLANS, AND BY TAKING ASSEMBLIES. WE WILL PROVIDE SUPPORT TO SCHOOL BASED CLUBS AND PRAYER SPACES AS WELL AS OUT OF SCHOOL EVENTS THAT PUT INTO PRACTICE A CHRISTIAN ETHOS.    CONSULTING WITH AND SUPPORTING LOCAL CHURCHES IN THEIR WORK WITH YOUNG PEOPLE. WE WILL SERVE AND SUPPORT VOLUNTEERS WITH TRAINING AND RESOURCES THAT THEY REQUIRE TO BE AS EFFECTIVE AS POSSIBLE IN THEIR WORK WITH YOUNG PEOPLE.    CREATING A NETWORKING HUB FOR LOCAL CHURCHES, HEADS AND TEACHERS, VOLUNTEERS, YOUTH WORKERS AND OTHER CHRISTIAN ORGANISATIONS WITH A HEART FOR MISSION TO YOUNG PEOPLE.

name: THE MALAYSIAN COMMONWEALTH STUDIES CENTRE IN CAMBRIDGE
activities: To advance the education of the public in Commonwealth Studies.  To support research into all aspects of the Commonwealth and related subjects, and to disseminate the useful results of such research.
objects: THE TRUSTEES SHALL HOLD THE FUND AND ITS INCOME ON TRUST TO APPLY THEM FOR THE FOLLOWING OBJECTS:  (I) TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUBLIC IN COMMONWEALTH STUDIES INCLUDING MATTERS RELATING TO THE COMMONWEALTH AS A WHOLE OR TO A PARTICULAR PART OR REGION THEREOF;  (II) TO PROMOTE OR ASSIST IN THE PROMOTION OF RESEARCH INTO ALL ASPECTS OF THE COMMONWEALTH AND RELATED SUBJECTS AND TO DISSEMINATE THE USEFUL RESULTS OF SUCH RESEARCH.

name: ISE VALLEY U3A
activities: THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION, AND IN PARTICULAR THE EDUCATION OF OLDER PEOPLE AND THOSE WHO ARE RETIRED FROM FULL TIME WORK, BY ALL MEANS INCLUDING ASSOCIATED ACTIVITIES CONDUCIVE TO LEARNING AND PERSONAL DEVELOPMENT, IN KETTERING [AND ITS SURROUNDINGLOCALITY].
objects: THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION, AND IN PARTICULAR THE EDUCATION OF OLDER PEOPLE AND THOSE WHO ARE RETIRED FROM FULL TIME WORK, BY ALL MEANS INCLUDING ASSOCIATED ACTIVITIES CONDUCIVE TO LEARNING AND PERSONAL DEVELOPMENT, IN KETTERING [AND ITS SURROUNDINGLOCALITY].

name: BRIGHTWELL SUPPORTING REFUGEES
activities: To raise funds and receive grants and donations to help refugees in any part of the world, in particular to support their education and training; to raise awareness among our local community about refugees and those seeking asylum; and to work with other charities and development organisations to help in the relief of poverty of refugees and those seeking asylum.
objects: 1. THE RELIEF OF POVERTY OF REFUGEES AND THOSE SEEKING ASYLUM IN ANY PART OF THE WORLD IN PARTICULAR BY THE SUPPLY OF AID TO SUCH PERSONS THROUGH PROVIDING GRANTS AND ITEMS TO INDIVIDUALS IN NEED AND/OR CHARITIES OR OTHER ORGANISATIONS WORKING TO RELIEVE POVERTY.  2. THE RELIEF OF POVERTY OF ASYLUM SEEKERS AND REFUGEES AND THEIR DEPENDENTS LIVING (TEMPORARILY OR PERMANENTLY) IN BRIGHTWELL CUM SOTWELL AND THE SURROUNDING AREA BY PROVIDING ITEMS, SERVICES AND PRACTICAL SUPPORT.

name: THE MINDFULNESS INITIATIVE
activities: The Mindfulness Initiative conducts research and educates leaders, policy makers, service commissioners and the public about the theory and practice of mindfulness and compassion training. It works with legislators around the world to help them make capacities of heart and mind serious considerations of public policy, and explore how mindfulness training may improve political discourse.
objects: "TO ADVANCE EDUCATION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT IN THE PRACTICE AND SCIENCE OF MINDFULNESS AND COMPASSION TRAINING, AND IN FURTHERANCE:    I) TO SUPPLY EDUCATION, RESEARCH AND OTHER SERVICES TO MEMBERS OF THE UK PARLIAMENT AND CIVIL SERVICE TO HELP THEM INQUIRE INTO THE PRACTICE, SCIENCE AND BENEFITS OF MINDFULNESS AND COMPASSION TRAINING WITHIN PUBLIC SERVICES AND POLICY MAKING, AND EXTEND SUCH EDUCATION, RESEARCH AND OTHER SERVICES TO THE LEGISLATIVE SYSTEMS OF OTHER COUNTRIES.    II) TO EDUCATELEADERS, PROFESSIONALS AND SERVICE COMMISSIONERS ABOUT THE PRACTICE, SCIENCE AND BENEFITS OF MINDFULNESS AND COMPASSION TRAINING IN ALL SECTORS.    III) TO PROMOTE EDUCATION AND RESEARCH INTO MINDFULNESS AND COMPASSION TRAINING PROGRAMMES OF ALL KINDS, AND MAKE THIS RESEARCH AND TRAINING ACCESSIBLE TO THE PUBLIC.    IV) TO SUPPORT THE FURTHER DEVELOPMENT OF MINDFULNESS, COMPASSION AND OTHER CONTEMPLATIVE MIND-TRAINING PROGRAMMES BY COOPERATING WITH MINDFULNESS ORGANISATIONS, ACADEMICS AND PRACTITIONERS INTERNATIONALLY, INCLUDING BY CONVENING AND FACILITATING CONFERENCES, SEMINARS AND OTHER GATHERINGS TO SHARE INFORMATION AND COORDINATE RESEARCH

name: FELLOWSHIP OF FAITHS FOR ONE RACE
activities: Promotion of religious toleration in Birmingham.
objects: TO PROMOTE RACIAL HARMONY IN BIRMINGHAM FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC IN PARTICULAR BY BUT NOT LIMITED TO:  (1) SUPPORTING, CO-ORDINATING AND GIVING INFORMATION TO MINORITY ETHNIC GROUPS AND ORGANISATIONS IN BIRMINGHAM, INCLUDING THE PRODUCTION OF A NEWSLETTER;  (2) PROVIDING OPPORTUNITIES FOR INDIVIDUALS TO LEARN ABOUT OTHER FAITHS, THROUGH VISITS TO PLACES OF WORSHIP AND;  (3) PROVIDING OR ASSISTING IN THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES IN THE INTEREST OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURETIME OCCUPATION OF INDIVIDUALS WHO HAVE NEED OF SUCH FACILITIES BY REASON OF THEIR YOUTH, AGE, INFIRMITY OR DISABILITY, FINANCIAL HARDSHIP OR SOCIAL CIRCUMSTANCES WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE.

name: DONCASTER BUSINESS FOR THE COMMUNITY
activities: The Charity makes grants to individuals and organisations in the Doncaster MBC area.
objects: THE CHARITY'S OBJECTS ARE SPECIFICALLY RESTRICTED TO THE FOLLOWING:    THE PROMOTION OF ANY CHARITABLE PURPOSES PRINCIPALLY FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PEOPLE AND COMMUNITIES IN THE ADMINISTRATIVE AREA OF DONCASTER METROPOLITAN BOROUGH COUNCIL, AND IN EXCEPTIONAL CIRCUMSTANCES THROUGHOUT THE UNITED KINGDOM AS A WHOLE, AND IN PARTICULAR, BUT WITHOUT PREJUDICE TO THE FOREGOING:    (1) THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION;    (2) THE PROMOTION OF GOOD HEALTH;    (3) THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES FOR RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION OF INDIVIDUALS WHO HAVE NEED OF SUCH FACILITIES BY REASON OF THEIR YOUTH, AGE, INFIRMITY OR DISABLEMENT, FINANCIAL HARDSHIP OR SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC CIRCUMSTANCES OR FOR THE PUBLIC AT LARGE IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFAREAND WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THE CONDITION OF LIFE OF THE BENEFICIARIES; AND    (4) THE RELIEF OF POVERTY AND SICKNESS.

name: HUMLIN FOUNDATION
activities: Our aim is to help provide poor communities in India with resources to improve hygiene, sanitation and schooling. Our intention is help relieve poverty and suffering in poor communities through the improvement of water supplies, sanitation and education.
objects: FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT TO RELIEVE POVERTY AND SUFFERING IN ANY PART OF THE DEVELOPING WORLD THROUGH THE IMPROVEMENT OF WATER SUPPLIES, SANITATION AND EDUCATION.

name: YOU DONATE FOUNDATION
activities: You Donate Foundation is a UK based Charity Organisation, which has been working in helping disadvantaged groups and supporting community organisations.
objects: 1. THE PREVENTION OR RELIEF OF POVERTY AND THE ADVANCEMENT OF HEALTH OR THE SAVING OF LIVES BOTH NATIONALLY AND INTERNATIONALLY IN PARTICULAR THOSE AFFECTED BY NATURAL DISASTERS OR CONFLICT BY PROVIDING GRANTS OF MONEY, PROVISION OF ITEMS SUCH AS HOUSE REBUILDING / REPAIRING HOUSES, PAYMENT OF SERVICES SUCH AS CLOTHING, FOOD, MEDICINES, SHELTER, UTILITIES, SANITATION AND ANY OTHER FACILITIES TO ENHANCE THE QUALITY AND STANDARD OF LIVING OF THOSE AFFECTED. 2. THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION BOTH NATIONALLY AND INTERNATIONALLY IN PARTICULAR ORPHANS AND CHILDREN'S IN NEED TO PROMOTE KNOWLEDGE AND UNDERSTANDING OF SPECIFIC AREAS OF STUDY, SKILLS, EXPERTISE AND ASSISTING THE DEVELOPMENT OF EDUCATION CENTRES. 3. ANY OTHER CHARITABLE PURPOSES E.G. THE PROVISIONS OF FACILITIES FOR PROVIDING FUNERAL SERVICES / ASSISTANCE TO THOSE IN BEREAVEMENT BY MAKING GRANTS / DONATIONS.

name: CANOLFAN GLANHWFA CYF
activities: Canolfan Glanhwfa Cyf is in the process of providing services for older and disadvantaged people as well as the provision of cultural services for young people. It is also used for religious services.
objects: TO ESTABLISH AND MAINTAIN A MULTI PURPOSE CENTRE FOR COMMUNITY USE IN THE TOWN OF LLANGEFNI AND SURROUNDING AREA BY DEVELOPING FAITH, CULTURE AND EDUCATION IN THE COMMUNITY AND NUTURE CONTACT BETWEEN THE CHURCHES OF LLANGEFNI AND THE CONTEMPORARY SOCIETY AROUND THEM;  TO PROVIDE FOR A PLACE OF WORSHIP AND RELIGIOUS ACTIVITIES, RESOURCES AND OPPORTUNITIES FOR MEETINGS AND LOCAL GROUPS AND MOVEMENTS FOR SOCIAL, CULTURAL, PHILANTHROPIC AND EDUCATIONAL BENEFIT;  TO STRENGTHEN CONTACT WITH OTHER COMMUNITY, VOLUNTARY AND CHARITABLE BODIES AND MOVEMENTS IN THE AREA, FOR THE BENEFIT AND REGENERATION OF THE TOWN OF LLANGEFNI

name: CHURCH OF GOD (SEVENTH DAY) DEPTFORD
activities: Advancement of the Christian religion in Deptford by coordinating the work of the Church in preaching the gospel; teaching and raising awareness and the understanding of the Christian Faith. 				 The furtherance of the charitable work of the Church by the advancement  of such other charitable purposes as the Trustees shall from time to time decide. The relief/ prevention of poverty in Deptford
objects: 	THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE CHRISTIAN RELIGION IN DEPTFORD AND THE SURROUNDING AREAS AS THE CHARITY TRUSTEES MAY FROM TIME TO TIME DECIDE, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE PROVISION OF A PLACE OF WORSHIP; COORDINATING THE WORK OF THE CHURCH IN PREACHING THE GOSPEL; TEACHING AND RAISING AWARENESS & UNDERSTANDING OF THE CHRISTIAN FAITH.    	THE RELIEF AND/OR PREVENTION OF POVERTY IN DEPTFORD AND THE SURROUNDING AREAS AS THE CHARITY TRUSTEES MAY FROM TIME DECIDE INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO PROVIDING GRANTS, FOOD, CLOTHING AND SERVICES.

name: HOUSE OF DESTINY MINISTRIES
activities: (A)	THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE CHRISTIAN FAITH BY ANY MEANS WHATSOEVER INCLUDING (BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY) THE WORSHIP AND ENJOYMENT OF GOD, THE GROWING OF THE CHRISTIAN COMMUNITY, THE DECLARING AND DEMONSTRATING OF THE CHRISTIAN GOSPEL, THE TEACHING OF CHRISTIAN PRINCIPLES AND CHRISTIAN DISCIPLESHIP AND THE PASTORAL CARE OF PEOPLE, THE PRINTING AND DISTRIBUTION OF THE BIBLE AND CHRISTIAN LITERATURE BY ANY FORM OF MEDIA AND THE FOUNDING AND SERVING OF CHRISTIAN CHURCHES;  (B)	THE RELIEF OF THOSE IN NEED,HARDSHIP OR DISTRESS BY VIRTUE OF THEIR AGE OR DISABILITY OR THE RELIEF OF ANY OTHER SUCH PERSONS WHO ARE IN NEED OF CHARITABLE SUPPORT;  (C)	THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION ON THE BASIS OF CHRISTIAN PRINCIPLES, INCLUDING BY THE PROVISION OF EDUCATION INEDUCATIONAL ESTABLISHMENTS OR THE PROVISION OF ONE OR MORE EDUCATIONAL ESTABLISHMENTS FOR THE GENERAL EDUCATION OF CHILDREN OR ADULTS ON THE BASIS OF CHRISTIAN PRINCIPLES; AND  (D)	SUCH OTHER CHARITABLE PURPOSES AS THE DIRECTORS IN THEIR ABSOLUTE DISCRETION THINK FIT IN THEIR PURSUANCE OF THE MAIN OBJECT OF THE CHURCH WHICH IS MAINLY THE PREACHING OF THE CHRISTIAN FAITH (âTHE OBJECTS)
objects: (A)	THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE CHRISTIAN FAITH BY ANY MEANS WHATSOEVER INCLUDING (BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY) THE WORSHIP AND ENJOYMENT OF GOD, THE GROWING OF THE CHRISTIAN COMMUNITY, THE DECLARING AND DEMONSTRATING OF THE CHRISTIAN GOSPEL, THE TEACHING OF CHRISTIAN PRINCIPLES AND CHRISTIAN DISCIPLESHIP AND THE PASTORAL CARE OF PEOPLE, THE PRINTING AND DISTRIBUTION OF THE BIBLE AND CHRISTIAN LITERATURE BY ANY FORM OF MEDIA AND THE FOUNDING AND SERVING OF CHRISTIAN CHURCHES;  (B)	THE RELIEF OF THOSE IN NEED,HARDSHIP OR DISTRESS BY VIRTUE OF THEIR AGE OR DISABILITY OR THE RELIEF OF ANY OTHER SUCH PERSONS WHO ARE IN NEED OF CHARITABLE SUPPORT;  (C)	THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION ON THE BASIS OF CHRISTIAN PRINCIPLES, INCLUDING BY THE PROVISION OF EDUCATION INEDUCATIONAL ESTABLISHMENTS OR THE PROVISION OF ONE OR MORE EDUCATIONAL ESTABLISHMENTS FOR THE GENERAL EDUCATION OF CHILDREN OR ADULTS ON THE BASIS OF CHRISTIAN PRINCIPLES; AND  (D)	SUCH OTHER CHARITABLE PURPOSES AS THE DIRECTORS IN THEIR ABSOLUTE DISCRETION THINK FIT IN THEIR PURSUANCE OF THE MAIN OBJECT OF THE CHURCH WHICH IS MAINLY THE PREACHING OF THE CHRISTIAN FAITH (âTHE OBJECTS)

name: PLASTIC POLLUTION AWARENESS & ACTION PROJECTS
activities: Plastic Pollution Awareness Workshops, Activities & Research
objects: I) TO PROMOTE FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC, THE CONSERVATION, PROTECTION AND IMPROVEMENT OF THE PHYSICAL AND NATURAL ENVIRONMENT, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY BY:  (A) RAISING PUBLIC AWARENESS OF THE NEGATIVE CONSEQUENCES OF PLASTIC USE BOTH INTERMS OF THE IMPLICATIONS OF PLASTIC POLLUTION FOR PUBLIC HEALTH, AND THE IMPACTS OF ENVIRONMENTAL TOXINS ASSOCIATED WITH PLASTIC POLLUTION.  (B) IDENTIFYING BIODEGRADABLE, COMPOSTABLE, OR OTHER POLLUTION-REDUCING ALTERNATIVES TO PLASTICS AND PROMOTING THEIR USE IN THE PUBLIC AS WELL AS COMMERCIAL SECTOR.  (C) RESEARCHING, IDENTIFYING AND PROMOTING ENVIRONMENTAL SOLUTIONS WHICH AIM TO REDUCE OR ELIMINATE PLASTIC POLLUTION IN THE ENVIRONMENT.  II) TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUBLIC IN THE CONSERVATION, PROTECTION AND IMPROVEMENT OF THE PHYSICAL AND NATURAL ENVIRONMENT, FOCUSSING ON THE PROBLEM OF PLASTIC USE AND POLLUTION, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY BY:  A) PROVIDING SEMINARS/LECTURES/WORKSHOPS ABOUT PLASTIC USE, ITS CONSEQUENCESAND ALTERNATIVES  B) COLLABORATING WITH UNIVERSITIES AND EDUCATION PROVIDERS  C) PRODUCING A WEBSITE AND SOCIAL MEDIA CONTENT

name: PAUL'S PLACE (SOUTH WEST)
activities: Our aim is to enhance the lives of physically disabled adults and those with cognitive and sensory impairment, to support them to live life to the full.  We provide social activities to connect people, build friendships, reducing loneliness and isolation.  We encourage people to develop new skills and achieve independence.  We develop opportunities for people to improve their health and wellbeing.
objects: TO RELIEVE THE NEEDS OF ADULTS WITH PHYSICAL COGNITIVE AND SENSORY IMPAIRMENTS AND THEIR CARERS IN PARTICULAR, BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY, BY THE PROVISION OF EDUCATION, LIFE-SKILLS, SPORTS, SOCIAL AND RECREATIONAL ACTIVITIES, ACCOMMODATION TOGETHER WITH PRACTICAL SUPPORT AND ADVICE

name: AL-FIKR
activities: AL-FIKR AIMS TO HELP THOSE IN DIRE NEED, REGARDLESS OF RACE, RELIGION, ETHNICITY, GENDER OR DISABILITY. AL-FIKR FREQUENTLY HOLDS INTERFAITH ACTIVITIES, SPORTS ACTIVITIES, EDUCATION AND TRAINING PROGRAMMES IN UK. AL-FIKR PROVIDES RELIEF IN AREAS SUCH AS WATER AND SANITATION, EDUCATION, HEALTH AND NUTRITION, ORPHAN SPONSORSHIP FOR THE WORLD'S POOREST PEOPLE.
objects: 1.	TO ADVANCE THE ISLAMIC RELIGION IN THE UNITED KINGDOM AND THE WORLD FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC THROUGH THE HOLDING OF MEETINGS, LECTURES [PUBLIC CELEBRATION OF RELIGIOUS FESTIVALS] PRODUCING AND/OR DISTRIBUTING LITERATURE ON AND TO ENLIGHTEN OTHERS ABOUT THE ISLAMIC RELIGION. 2.	TO ADVANCE IN LIFE AND HELP YOUNG PEOPLE THROUGH: (A) THE PROVISION OF RECREATIONAL AND LEISURE TIME ACTIVITIES PROVIDED IN THE INTEREST OF SOCIAL WELFARE, DESIGNED TO IMPROVE THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE; (B) PROVIDINGSUPPORT AND ACTIVITIES WHICH DEVELOP THEIR SKILLS, CAPACITIES AND CAPABILITIES TO ENABLE THEM TO PARTICIPATE IN SOCIETY AS MATURE AND RESPONSIBLE INDIVIDUALS.

name: RHAYADER LUNCHEON CLUB
activities: TO PROMOTE SOCIAL INCLUSION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY PREVENTING PEOPLE FROM BECOMING SOCIALLY EXCLUDED, RELIEVING THE NEEDS OF THOSE PEOPLE WHO ARE SOCIALLY EXCLUDED AND ASSISTING THEM TO INTEGRATE INTO SOCIETY THROUGH THE PROVISION OF, BUT NOT RESTRICTED TO, LOW COST LUNCH CLUBS.  FOR THE PURPOSE OF THIS CLAUSE 'SOCIALLY EXCLUDED' MEANS BEING EXCLUDED FROM SOCIETY, OR PARTS OF SOCIETY, AS A RESULT OF ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING FACTORS: OLD AGE; FINANCIAL HARDSHIP; ILL HEALTH (PHYSICAL OR MENTAL); DISABILITY.
objects: TO PROMOTE SOCIAL INCLUSION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY PREVENTING PEOPLE FROM BECOMING SOCIALLY EXCLUDED, RELIEVING THE NEEDS OF THOSE PEOPLE WHO ARE SOCIALLY EXCLUDED AND ASSISTING THEM TO INTEGRATE INTO SOCIETY THROUGH THE PROVISION OF, BUT NOT RESTRICTED TO, LOW COST LUNCH CLUBS.  FOR THE PURPOSE OF THIS CLAUSE 'SOCIALLY EXCLUDED' MEANS BEING EXCLUDED FROM SOCIETY, OR PARTS OF SOCIETY, AS A RESULT OF ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING FACTORS: OLD AGE; FINANCIAL HARDSHIP; ILL HEALTH (PHYSICAL OR MENTAL); DISABILITY.

name: NOTTINGHAM J CARE
activities: the charity provides social and financial support to people in Nottingham who have need because of age, infirmity, ill health or poverty
objects: (A)	TO PROMOTE AND PROTECT THE PHYSICAL AND MENTAL HEALTH AND SOCIAL WELFARE OF INDIVIDUALS WHO ARE IN NEED OF SUPPORT AND WHO LIVE WITHIN NOTTINGHAMSHIRE AND SURROUNDING AREAS OR WITHIN SUCH OTHER REGIONS AS THE CHARITY TRUSTEES IN THEIR DISCRETION DECIDE, THROUGH THE PROVISION OF FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE, COUNSELLING, SOCIAL CARE AND PRACTICAL SUPPORT AND EDUCATION AND PRACTICAL ADVICE IN ACCORDANCE WITH JEWISH VALUES AND TRADITIONS; AND  (B)	TO PROMOTE ANY OTHER EXCLUSIVELY CHARITABLE OBJECTS ANDPURPOSES AS THE CHARITY TRUSTEES SEE FIT PROVIDED THAT THEY ARE REGARDED AS CHARITABLE UNDER THE LAWS OF ENGLAND AND WALES.

name: FOXDALE EQUINE ASSISTED LEARNING CIO
activities: TO RELIEVE ADULTS AND CHILDREN/YOUNG PEOPLE, LIVING IN LINCOLNSHIRE AND THE SURROUNDING AREA, WITH A CHARITABLE NEED IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT LIMITED TO THOSE WITH PHYSICAL, MENTAL AND EMOTIONAL DISABILITIES THROUGH THE PROVISION OF HORSE RELATED THERAPY PROGRAMMES AND IN SUCH WAYS AS THE TRUSTEES SEE FIT, TO PROMOTE THEIR HEALTH, WELLBEING AND REHABILITATION
objects: TO RELIEVE ADULTS AND CHILDREN/YOUNG PEOPLE, LIVING IN AND THE SURROUNDING AREA WITH A CHARITABLE NEED IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT LIMITED TO THOSE WITH PHYSICAL, MENTAL AND EMOTIONAL DISABILITIES THROUGH THE PROVISION OF HORSE RELATED THERAPY PROGRAMME ANDIN SUCH WAYS AS THE TRUSTEES SEE FIT, TO PROMOTE THEIR HEALTH, WELLBEING AND REHABILITATION.

name: LIVING HOPE MINISTRY INTERNATIONAL
activities: The objects of the Living Hope Ministry International are to apply the income and all or such part or parts of the capital for or towards promotion of the work of God and charitable purposes and to make donations to such charitable institution or individuals at such time or such times and in such manner as the Trustees may in their absolute discretion think fit.
objects: TO ADVANCE THE CHRISTIAN RELIGION FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE STATEMENT OF FAITH ATTACHED HERETO.

name: ORCHESTRA FOR THE EARTH
activities: Concerts and music events (often combined with other art forms) to raise awareness for the environment, collect donations for environmental charities, and inspire action again climate change.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO ARE:    1) TO ADVANCE, IMPROVE, DEVELOP AND MAINTAIN PUBLIC EDUCATION IN, AND APPRECIATION OF THE ARTS, AND IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY THE ART OF MUSIC, BY ANY MEANS THE TRUSTEES SEE FIT, INCLUDING THROUGH THE PRESENTATION OF PUBLIC CONCERTS, RECITALS, LECTURES, WORKSHOPS, OPEN REHEARSALS AND EXHIBITIONS.    2) TO ADVANCE EDUCATION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT IN THE SUBJECTS OF PROTECTION AND IMPROVEMENT OF THE PHYSICAL AND NATURAL ENVIRONMENT WORLDWIDE (INCLUDING CONSERVATION OF THE NATURAL ENVIRONMENT AND THE PROMOTION OF SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT) IN PARTICULAR BY THE ORGANISATION AND PROVISION OF PUBLIC EVENTS AND LECTURES.    3) TO FURTHER SUCH CHARITABLE PURPOSE OR PURPOSES AS THE TRUSTEES IN THEIR ABSOLUTE DISCRETION SHALL THINK FIT BUT IN PARTICULAR THROUGH THE MAKING OF GRANTS AND DONATIONS.

name: FRIENDS OF BARNSOLE
activities: We operate within the school, using fundraising events to engage parents, carers, pupils and the local community. Funds are used to enhance the school experiences of pupils by providing extracurricular activities such as: visiting performers, animal experiences, clubs, to provide equipment to aid personal, social, physical development as well as engage all pupils in social play.
objects: TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF PUPILS IN THE SCHOOL BARNSOLE PRIMARY IN PARTICULAR BY:    DEVELOPING EFFECTIVE RELATIONSHIPS BETWEEN THE STAFF, PARENTS AND OTHERS ASSOCIATED WITH THE SCHOOL    ENGAGING IN ACTIVITIES OR PROVIDING FACILITIES OR EQUIPMENT WHICH SUPPORT THE SCHOOL AND ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUPILS.

name: CHASDEI MENDEL CHAIM

name: LAND & CO FOUNDATION
activities: The Charity invites applications for funding from other charities which support people in the UK and overseas. In the UK, the focus is on the north west region, for those with physical disability, learning difficulties or mental health needs and those in hospice care. Overseas, the charity has supported education projects in deprived communities.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CHARITY ARE TO PROMOTE SUCH EXCLUSIVELY CHARITABLE PURPOSES ACCORDING TO THE LAW OF ENGLAND AND WALES AS THE TRUSTEES IN THEIR DISCRETION SHALL DETERMINE FROM TIME TO TIME.

name: LEICESTER VINEYARD CHURCH
activities: TO ADVANCE THE CHRISTIAN RELIGION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE STATEMENT OF FAITH IN THE SCHEDULE HERETO ATTACHED IN SUCH PARTS OF THE UNITED KINGDOM AND THE WORLD THROUGH:  THE ORGANISATION AND PROVISION OF CHRISTIAN WORSHIP;  THE PROVISION OF SUCH FACILITIES AND SERVICES AS ARE APPROPRIATE FOR THE CHURCH, TO ENABLE IT TO FULFIL ITS MISSION TO THE MEMBERS OF THE CHURCH, VISITORS TO THE CHURCH AND THE LOCAL COMMUNITY AND THE WIDER COMMUNITY;  THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES FOR CHRISTIAN TRAINING AND SERVICE;  THE SUPPORT AND PROVISION OF CHRISTIAN EVANGELISM AND OUTREACH;  THE PROVISION OF ASSISTANCE TO THE WIDER CHRISTIAN CHURCH IN ITS MINISTRIES.

name: SKILLS2BUILD EDUCATION
activities: Skills2build Education provides education, training, and volunteering opportunities to young and/or unemployed people within the construction and landscaping industries.
objects: THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION, TRAINING OR RETRAINING, PARTICULARLY AMONG YOUNG AND / OR UNEMPLOYED PEOPLE, AND PROVIDING YOUNG AND / OR UNEMPLOYED PEOPLE WITH CAREERS INFORMATION, ASSISTANCE TO FIND EMPLOYMENT, VOLUNTEERING OPPORTUNITIES, AND VOCATIONAL TRAINING IN TRADES RELATING TO THE CONSTRUCTION INDUSTRY INCLUDING LANDSCAPING, PAINTING AND DECORATING, SURVEYING, AND OTHER SUCH TRADES AS THE TRUSTEES SHALL DETERMINE FROM TIME TO TIME AS BEING RELATED TO THE CONSTRUCTION INDUSTRY.

name: MAROUN SEMAAN FACULTY OF ENGINEERING AND ARCHITECTURE TRUST
activities: The Charity carries out its charitable purposes by providing grants to charitable organisations in furtherance of its education objects and for the public benefit.
objects: TO ADVANCE EDUCATION, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY BY SUPPORTING THE ACTIVITIES OF THE FACULTY AT THE AMERICAN UNIVERSITY OF BEIRUT, OR THE SUCCESSOR TO THE AMERICAN UNIVERSITY OF BEIRUT PROVIDED ALWAYS AND ONLY INSOFAR AS THOSE ACTIVITIES ARE CHARITABLE IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE LAWS OF ENGLAND AND WALES.

name: H.O.M.E
activities: Starting a weekly food service to rough sleepers in Sheffield and the surrounding areas. Fundraising for our first H.O.M.E hub which will provide 24 hour services and facilities to rough sleepers.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CHARITY ARE TO RELIEVE POVERTY OF HOMELESS PEOPLE, THOSE AT RISK OF BECOMING HOMELESS OR THOSE IN INSECURE ACCOMMODATION BY PROVIDING FOOD, SHELTER, AND SERVICES, WITH A VIEW TO IMPROVING THEIR LIVELIHOODS.

name: SILLOTH ON SOLWAY SPORTS ASSOCIATION
activities: Sport and leisure activities.
objects: TO PROMOTE FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE INHABITANTS OF SILLOTH AND THE SURROUNDING AREA THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES FOR RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION OF INDIVIDUALS WHO HAVE NEED OF SUCH FACILITIES BY REASON OF THEIR YOUTH, AGE, INFIRMITY OR DISABLEMENT, FINANCIAL HARDSHIP OR SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC CIRCUMSTANCES OR FOR THE PUBLIC AT LARGE IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THE CONDITION OF LIFE OF THE SAID INHABITANTS.

name: THE WAYZ
activities: The Wayz is a safe place for young people to attend; catering for a wide variety of young people 8-25yr olds. Creating the opportunity to try new things they are  part of a journey  which is designed to develop each young person in regards to their own needs and aspirations. supports young people gain the confidence and understanding when dealing with current issues and challenges in their lives.
objects: TO HELP AND EDUCATE YOUNG PEOPLE THROUGH THEIR LEISURE-TIME ACTIVITIES SO TO DEVELOP THEIR PHYSICAL, MENTAL AND SPIRITUAL CAPACITIES THAT THEY MAY GROW TO FULL MATURITY AS INDIVIDUALS AND MEMBERS OF SOCIETY AND THAT THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE MAY BE IMPROVED.

name: EAST DEVON RIDING FOR THE DISABLED ASSOCIATION GROUP
activities: The core purpose of the group is  to benefit the health and well-being of people with disabilities in East Devon through the delivery of effective and life enhancing therapy, the opportunity to learn new skills and achieve personal goals and ambitions. It also provides the chance to enjoy taking part in a social activity with other people with disabilites and our volunteers.
objects: TO PROMOTE THE OBJECTS OF THE RIDING FOR THE DISABLED ASSOCIATION INCORPORATING CARRIAGE DRIVING A CHARITY REGISTERED UNDER CHARITY NUMBER 244108 ("THE ASSOCIATION") BY PROVIDING DISABLED PEOPLE WITH THE OPPORTUNITY TO RIDE AND/OR CARRIAGE DRIVE TO BENEFIT THEIR HEALTH AND WELL BEING IN THE EAST DEVON AREAA

name: HELPING HANDS OF LONDON
activities: Helping Hands of London is a homeless charity aiming to get bags of essentials to everyone sleeping rough within and around London. We also intend to help change attitudes towards homeless people to make them more positive.
objects: TO RELIEVE FINANCIAL OF THE HOMELESS IN LONDON BY PROVIDING BAGS OF ESSENTIAL ITEMS AND BY RAISING AWARENESS OF HOMELESSNESS IN LONDON.

name: BRIDLINGTON CHRISTIAN FELLOWSHIP
activities: Bridlington Christian Fellowship seeks to advance the Christian religion by encouraging people to know God's love in Christ and to show that love in word and action. This is achieved in a variety of ways including weekly worship services, Bible study and prayer, outreach and evangelism, social events, links with other churches and supporting mission.
objects: 3.1	THE PURPOSES OF THE CHURCH ARE: 3.1.1	 THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE CHRISTIAN FAITH IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE BASIS OF FAITH PRIMARILY BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY WITHIN BRIDLINGTON AND THE SURROUNDING NEIGHBOURHOOD; AND 3.1.2	 SUCH OTHER CHARITABLE PURPOSES AS SHALL, IN THE OPINION OF THE MEMBERS OF THE CHURCH IN GENERAL MEETING, PUT INTO PRACTICE THE CHRISTIAN FAITH IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE BASIS OF FAITH, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO: THE PREVENTION AND RELIEF OF NEED, HARDSHIP AND SICKNESS; THE ADVANCEMENTOF EDUCATION; AND THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION OF INDIVIDUALS WHO HAVE NEED OF SUCH FACILITIES BY REASON OF THEIR YOUTH, AGE INFIRMITY OR DISABILITY, FINANCIAL HARDSHIPOR SOCIAL CIRCUMSTANCES WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE PROVIDED THAT THE ADVANCEMENT OF SUCH PURPOSES MUST BE UNDERTAKEN IN A MANNER THAT IS CONSISTENT WITH THE DOCTRINAL DISTINCTIVES AND ETHICAL STATEMENTS AS MAY BE ADOPTED ANDAMENDED BY THE CHURCH FROM TIME TO TIME IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE PROVISIONS OF THE CHURCH HANDBOOK.

name: THE OLIVE TRUST
activities: Helping homeless
objects: THE RELIEF OF THOSE IN NEED, BY REASON OF YOUTH, AGE, ILL-HEALTH, DISABILITY, FINANCIAL HARDSHIP OR OTHER DISADVANTAGE.

name: STREET SCENES
activities: TO PROVIDE FACILITIES FOR RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION OF INDIVIDUALS WHO HAVE NEED OF SUCH FACILITIES BY REASON OF THEIR YOUTH, AGE, INFIRMITY OR DISABLEMENT, FINANCIAL HARDSHIP OR SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC CIRCUMSTANCES OR FOR THE PUBLIC ATLARGE IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE.
objects: TO PROVIDE FACILITIES FOR RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION OF INDIVIDUALS WHO HAVE NEED OF SUCH FACILITIES BY REASON OF THEIR YOUTH, AGE, INFIRMITY OR DISABLEMENT, FINANCIAL HARDSHIP OR SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC CIRCUMSTANCES OR FOR THE PUBLIC ATLARGE IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE.

name: FLEETWOOD TRUST
activities: Our Vision - Empower the community of Fleetwood to make positive change Our Values - INCLUDE - we will provide a space where everyone belongs, feels valued, respected and heard,CREATE - we will create opportunities for people to thrive and reach their full potential, CONNECT - we work with others to provide  safe , high quality programmes
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CHARITY, WHICH ARE FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT, ARE SPECIFICALLY RESTRICTED TO THE FOLLOWING: TO FURTHER OR BENEFIT THE RESIDENTS OF FLEETWOOD AND THE NEIGHBOURHOOD, WITHOUT DISTINCTION OF SEX, SEXUAL ORIENTATION, RACE OR OF POLITICAL, RELIGIOUS OR OTHER OPINIONS BY ASSOCIATING TOGETHER THE SAID RESIDENTS AND THE LOCAL AUTHORITIES, VOLUNTARY AND OTHER ORGANISATIONS IN A COMMON EFFORT TO ADVANCE EDUCATION AND TO PROVIDE FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION ANDLEISURE TIME OCCUPATION WITH THE OBJECTIVE OF IMPROVING THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE FOR THE RESIDENTS; THE PROVISION OF HOUSING ACCOMMODATION FOR POOR, DISABLED OR AGED PERSONS; TO PROMOTE THE EDUCATION OF PERSONS WHO HAVE NEED OF SUCH EDUCATION AS THE TRUSTEES SHALL DETERMINE; THE RELIEF OF SICKNESS AND THE PRESERVATION OF HEALTH AMONG PEOPLE RESIDING PERMANENTLY OR TEMPORARILY IN FLEETWOOD AND THE SURROUNDING AREA; ANY OTHER CHARITABLE PURPOSE WITHIN THE LAW IN ENGLAND AND WALES WHICH SHALL BE SELECTED BY THE TRUSTEES IN THEIR ABSOLUTE DISCRETION FROM TIME TO TIME.

name: CYLCH MEITHRIN TALHAIARN
activities: THE OBJECT[S] OF THE CIO IS TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF PRE-SCHOOL CHILDREN THROUGH THE MEDIUM OF THE WELSH LANGUAGE.
objects: THE OBJECT[S] OF THE CIO IS TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF PRE-SCHOOL CHILDREN THROUGH THE MEDIUM OF THE WELSH LANGUAGE.

name: THE UPTON YOUTH AND COMMUNITY PROJECT
activities: TO FURTHER OR BENEFIT THE RESIDENTS OF UPTON PRIORY AND THE SURROUNDING AREA, WITHOUT DISTINCTION OF SEX, SEXUAL ORIENTATION, RACE OR OF POLITICAL, RELIGIOUS OR OTHER OPINIONS BY ASSOCIATING TOGETHER THE SAID RESIDENTS AND THE LOCAL AUTHORITIES, VOLUNTARY AND OTHER ORGANISATIONS IN A COMMON EFFORT TO ADVANCE EDUCATION AND TO PROVIDE FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION AND LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION WITH THE OBJECTIVE OF IMPROVING THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE FOR THE RESIDENTS
objects: TO FURTHER OR BENEFIT THE RESIDENTS OF UPTON PRIORY AND THE SURROUNDING AREA, WITHOUT DISTINCTION OF SEX, SEXUAL ORIENTATION, RACE OR OF POLITICAL, RELIGIOUS OR OTHER OPINIONS BY ASSOCIATING TOGETHER THE SAID RESIDENTS AND THE LOCAL AUTHORITIES, VOLUNTARY AND OTHER ORGANISATIONS IN A COMMON EFFORT TO ADVANCE EDUCATION AND TO PROVIDE FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION AND LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION WITH THE OBJECTIVE OF IMPROVING THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE FOR THE RESIDENTS

name: BINGHAM U3A
activities: The U3A is a national organisation of which Bingham U3A is a an autonomous branch.  The U3a offers eductional and social opportunities to people in their third age ie retired or semi retired. We draw our members from Bingham and the surrounding villages.
objects: THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION AND, IN PARTICULAR, THE EDUCATION OF OLDER PEOPLE AND THOSE WHO ARE RETIRED FROM FULL TIME WORK, RESIDING IN BINGHAM AND ITS SURROUNDING AREA, BY ALL MEANS INCLUDING ACTIVITIES CONDUCIVE TO LEARNING AND PERSONAL DEVELOPMENT.

name: THE HOLLYTREE FOUNDATION
activities: THE OBJECTIVES OF THE CIO ARE:TO RELIEVE THE NEED OF PERSONS WITHIN THE UNITED KINGDOM WHO ARE CARING FOR PEOPLE WITH PHYSICAL, MENTAL OR SENSORY IMPAIRMENT WITHIN A MENTAL HEALTH UNIT/ HOSPITAL THROUGH PROVISION OF SMALL GRANTS TOWARDS THEIR TRAVEL AND ACCOMMODATION COSTS WHEN VISITING THEIR CHILDREN, AND ALSO GIVING SUPPORT VIA OUR 'LEND AN EAR' PHONE SERVICE AND PROVISION OF A SAFE PLACE.
objects: THE OBJECTIVES OF THE CIO ARE:    TO RELIEVE THE NEED OF PERSONS WITHIN THE UNITED KINGDOM WHO ARE CARING FOR PEOPLE WITH PHYSICAL, MENTAL OR SENSORY IMPAIRMENT WITHIN A MENTAL HEALTH UNIT/ HOSPITAL THROUGH PROVISION OF SMALL GRANTS TOWARDS THEIR TRAVEL AND ACCOMMODATION COSTS WHEN VISITING THEIR CHILDREN, AND ALSO GIVING SUPPORT VIA OUR 'LEND AN EAR' PHONE SERVICE AND PROVISION OF A SAFE PLACE.

name: NAVIGATE
activities: Navigate CIO provides specialist money and debt advice and financial education services to individuals and families facing financial hardship and exclusion by reason of youth, age, ill health, disability, financial hardship or another disadvantage in Somerset and Devon. Our services are predominately delivered through home visits but outreach and telephone appointments are also available.
objects: (1)	THE RELIEF OF POVERTY OR FINANCIAL HARDSHIP, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY BY PROVIDING A RANGE OF IMPARTIAL MONEY ADVICE AND SUPPORT SERVICES TO PEOPLE IN FINANCIAL HARDSHIP, INCLUDING THOSE WITH DEBT PROBLEMS AND THOSE ENCOUNTERING FUEL POVERTY OR FINANCIAL EXCLUSION, TO HELP THEM ACHIEVE GREATER FINANCIAL RESILIENCE AND CAPABILITY;  (2)	TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUBLIC IN ALL MATTERS RELATING TO THE MANAGEMENT OF PERSONAL FINANCES, WITH PARTICULAR EMPHASIS ON ISSUES RELATING TO FINANCIAL EXCLUSION AND BUILDING INDIVIDUAL FINANCIAL RESILIENCE AND CAPABILITY; AND  (3)	TO PROMOTE SOCIAL INCLUSION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY PREVENTING PEOPLE FROM BECOMING SOCIALLY EXCLUDED, RELIEVING THE NEEDS OF THOSE PEOPLE WHO ARE SOCIALLY EXCLUDED AND ASSISTING THEM TO INTEGRATE INTO SOCIETY.  FOR THE PURPOSE OF THIS CLAUSE 'SOCIALLY EXCLUDED' MEANS BEING EXCLUDED FROM SOCIETY, OR PARTS OF SOCIETY, AS A RESULT OF ONE OF MORE OF THE FOLLOWING FACTORS: UNEMPLOYMENT; FINANCIAL HARDSHIP; YOUTHOR OLD AGE; ILL HEALTH (PHYSICAL OR MENTAL); SUBSTANCE ABUSE OR DEPENDENCY INCLUDING ALCOHOL AND DRUGS; DISCRIMINATION ON THE GROUNDS OF SEX, RACE, DISABILITY, ETHNIC ORIGIN, RELIGION, BELIEF, CREED, SEXUAL ORIENTATION OR GENDER RE-ASSIGNMENT; POOR EDUCATIONAL OR SKILLS ATTAINMENT; RELATIONSHIP AND FAMILY BREAKDOWN; POOR HOUSING (THAT IS HOUSING THAT DOES NOT MEET BASIC HABITABLE STANDARDS; CRIME (EITHER AS A VICTIM OF CRIME OR AS AN OFFENDER REHABILITATING INTO SOCIETY).

name: TREUDDYN UNDER 5'S
activities: The playgroup sessions provide activities that encourage the development of children's social, physical, language, creative and emotional skills. We welcome children of all cultures and abilities to come and enjoy the  learning opportunities provided by the playgroup.
objects: THE OBJECT OF THE CIO IS TO ENHANCE THE DEVELOPMENT AND EDUCATION OF CHILDREN IN WALES, FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT, BY ENCOURAGING PARENTS TO UNDERSTAND AND PROVIDE FOR THEIR NEEDS THROUGH HIGH QUALITY CHILDCARE PROVISION.

name: YOUR CHURCH INTERNATIONAL GLOBAL MOVEMENT
activities: To advance the Christian religion for the public benefit through the holding of prayer meetings, lectures, and distributing literature on Christian religion to enlighten others about the Christian religion. The relief of poverty/financial hardship either generally or individually of people living locally or internationally, by making grants of money for providing or paying for items, services .
objects: THE CHARITY'S OBJECTS ARE  1. TO ADVANCE THE CHRISTIAN RELIGION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT THROUGH THE HOLDING OF PRAYER MEETINGS, LECTURES, PRODUCING AND DISTRIBUTING LITERATURE ON CHRISTIAN RELIGION TO ENLIGHTEN OTHERS ABOUT THE CHRISTIAN RELIGION  2. THE RELIEF OF POVERTY/FINANCIAL HARDSHIP EITHER GENERALLY OR INDIVIDUALLY OF PEOPLE LIVING LOCALLY OR INTERNATIONALLY BY MAKING GRANTS OF MONEY FOR PROVIDING OR PAYING FOR ITEMS, SERVICES OR FACILITIES

name: DONCASTER WENT VALLEY LIONS CLUB (CIO)
activities: Raising & dispersing funds for individuals in need, associations & local sports Clubs. Annually we have a Christmas Santa Sleigh which tours the local area to raise funds. We also hold Easter egg raffles.
objects: 1.1	THE OBJECTS OF THE CLUB ARE SUCH PURPOSES AS ARE EXCLUSIVELY CHARITABLE IN ENGLAND & WALES, INCLUDING IN PARTICULAR:    1.1.1	THE ADVANCEMENT OF CITIZENSHIP BY:    1.1.1.1	PROMOTING THE PRINCIPLES OF GOOD CITIZENSHIP;    1.1.1.2	ENCOURAGING MEMBERS TO TAKE AN ACTIVE INTEREST IN THE CIVIC, CULTURAL, SOCIAL AND MORAL WELFARE OF THE COMMUNITY;    1.1.1.3	PROVIDING A FORUM FOR THE OPEN DISCUSSION OF ALL MATTERS OF PUBLIC INTEREST; PROVIDED THAT PARTISAN POLITICS AND SECTARIAN RELIGION SHALL NOT BEDEBATED BY MEMBERS;    1.1.1.4	ENCOURAGING SERVICE-MINDED PEOPLE TO SERVE THEIR COMMUNITY WITHOUT PERSONAL REWARD AND ENCOURAGING THE PROMOTION OF HIGH ETHICAL STANDARDS IN COMMERCE, INDUSTRY, PROFESSIONS, PUBLIC WORKS AND PRIVATE ENDEAVOURS;    1.1.1.5	SUPPORTING YOUTH TO DEVELOP THEIR SKILLS, CAPACITIES AND CAPABILITIES TO ENABLE THEM TO PARTICIPATE IN SOCIETY AS MATURE AND RESPONSIBLE INDIVIDUALS;    1.1.2	PROMOTING THE VOLUNTARY SECTOR FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY ASSOCIATING WITH LOCAL AUTHORITIES IN A COMMON EFFORT TO ADVANCE EDUCATION AND PROVIDE FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION TO IMPROVE THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE OF PEOPLE IN LOCAL, NATIONAL AND INTERNATIONAL COMMUNITIES;    1.1.3	PROMOTING VOLUNTEERING;    1.1.4	THE RELIEF OF POVERTY AND THE RELIEF OF THOSE IN NEED IN PARTICULAR BY PROVIDING HUMANITARIAN AID AND DISASTER RELIEF;    1.1.5	THE ADVANCEMENT OF HEALTH OR THE SAVING OF LIVES BY PREVENTING AVOIDABLE BLINDNESS, ASSISTING DISABLED PEOPLE TO LEAD INDEPENDENT LIVES OR HELPING TO PREVENT OR MANAGE HEALTH ISSUES;    1.1.6	PROMOTING FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC THE CONSERVATION PROTECTION AND IMPROVEMENT OF THE PHYSICAL AND NATURAL ENVIRONMENT; AND/OR    1.1.7	PROMOTING COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION IN HEALTHY RECREATION.

name: BE EMPOWERED FARM FUTURES
activities: For the public benefit, to set out to purposefully fill gaps delivered by other organisations to perceived unemployable and/or disabled people by offering and/or providing assistance to find employment. To enable and match low skilled people to meaningful activities and responsibilities which allow their individual growth in line with their individual capability to enable them to escape exclusion
objects: TO PROMOTE SOCIAL INCLUSION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY PREVENTING PEOPLE FROM BECOMING SOCIALLY EXCLUDED, RELIEVING THE NEEDS OF THOSE PEOPLE WHO ARE SOCIALLY EXCLUDED AND ASSISTING THEM TO INTEGRATE INTO SOCIETY BY PROVIDING THERAPEUTIC GARDENING ACTIVITIES WITHIN A COMMUNITY GARDEN.  FOR THE PURPOSE OF THIS CLAUSE 'SOCIALLY EXCLUDED' MEANS BEING EXCLUDED FROM SOCIETY, OR PARTS OF SOCIETY, AS A RESULT OF ONE OF MORE OF THE FOLLOWING FACTORS: UNEMPLOYMENT; FINANCIAL HARDSHIP; YOUTH OR OLD AGE; ILLHEALTH (PHYSICAL OR MENTAL); SUBSTANCE ABUSE OR DEPENDENCY INCLUDING ALCOHOL AND DRUGS; DISCRIMINATION ON THE GROUNDS OF SEX, RACE, DISABILITY, ETHNIC ORIGIN, RELIGION, BELIEF, CREED, SEXUAL ORIENTATION OR GENDER RE-ASSIGNMENT; POOR EDUCATIONAL OR SKILLS ATTAINMENT; RELATIONSHIP AND FAMILY BREAKDOWN; POOR HOUSING (THAT IS HOUSING THAT DOES NOT MEET BASIC HABITABLE STANDARDS; CRIME (EITHER AS A VICTIM OF CRIME OR AS AN OFFENDER REHABILITATING INTO SOCIETY).

name: DARCIE'S WISH
activities: THE CHARITY'S OBJECTS ('THE OBJECTS') ARE:  TO RELIEVE NEEDS OF FAMILIES THAT HAVE EXPERIENCED STILL BIRTHS OR THE DEATH OF YOUNG BABIES BY:-  A)PROVIDING SUPPORT, ADVICE AND RESOURCES TO FAMILIES THAT HAVE EXPERIENCED STILL-BIRTHS OR THE DEATH OF YOUNG BABIES;  B)PROVIDING SPECIALLY MADE BURIAL GOWNS AND OTHER CLOTHING FOR BABIES THAT ARE SMALLER THAN CONVENTIONAL CLOTHING DUE TO NOT HAVING GONE FULL-TERM;  C)FUNDRAISING TO DEVELOP IMPROVED FACILITIES FOR BEREAVED PARENTS AND FOR THE BREAKING OFTHIS SAD NEWS AT OUR LOCAL HOSPITAL;  D)AWARENESS RAISING AND EDUCATION THROUGH THE PURCHASE AND DISTRIBUTION OF BOOKS AND VIDEOS ON THE TOPIC OF EARLY DEATH OR STILL-BIRTH;  E)PROVIDING FUNDING AND EQUIPMENT TO THE LOCAL HOSPITAL RELATING TO THE EMERGENCY CARE OF EARLY AND PREMATURE BIRTHS.  [NOTHING IN THIS CONSTITUTION SHALL AUTHORISE AN APPLICATION OF THE PROPERTY OF THE CHARITY FOR PURPOSES WHICH ARE NOT CHARITABLE IN ACCORDANCE WITH SECTION 7 OF THE CHARITIES AND TRUSTEE INVESTMENT (SCOTLAND) ACT 2005 AND/OR SECTION 2 OF THE CHARITIES ACT (NORTHERN IRELAND) 2008.].
objects: THE CHARITY'S OBJECTS ('THE OBJECTS') ARE:  TO RELIEVE NEEDS OF FAMILIES THAT HAVE EXPERIENCED STILL BIRTHS OR THE DEATH OF YOUNG BABIES BY:-  A)PROVIDING SUPPORT, ADVICE AND RESOURCES TO FAMILIES THAT HAVE EXPERIENCED STILL-BIRTHS OR THE DEATH OF YOUNG BABIES;  B)PROVIDING SPECIALLY MADE BURIAL GOWNS AND OTHER CLOTHING FOR BABIES THAT ARE SMALLER THAN CONVENTIONAL CLOTHING DUE TO NOT HAVING GONE FULL-TERM;  C)FUNDRAISING TO DEVELOP IMPROVED FACILITIES FOR BEREAVED PARENTS AND FOR THE BREAKING OFTHIS SAD NEWS AT OUR LOCAL HOSPITAL;  D)AWARENESS RAISING AND EDUCATION THROUGH THE PURCHASE AND DISTRIBUTION OF BOOKS AND VIDEOS ON THE TOPIC OF EARLY DEATH OR STILL-BIRTH;  E)PROVIDING FUNDING AND EQUIPMENT TO THE LOCAL HOSPITAL RELATING TO THE EMERGENCY CARE OF EARLY AND PREMATURE BIRTHS.  [NOTHING IN THIS CONSTITUTION SHALL AUTHORISE AN APPLICATION OF THE PROPERTY OF THE CHARITY FOR PURPOSES WHICH ARE NOT CHARITABLE IN ACCORDANCE WITH SECTION 7 OF THE CHARITIES AND TRUSTEE INVESTMENT (SCOTLAND) ACT 2005 AND/OR SECTION 2 OF THE CHARITIES ACT (NORTHERN IRELAND) 2008.].

name: AFRIDI BROTHERS SOCIETY
activities: To set up a centre of excellence in Pakistan.  The very first institution of its kind where patients will be diagnosed, treated and monitored depending on the severity of the illness. At first, we will be looking to partner with other organisations (either government or private hospitals) with a view to using their facilities on a rental basis or free of charge.
objects: THE OBJECT OF THE CIO IS:    1) TO RELIEVE SICKNESS AND PRESERVE AND PROTECT PHYSICAL AND MENTAL HEALTH AMONG SUFFERERS OF DUCHENNE MUSCULAR DYSTROPHY (DMD) IN PAKISTAN AND SUCH OTHER PARTS OF THE WORLD AS THE TRUSTEES SHALL DETERMINE IN PARTICULAR BY:    A) PROVIDING FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE, SPECIALIST EQUIPMENT, ADVICE AND SUPPORT TO SUFFERERS AND THEIR FAMILIES/CARERS.    B) FUNDING RESEARCH INTO ALL AREAS RELATING TO DMD IN ORDER TO FIND A CURE.    2) ADVANCING THE EDUCATION OF THE PUBLICIN ALL AREAS RELATING TO DMD.

name: The Mark Chambers Foundation CIO
activities: THE RELIEF OR PREVENTION OF POVERTY, THE RELIEF OF NEED AND THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION FOR PEOPLE IN GHANA AND THE SURROUNDING AREA IN SUCH WAYS AS THE TRUSTEES SHALL THINK FIT.
objects: THE RELIEF OR PREVENTION OF POVERTY, THE RELIEF OF NEED AND THE ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION FOR PEOPLE IN GHANA AND THE SURROUNDING AREA IN SUCH WAYS AS THE TRUSTEES SHALL THINK FIT.

name: FORGET ME NOT MUSICIANS
activities: 1. TO PRESERVE AND PROTECT GOOD HEALTH AND WELL-BEING OF ELDERLY PEOPLE, IN PARTICULAR BY THE PROVISION OF MUSIC RELATED ACTIVITIES DESIGNED TO HELP PEOPLE WITH ALZHEIMER'S AND DEMENTIA.  2.TO PROMOTE SOCIAL INCLUSION AMONG PEOPLE DIAGNOSED WITH DEMENTIA WHO ARE SOCIALLY EXCLUDED FROM SOCIETY, OR PARTS OF SOCIETY, AS A RESULT OF THEIR DEMENTIA THROUGH THE DEVELOPMENT AND DELIVERY OF MUSIC BASED ACTIVITIES AT CARE HOMES.

name: FULFILLING FUTURES
activities: To further develop long term educational prospects for the communities of St John Leonard's School and Archbishop Kiwanuka School, both situated in the Mpigi District, Western Uganda. Primarily this will be through supporting pupils that come from severely disadvantaged backgrounds to attend both primary and secondary school and by supporting community based projects.
objects: THE PREVENTION OR RELIEF OF POVERTY IN THE MPIGI DISTRICT, WESTERN UGANDA, INCLUDING BY PROVIDING: GRANTS, ITEMS AND SERVICES TO ST JOHN LEONARD'S SCHOOL AND ARCHBISHOP KIWANUKA SCHOOL WITH A VIEW TO IMPROVING THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE FOR THE PUPILS OF SUCH SCHOOLS.

name: STEVENAGE COREY'S MILL LIONS CLUB (CIO)
activities: Relief of poverty and relief of of those in need within the Stevenage area. Supporting our National and International organisations.  Promoting Volunteering by encouraging the support of Lions fund raising and community service activities.  Advancing health of the community with he provision of Message in a Bottle, and Message in a Wallet. Supporting Scouts, Sea Cadets, and school activities.
objects: 1.1	THE OBJECTS OF THE CLUB ARE SUCH PURPOSES AS ARE EXCLUSIVELY CHARITABLE IN ENGLAND & WALES, INCLUDING IN PARTICULAR:    1.1.1	THE ADVANCEMENT OF CITIZENSHIP BY:    1.1.1.1	PROMOTING THE PRINCIPLES OF GOOD CITIZENSHIP;    1.1.1.2	ENCOURAGING MEMBERS TO TAKE AN ACTIVE INTEREST IN THE CIVIC, CULTURAL, SOCIAL AND MORAL WELFARE OF THE COMMUNITY;    1.1.1.3	PROVIDING A FORUM FOR THE OPEN DISCUSSION OF ALL MATTERS OF PUBLIC INTEREST; PROVIDED THAT PARTISAN POLITICS AND SECTARIAN RELIGION SHALL NOT BEDEBATED BY MEMBERS;    1.1.1.4	ENCOURAGING SERVICE-MINDED PEOPLE TO SERVE THEIR COMMUNITY WITHOUT PERSONAL REWARD AND ENCOURAGING THE PROMOTION OF HIGH ETHICAL STANDARDS IN COMMERCE, INDUSTRY, PROFESSIONS, PUBLIC WORKS AND PRIVATE ENDEAVOURS;    1.1.1.5	SUPPORTING YOUTH TO DEVELOP THEIR SKILLS, CAPACITIES AND CAPABILITIES TO ENABLE THEM TO PARTICIPATE IN SOCIETY AS MATURE AND RESPONSIBLE INDIVIDUALS;    1.1.2	PROMOTING THE VOLUNTARY SECTOR FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY ASSOCIATING WITH LOCAL AUTHORITIES IN A COMMON EFFORT TO ADVANCE EDUCATION AND PROVIDE FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION TO IMPROVE THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE OF PEOPLE IN LOCAL, NATIONAL AND INTERNATIONAL COMMUNITIES;    1.1.3	PROMOTING VOLUNTEERING;    1.1.4	THE RELIEF OF POVERTY AND THE RELIEF OF THOSE IN NEED IN PARTICULAR BY PROVIDING HUMANITARIAN AID AND DISASTER RELIEF;    1.1.5	THE ADVANCEMENT OF HEALTH OR THE SAVING OF LIVES BY PREVENTING AVOIDABLE BLINDNESS, ASSISTING DISABLED PEOPLE TO LEAD INDEPENDENT LIVES OR HELPING TO PREVENT OR MANAGE HEALTH ISSUES;    1.1.6	PROMOTING FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC THE CONSERVATION PROTECTION AND IMPROVEMENT OF THE PHYSICAL AND NATURAL ENVIRONMENT; AND/OR    1.1.7	PROMOTING COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION IN HEALTHY RECREATION.

name: WESTBOURNE COMMUNITY CIO
activities: Hire of community hall to clubs and classes
objects: TO FURTHER OR BENEFIT THE RESIDENTS OF THE PARISH OF WESTBOURNE, WITHOUT DISTINCTION OF SEX, SEXUAL ORIENTATION, RACE OR OF POLITICAL, RELIGIOUS OR OTHER OPINIONS BY ASSOCIATING TOGETHER THE SAID RESIDENTS AND THE LOCAL AUTHORITIES, VOLUNTARY AND OTHER ORGANISATIONS IN A COMMON EFFORT TO ADVANCE EDUCATION AND TO PROVIDE FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION AND LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION WITH THE OBJECTIVE OF IMPROVING THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE FOR THE RESIDENTS.

name: SOUTH LIVERPOOL CRICKET FOUNDATION
activities: Promotion of community participation in healthy recreation in Liverpool & surrounding areas by the provision of facilities for playing Cricket, volleyball, badminton and other active sports capable of physical health and fitness.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO ARE:    1) THE PROMOTION OF COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION IN HEALTHY RECREATION IN LIVERPOOL AND THE SURROUNDING AREA BY THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES FOR PLAYING CRICKET, VOLLEYBALL, FOOTBALL, BADMINTON AND SUCH OTHER SPORTS CAPABLE OF IMPROVING PHYSICAL HEALTH AND FITNESS.    2) TO FURTHER OR BENEFIT THE RESIDENTS OF LIVERPOOL, AND IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY RESIDENTS OF SRI LANKAN ORIGIN/DESCENT, BY ADVANCING EDUCATION AND PROVIDING FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIALWELFARE FOR RECREATION AND LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION WITH THE OBJECTIVE OF IMPROVING THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE FOR THE RESIDENTS.

name: KEREN MENACHEM & KEREN CHANA
activities: THE OBJECT OF THE CIO SHALL BE 1.	TO ADVANCE THE ORTHODOX JEWISH FAITH IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY BY ASSISTING YOUNG PEOPLE IN ATTENDING AN ORTHODOX JEWISH EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION BY THE PROVISION OF SCHOLARSHIPS, BURSARIES AND WELFARE GRANTS OR BY PAYING FOR ITEMS, SERVICES OR FACILITIES FOR SUCH PURPOSES. 2.	THE PREVENTION OR RELIEF OF POVERTY OR FINANCIAL HARDSHIP OF YOUNG PEOPLE BY MAKING GRANTS TOWARDS THE COSTS OF THE PROVISION OF EDUCATION, TRAINING AND OTHER NECESSARY SUPPORT DESIGNED TO ENABLE SUCH INDIVIDUALS TO GENERATE A SUSTAINABLE INCOME AND BE SELF-SUFFICIENT 3.	THE RELIEF OF FINANCIAL HARDSHIP, EITHER GENERALLY OR INDIVIDUALLY, OF PEOPLE LIVING ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD BY MAKING GRANTS OF MONEY FOR PROVIDING OR PAYING FORITEMS SERVICES OR FACILITIES 4.	TO ADVANCE IN LIFE AND RELIEVE NEEDS OF YOUNG PEOPLE BY PROVIDING SUPPORT AND ACTIVITIES WHICH DEVELOP THEIR SKILLS, CAPACITIES AND CAPABILITIES TO ENABLE THEM TO PARTICIPATE IN SOCIETY AS MATURE AND RESPONSIBLE INDIVIDUALS

name: HAZRAT HAMZA MASJID TRUST
activities: 1. TO ADVANCE THE RELIGION OF ISLAM FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC THROUGH THE HOLDING OF PRAYER MEETINGS, LECTURES, PUBLIC CELEBRATION OF RELIGIOUS FESTIVALS, THE PROVISION AND MAINTENANCE OF PLACES OF PUBLIC RELIGIOUS WORSHIP BY PERSONS PROFESSING THE RELIGION OF ISLAM, THE PROVISION AND MAINTENANCE OF RELIGIOUS AND EDUCATIONAL CENTRES AND OTHER PLACES OF STUDY, THE MAINTENANCE OF CEMETERIES AND BURIAL PLACES FOR THE BURIAL IN ACCORDANCE WITH ISLAMIC RITES OF PERSONS PROFESSING THE RELIGION OF ISLAM, PRODUCING AND/OR DISTRIBUTING LITERATURE ON ISLAMIC BELIEF AND PRACTICE TO HELP ENLIGHTEN OTHERS ABOUT THE RELIGION OF ISLAM.    2. TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF ADULTS, WOMEN AND CHILDREN RESIDING IN THE LOCALITIES AROUND AND IN THE VICINITY OF DERBY IN PARTICULAR AND OF ENGLAND & WALES IN GENERAL INCLUDING ENGLISH LANGUAGE COURSES AND SUPPLEMENTARY EDUCATION IN NATIONAL CURRICULUM SUBJECTS.    3. TO PRESERVE AND PROTECT HEALTH AND RELIEVE SICKNESS AND INFIRMINTY FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT AND IN PARTICULAR BUT WITHOUT LIMITATION THROUGH THE DISSEMINATION OF INFORMATION TO PROMOTE PHYSICAL AND MENTAL HEALTH.    4. TO RELIEVE POVERTY BY THE PROVISION OF GRANTS, ITEMS AND SERVICES TO INDIVIDUALS IN NEED AND/OR CHARITIES WORDING TO PREVENT OF RELIEVE POVERTY
objects: 1. TO ADVANCE THE RELIGION OF ISLAM FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC THROUGH THE HOLDING OF PRAYER MEETINGS, LECTURES, PUBLIC CELEBRATION OF RELIGIOUS FESTIVALS, THE PROVISION AND MAINTENANCE OF PLACES OF PUBLIC RELIGIOUS WORSHIP BY PERSONS PROFESSING THE RELIGION OF ISLAM, THE PROVISION AND MAINTENANCE OF RELIGIOUS AND EDUCATIONAL CENTRES AND OTHER PLACES OF STUDY, THE MAINTENANCE OF CEMETERIES AND BURIAL PLACES FOR THE BURIAL IN ACCORDANCE WITH ISLAMIC RITES OF PERSONS PROFESSING THE RELIGION OF ISLAM, PRODUCING AND/OR DISTRIBUTING LITERATURE ON ISLAMIC BELIEF AND PRACTICE TO HELP ENLIGHTEN OTHERS ABOUT THE RELIGION OF ISLAM.    2. TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF ADULTS, WOMEN AND CHILDREN RESIDING IN THE LOCALITIES AROUND AND IN THE VICINITY OF DERBY IN PARTICULAR AND OF ENGLAND & WALES IN GENERAL INCLUDING ENGLISH LANGUAGE COURSES AND SUPPLEMENTARY EDUCATION IN NATIONAL CURRICULUM SUBJECTS.    3. TO PRESERVE AND PROTECT HEALTH AND RELIEVE SICKNESS AND INFIRMINTY FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT AND IN PARTICULAR BUT WITHOUT LIMITATION THROUGH THE DISSEMINATION OF INFORMATION TO PROMOTE PHYSICAL AND MENTAL HEALTH.    4. TO RELIEVE POVERTY BY THE PROVISION OF GRANTS, ITEMS AND SERVICES TO INDIVIDUALS IN NEED AND/OR CHARITIES WORDING TO PREVENT OF RELIEVE POVERTY

name: BRISTOL INCLUSIVE THRILL SEEKERS
activities: THE OBJECT OF THE CIO IS TO RELIEVE THE NEEDS OF YOUNG PEOPLE, AND IN PARTICULAR, BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY, THOSE WITH A PHYSICAL OR MENTAL DISABILITY IN BRISTOL BY USING ADVENTURE SPORTS, INCLUDING ROCK CLIMBING, AS A PLATFORM TO INCREASE WELL-BEING, CONFIDENCE, AND SELF-ESTEEM.
objects: THE OBJECT OF THE CIO IS TO RELIEVE THE NEEDS OF YOUNG PEOPLE, AND IN PARTICULAR, BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY, THOSE WITH A PHYSICAL OR MENTAL DISABILITY IN BRISTOL BY USING ADVENTURE SPORTS, INCLUDING ROCK CLIMBING, AS A PLATFORM TO INCREASE WELL-BEING, CONFIDENCE, AND SELF-ESTEEM.

name: ST PETER'S CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE'S ACTIVITIES GROUP
activities: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO ARE  TO HELP YOUNG PEOPLE, ESPECIALLY BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY THROUGH LEISURE TIME  ACTIVITIES, SO AS TO DEVELOP THEIR CAPABILITIES THAT THEY MAY GROW TO FULL  MATURITY AS INDIVIDUALS AND MEMBERS OF SOCIETY IN ST PETER'S WARD IN THELONDON BOROUGH OF ISLINGTON BY ARRANGING HOLIDAY ACTIVITY SCHEMES DURING  THE SCHOOL HOLIDAYS.  NOTHING IN THIS CONSTITUTION SHALL AUTHORISE AN APPLICATION OF THE PROPERTY OF  THE CIO FOR THE PURPOSES WHICH ARE NOT CHARITABLE IN ACCORDANCE WITH  [SECTION 7 OF THE CHARITIES AND TRUSTEE INVESTMENT (SCOTLAND) ACT 2005]  AND [SECTION 2 OF THE CHARITIES ACT (NORTHERN IRELAND) 2008]
