name: MOUNT HAWKE YOUTH AND COMMUNITY GROUP
activities: To promote for the benefit of the inhabitants of Cornwall and the surrounding area, the provision of facilities for recreation or other leisure time occupation, in particular but not exclusively, skateboarding , and bmx biking for individuals who have need of such facilities by reason of their youth, age or social and economic circumstances or for the public at large.
objects: TO PROMOTE FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE INHABITANTS OF CORNWALL AND THE SURROUNDING AREA, THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES FOR RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY, SKATEBOARDING, AND BMX BIKING FOR INDIVIDUALS WHO HAVE NEED OF SUCH FACILITIES BY REASON OF THEIR YOUTH, AGE OR SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC CIRCUMSTANCES OR FOR THE PUBLIC AT LARGE IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THE CONDITION OF LIFE OF THE SAID INHABITANTS.

name: EPRA CHARITABLE TRUST
activities: THE OBJECTS ARE TO FUND ANY EXCLUSIVELY CHARITABLE PURPOSE ACCORDING TO THE LAW OF ENGLAND AND WALES FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT THAT THE TRUSTEES MAY FROM TIME TO TIME IN THEIR ABSOLUTE DISCRETION DETERMINE.
objects: THE OBJECTS ARE TO FUND ANY EXCLUSIVELY CHARITABLE PURPOSE ACCORDING TO THE LAW OF ENGLAND AND WALES FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT THAT THE TRUSTEES MAY FROM TIME TO TIME IN THEIR ABSOLUTE DISCRETION DETERMINE.

name: CYLCH CYFANSAWDD GRANGETOWN A'R BAE
activities: We are a Welsh language medium childcare provider. We are registered to provide full day care. For children aged 2 and above. We are located at Ysgol Hamadryad, Ffordd Hamadryad, Caerdydd. CF10 5UY
objects: A) TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF PRE-SCHOOL CHILDREN, BY PROVIDING SAFE AND SATISFYING PLAY AND ACTIVITIES TOGETHER WITH THEIR PARENTS/CARERS WHERE NECESSARY, THROUGH THE MEDIUM OF WELSH IN GRANGETOWN AND THE BAY, CARDIFF.  B) TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF PARENTS/CARERS OF THOSE CHILDREN AND TO ASSIST IN THE PROVISION OF EDUCATION IN GOOD PARENTING SKILLS TO PROTECT AND PRESERVE THE GOOD MENTAL, PHYSICAL AND EMOTIONAL HEALTH OF PARENTS AND CHILDREN.

name: SUTTON BINGHAM SAILING CLUB
activities: Sutton Bingham Sailing Club enables adults and children to undertake dinghy sailing at Sutton Bingham reservoir. The Club is accredited by the RYA, the national body for all forms of sailing, and is an RYA accredited Training Centre. Facilities are provided for adult and youth sailing. The Club is particularly keen to encourage young people to experience the sport of sailing in a safe environment.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CLUB ARE TO PROMOTE AND FACILITATE COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION IN HEALTHY RECREATION BY PROVIDING FACILITIES FOR SAILING, AND IN PARTICULAR DINGHY SAILING, PRIMARILY (THOUGH NOT EXCLUSIVELY), TO THOSE RESIDENT IN YEOVIL AND THE SURROUNDING AREA.

name: HOLT UNDER FIVES
activities: As a childcare facility and operate in the small village of Holt, Wrexham.  We operate from our premises which is attached to Holt Community Primary School.  As a childcare facility we work closely with the school to prepare our children for the next stage of education.  We look after and provide education support to children between the ages of 2 and 5.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO IS TO ENHANCE THE DEVELOPMENT AND EDUCATION OF CHILDREN IN WALES, FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT, BY ENCOURAGING PARENTS TO UNDERSTAND AND PROVIDE FOR THEIR NEEDS THROUGH HIGH QUALITY CHILDCARE PROVISION.

name: HOLT UNDER FIVES
activities: As a childcare facility and operate in the small village of Holt, Wrexham.  We operate from our premises which is attached to Holt Community Primary School.  As a childcare facility we work closely with the school to prepare our children for the next stage of education.  We look after and provide education support to children between the ages of 2 and 5.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO IS TO ENHANCE THE DEVELOPMENT AND EDUCATION OF CHILDREN IN WALES, FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT, BY ENCOURAGING PARENTS TO UNDERSTAND AND PROVIDE FOR THEIR NEEDS THROUGH HIGH QUALITY CHILDCARE PROVISION.

name: BURNTWOOD LIONS CLUB (CIO)
activities: providing help for our local community
objects: 1.1 THE OBJECTS OF THE CLUB ARE SUCH PURPOSES AS ARE EXCLUSIVELY CHARITABLE IN ENGLAND & WALES, INCLUDING IN PARTICULAR:  1.1.1 THE ADVANCEMENT OF CITIZENSHIP BY:  1.1.1.1	PROMOTING THE PRINCIPLES OF GOOD CITIZENSHIP;  1.1.1.2	ENCOURAGING MEMBERS TO TAKE AN ACTIVE INTEREST IN THE CIVIC, CULTURAL, SOCIAL AND MORAL WELFARE OF THE COMMUNITY;  1.1.1.3	PROVIDING A FORUM FOR THE OPEN DISCUSSION OF ALL MATTERS OF PUBLIC INTEREST; PROVIDED THAT PARTISAN POLITICS AND SECTARIAN RELIGION SHALL NOT BE DEBATEDBY MEMBERS;  1.1.1.4	ENCOURAGING SERVICE-MINDED PEOPLE TO SERVE THEIR COMMUNITY WITHOUT PERSONAL REWARD AND ENCOURAGING THE PROMOTION OF HIGH ETHICAL STANDARDS IN COMMERCE, INDUSTRY, PROFESSIONS, PUBLIC WORKS AND PRIVATE ENDEAVOURS;  1.1.1.5	SUPPORTING YOUTH TO DEVELOP THEIR SKILLS, CAPACITIES AND CAPABILITIES TO ENABLE THEM TO PARTICIPATE IN SOCIETY AS MATURE AND RESPONSIBLE INDIVIDUALS;  1.1.2 PROMOTING THE VOLUNTARY SECTOR FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY ASSOCIATING WITH LOCAL AUTHORITIES IN A COMMON EFFORT TO ADVANCE EDUCATION AND PROVIDE FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION TO IMPROVE THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE OF PEOPLE IN LOCAL, NATIONAL AND INTERNATIONAL COMMUNITIES;  1.1.3 PROMOTING VOLUNTEERING;  1.1.4 THE RELIEF OF POVERTY AND THE RELIEF OF THOSE IN NEED IN PARTICULAR BY PROVIDING HUMANITARIAN AID AND DISASTER RELIEF;  1.1.5 THE ADVANCEMENT OF HEALTH OR THE SAVING OF LIVES BY PREVENTING AVOIDABLE BLINDNESS, ASSISTING DISABLED PEOPLE TO LEAD INDEPENDENT LIVES OR HELPING TO PREVENT OR MANAGE HEALTH ISSUES;  1.1.6 PROMOTING FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC THE CONSERVATION PROTECTION AND IMPROVEMENT OF THE PHYSICAL AND NATURAL ENVIRONMENT; AND/OR  1.1.7 PROMOTING COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION IN HEALTHY RECREATION.

name: NOORIE MISSION
activities: What Education/training  The Advancement Of Health Or Saving Of Lives  Disability  The Prevention Or Relief Of Poverty  Who Children/young People  Elderly/old People  People With Disabilities  Other Charities Or Voluntary Bodies  How Provides Services
objects: TO RELIEVE POVERTY AND SICKNESS, TO PRESERVE AND PROTECT GOOD HEALTH AND TO ADVANCE EDUCATION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY SUCH MEANS AS THE TRUSTEES MAY IN THEIR ABSOLUTE DISCRETION THINK FIT.

name: INTO OPERA
activities: To advance education in, and to promote and increase the enjoyment and appreciation of, opera and the arts (including music, drama, dance, design, film, the written word) for public benefit. Through so doing, the CIO aims to improve the accessibility of opera as an art form, nationally and internationally, seeking to get more people into opera as audience members and/or participants.
objects: TO ADVANCE EDUCATION IN, AND TO PROMOTE AND INCREASE THE ENJOYMENT AND APPRECIATION OF, OPERA AND THE ARTS (INCLUDING MUSIC, DRAMA, DANCE, DESIGN, FILM, THE WRITTEN WORD) FOR PUBLIC BENEFIT. THROUGH SO DOING, THE CIO AIMS TO IMPROVE THE ACCESSIBILITY OF OPERA AS AN ART FORM, NATIONALLY AND INTERNATIONALLY, SEEKING TO GET MORE PEOPLE INTO OPERA AS AUDIENCE MEMBERS AND/OR PARTICIPANTS.

name: HOPE HOUSE (CHESTERFIELD)
activities: We are a charity with a Christian ethos aiming to eliminate homelessness in the Chesterfield and NE Derbyshire area by providing accommodation, support and training for vulnerable men who are homeless or at risk of homelessness and helping them move into their own homes with ongoing support from the charity. We also provide support and advocacy to help homeless individuals access services.
objects: TO RELIEVE POVERTY AMONG THE HOMELESS AND THOSE AT RISK OF HOMELESSNESS IN CHESTERFIELD AND NORTH EAST DERBYSHIRE BY PROVIDING ACCOMMODATION, GRANTS AND SERVICES INCLUDING ADVOCACY AND ADVICE  TO WORK WITH OTHER CHARITIES AND AGENCIES IN CHESTERFIELD AND NORTH EAST DERBYSHIRE TO ASSIST THE INDIVIDUALS SUPPORTED BY THE CHARITY TO LIVE INDEPENDENTLY WITHIN THE COMMUNITY.

name: KICKSTARTED
activities: Kickstarted receives sports clothing and equipment from individuals and organisations which it then exports to support NGO's in developing nations who use sports, arts and education to nurture  and develop young people, especially from the poorer areas, in the development of their local communities and life goals.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO IS TO ADVANCE IN LIFE AND RELIEVE THE NEEDS OF YOUNG PEOPLE THROUGH:-  4.1. THE PROVISION OF RECREATIONAL AND LEISURE TIME ACTIVITIES PROVIDED IN THE INTEREST OF SOCIAL WELFARE, DESIGNED TO IMPROVE THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE; AND 4.2. PROVIDING SUPPORT AND ACTIVITIES WHICH DEVELOP THEIR SKILLS, CAPACITIES AND CAPABILITIES TO ENABLE THEM TO PARTICIPATE IN SOCIETY AS MATURE AND RESPONSIBLE INDIVIDUALS.

name: FRIENDS OF PICU
activities: TO RELIEVE SICKNESS AND TO PRESERVE THE HEALTH OF THE PATIENTS OF THE PAEDIATRIC INTENSIVE CARE UNIT AT UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL SOUTHAMPTON BY PROVIDING OR ASSISTING IN THE PROVISION OF EQUIPMENT, FACILITIES AND SERVICES (NOT NORMALLY PROVIDED BY THE LOCAL HEALTH AUTHORITY).
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO ARE:  TO RELIEVE SICKNESS AND TO PRESERVE THE HEALTH OF THE PATIENTS OF THE PAEDIATRIC INTENSIVE CARE UNIT AT THE UNIVERSITY HOSPITAL SOUTHAMPTON BY PROVIDING OR ASSISTING IN THE PROVISION OF EQUIPMENT, FACILITIES AND SERVICES (NOT NORMALLY PROVIDED BY THE STATUTORY AUTHORITIES).

name: THE SCARAMOUCHE SAILING TRUST
activities: Our Charity provides opportunities for disadvantaged inner city children to enhance their life chances through sailing.
objects: TO ADVANCE IN LIFE AND RELIEVE NEEDS OF YOUNG PEOPLE THROUGH THE PROVISION OF SAILING PROGRAMMES WHICH DEVELOPS THEIR SKILLS, CAPACITIES AND CAPABILITIES TO ENABLE THEM TO PARTICIPATE IN SOCIETY AS MATURE AND RESPONSIBLE INDIVIDUALS.

name: FREE THEATRE UK
activities: TO ADVANCE PUBLIC EDUCATION IN, AND APPRECIATION OF, THE ARTS AND IN PARTICULAR OF DRAMA, LITERATURE AND MUSICAL THEATRE, IN SUCH WAYS AS THE TRUSTEES SHALL FROM TIME TO TIME DETERMINE INCLUDING THROUGH THE STAGING OF ACCESSIBLE THEATRE PRODUCTIONS OFARTISTIC MERIT AND RELATED EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMMES.
objects: TO ADVANCE PUBLIC EDUCATION IN, AND APPRECIATION OF, THE ARTS AND IN PARTICULAR OF DRAMA, LITERATURE AND MUSICAL THEATRE, IN SUCH WAYS AS THE TRUSTEES SHALL FROM TIME TO TIME DETERMINE INCLUDING THROUGH THE STAGING OF ACCESSIBLE THEATRE PRODUCTIONS OFARTISTIC MERIT AND RELATED EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMMES.

name: FAMILY & FRIENDS OF RISLEY
activities: The objects (main purposes) of Family and Friends of Risley Avenue Primary School are to advance the education of pupils in the school in particular by:  Developing effective relationships between the staff, parents and others associated with the school & Engaging in activities or providing facilities or equipment which support the school and advance the education of the pupils
objects: TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF PUPILS IN THE SCHOOL IN PARTICULAR BY:  1) DEVELOPING EFFECTIVE RELATIONSHIPS BETWEEN THE STAFF, PARENTS AND OTHERS ASSOCIATED WITH THE SCHOOL.  2) ENGAGING IN ACTIVITIES OR PROVIDING FACILITIES OR EQUIPMENT WHICH SUPPORT THE SCHOOL AND ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUPILS.  3) SUPPORT ADULT LEARNING THAT WILL HELP PARENTS TO SUPPORT THEIR CHIDLRENS LEARNING.

name: THE BROMLEY CHRISTIAN WORKERS TRUST
activities: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO ARE, FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT:-  4.1 TO PROMOTE AND PROVIDE CHRISTIAN, BIBLICAL AND PASTORAL TEACHING AND TRAINING IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE STATEMENT OF FAITH; AND  4.2 TO ADVANCE THE CHRISTIAN RELIGION IN ANY PART OF THE WORLD.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO ARE, FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT:-  4.1 TO PROMOTE AND PROVIDE CHRISTIAN, BIBLICAL AND PASTORAL TEACHING AND TRAINING IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE STATEMENT OF FAITH; AND  4.2 TO ADVANCE THE CHRISTIAN RELIGION IN ANY PART OF THE WORLD.

name: THE DOWNTON MEMORIAL CENTRE
activities: Provide the running and maintenance of the Village Hall
objects: THE PROVISION AND MAINTENANCE OF THE MEMORIAL CENTRE FOR USE OF INHABITANTS OF THE PARISH OF DOWNTON IN THE COUNTY OF WILTS AND ITS IMMEDIATE VICINITY WITHOUT DISTINCTION OF SEX OR POLITICAL OR RELIGIOUS OR OTHER OPINIONS, INCLUDING USE FOR:  (A) PHYSICAL AND MENTAL TRAINING AND RECREATION, AND  (B) INTELLECTUAL DEVELOPMENT THROUGH THE MEDIUM OF READING AND RECREATION ROOMS LIBRARY LECTURES, CLASSES, RECREATIONS.

name: SPORT CORNWALL FOUNDATION
activities: TO PROMOTE COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION IN HEALTHY RECREATION BY PROVIDING FACILITIES FOR THE PLAYING OF SPORTS CAPABLE OF IMPROVING PHYSICAL AND MENTAL HEALTH IN THE COUNTY OF CORNWALL.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE SPORT CORNWALL FOUNDATION ARE:    TO PROMOTE COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION IN HEALTHY RECREATION BY PROVIDING FACILITIES FOR THE PLAYING OF SPORTS CAPABLE OF IMPROVING PHYSICAL AND MENTAL HEALTH IN THE COUNTY OF CORNWALL.    FOR THE PURPOSES OF THIS CLAUSE THE TERM "FACILITIES" SHALL INCLUDE LAND, BUILDINGS, EQUIPMENT AND ORGANISING SPORTS ACTIVITIES.

name: LIONS CLUBS INTERNATIONAL DISTRICT 105N FOUNDATION
activities: The Foundation provides support in four areas of service: 	Preserving Sight 	Serving Youth 	Disaster Relief 	Humanitarian Efforts  The Foundation will collect donations from Lions Clubs in the District (Yorkshire, North East and Scotland) and distribute them to designated points.  These designated points could be International, within the United Kingdom and just for sue within the District.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO ARE SUCH PURPOSES WHICH ARE EXCLUSIVELY CHARITABLE ACCORDING TO THE LAWS OF ENGLAND AND WALES AS THE TRUSTEES SHALL IN THEIR ABSOLUTE DISCRETION DETERMINE, INCLUDING (BUT NOT LIMITED TO):  3.1 PROMOTING WITHOUT DISTINCTION OF SEX, SEXUAL ORIENTATION, RACE OR OF POLITICAL, RELIGIOUS OR OTHER OPINIONS BY ASSOCIATING WITH THE LOCAL AUTHORITIES AND VOLUNTARY ORGANISATIONS IN A COMMON EFFORT TO ADVANCE EDUCATION AND TO PROVIDE FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE;  3.2 THE RELIEF OF SICKNESS OR DISABILITY AND PRESERVATION OF GOOD HEALTH INCLUDING THE PREVENTION OF AVOIDABLE BLINDNESS;  3.3 TO HELP YOUNG PEOPLE, ESPECIALLY BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY THROUGH LEISURE TIME ACTIVITIES, SO AS TO DEVELOP THEIR CAPABILITIES THAT THEY MAY GROW TO FULL MATURITY AS INDIVIDUALS AND MEMBERS OF SOCIETY;  3.4 PROMOTING FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC THE CONSERVATION, PROTECTION AND IMPROVEMENT OF THE PHYSICAL AND NATURAL ENVIRONMENT;  3.5 THE RELIEF AND ASSISTANCE OF PEOPLE IN ANY PARTOF THE WORLD WHO ARE VICTIMS OF WAR OR NATURAL DISASTER, TROUBLE OR CATASTROPHE.

name: CHILDREN'S CHARITY MERSEYSIDE CIO
activities: TO RELIEVE THE NEEDS OF CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE IN MERSEYSIDE AND ITS SURROUNDING AREAS, WHO ARE IN NEED AS A RESULT OF ILL-HEALTH, DISABILITY, FINANCIAL HARDSHIP OR OTHER DISADVANTAGE, BY, BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY, PROVIDING GRANTS TO OTHER ORGANISATIONS, AND PROVIDING SPECIALIST ITEMS AND EQUIPMENT WITH A VIEW TO IMPROVING THE BENEFICIARIES' CONDITIONS OF LIFE.
objects: TO RELIEVE THE NEEDS OF CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE IN MERSEYSIDE AND ITS SURROUNDING AREAS, WHO ARE IN NEED AS A RESULT OF ILL-HEALTH, DISABILITY, FINANCIAL HARDSHIP OR OTHER DISADVANTAGE, BY, BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY, PROVIDING GRANTS TO OTHER ORGANISATIONS, AND PROVIDING SPECIALIST ITEMS AND EQUIPMENT WITH A VIEW TO IMPROVING THE BENEFICIARIES' CONDITIONS OF LIFE.

name: SHEPPEY EVANGELICAL CHURCH
activities: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT ARE TO ADVANCE THE CHRISTIAN FAITH IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE STATEMENT OF BELIEFS APPEARING IN THE SCHEDULE HERETO IN LEYSDOWN, KENT AND IN SUCH OTHER PARTS OF THE UNITED KINGDOM OR THE WORLD AS THE CHARITY TRUSTEES MAY FROM TIME TO TIME THINK FIT.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT ARE TO ADVANCE THE CHRISTIAN FAITH IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE STATEMENT OF BELIEFS APPEARING IN THE SCHEDULE HERETO IN LEYSDOWN, KENT AND IN SUCH OTHER PARTS OF THE UNITED KINGDOM OR THE WORLD AS THE CHARITY TRUSTEES MAY FROM TIME TO TIME THINK FIT.

name: SADAQAH JARIYAH FUNERAL SERVICES
activities: Funeral and related Services
objects: THE PREVENTION OR RELIEF OF POVERTY OF BEREAVED PEOPLE AND THEIR FAMILIES IN YORKSHIRE & HUMBER REGION WHO LACK THE FINANCIAL MEANS TO MEET THE COSTS OF FUNERAL EXPENSES BY THE PROVISION OF GRANTS OF FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO ASSIST WITH SUCH COSTS

name: EDUCATIONAL AND CULTURAL CENTRE, SWINDON CIO
activities: "TO FURTHER OR BENEFIT THE RESIDENTS OF SWINDON AND ITS ENVIRONS (THE 'AREA OF BENEFIT') BY THE FOLLOWING MEANS:  1. TO ADVANCE EDUCATION, THROUGH THE PROVISION OF SUPLEMENTARY EDUCATION, IN SUBJECTS INCLUDING THE ENGLISH LANGUAGE, THE POLISH LANGUAGEAND POLISH HERITAGE, INCLUDING ARTS, CULTURE, HISTORY AND GEOGRAPHY;  2. TO PROVIDE FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION AND LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION, WITH THE OBJECTIVE OF IMPROVING THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE FOR RESIDENTS IN THEAREA OF BENEFIT AND ENSURING THE INTEGRATION OF THE POLISH RESIDENTS INTO THE LOCAL COMMUNITY."
objects: "TO FURTHER OR BENEFIT THE RESIDENTS OF SWINDON AND ITS ENVIRONS (THE 'AREA OF BENEFIT') BY THE FOLLOWING MEANS:  1. TO ADVANCE EDUCATION, THROUGH THE PROVISION OF SUPLEMENTARY EDUCATION, IN SUBJECTS INCLUDING THE ENGLISH LANGUAGE, THE POLISH LANGUAGEAND POLISH HERITAGE, INCLUDING ARTS, CULTURE, HISTORY AND GEOGRAPHY;  2. TO PROVIDE FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION AND LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION, WITH THE OBJECTIVE OF IMPROVING THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE FOR RESIDENTS IN THEAREA OF BENEFIT AND ENSURING THE INTEGRATION OF THE POLISH RESIDENTS INTO THE LOCAL COMMUNITY."

name: FRIENDS OF THE LOWER DERWENT VALLEY CONSERVATION GROUP
activities: The objective of the CIO is the conservation, protection and improvement of the physical and natural environment of the Lower Derwent Valley.
objects: TO PROMOTE FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT THE CONSERVATION, PROTECTION AND IMPROVEMENT OF THE PHYSICAL AND NATURAL ENVIRONMENT OF THE LOWER DERWENT VALLEY, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY BY CONDUCTING ENVIRONMENTAL IMPROVEMENT WORKS AND PROVIDING OR ASSISTING IN THE PROVISION OF RESEARCH ACTIVITIES RELEVANT TO THE SPECIES AND THE HABITAT OF THE LOWER DERWENT VALLEY AND TO PUBLISH THE USEFUL RESULTS THEREOF.    TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUBLIC IN THE CONSERVATION, PROTECTION AND IMPROVEMENT OF THEPHYSICAL AND NATURAL ENVIRONMENT OF THE LOWER DERWENT VALLEY.

name: LAW ENFORCEMENT ACTION PARTNERSHIP UK/EUROPE CHARITABLE INCORPORATED ORGANISATION
activities: THE SAVING OF LIVES AND THE PREVENTION OF DRUG RELATED CRIME FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY:  A) RAISING AWARENESS OF THE CAUSES AND EFFECTS OF PROBLEMATIC DRUG USE AND DRUG RELATED CRIME WITH THE PUBLIC, SERVICE PROVIDERS AND PROFESSIONALS INCLUDING POLICE SERVICES, AND POLICY MAKERS;  B) PROMOTING EVIDENCE-BASED BEST PRACTICE IN POLICING, HARM REDUCTION AND DRUG TREATMENT.
objects: THE SAVING OF LIVES AND THE PREVENTION OF DRUG RELATED CRIME FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY:  A) RAISING AWARENESS OF THE CAUSES AND EFFECTS OF PROBLEMATIC DRUG USE AND DRUG RELATED CRIME WITH THE PUBLIC, SERVICE PROVIDERS AND PROFESSIONALS INCLUDING POLICE SERVICES, AND POLICY MAKERS;  B) PROMOTING EVIDENCE-BASED BEST PRACTICE IN POLICING, HARM REDUCTION AND DRUG TREATMENT.

name: DUP WELFARE UK
activities: collection of donation for students who study at Darul uloom Pretoria or those who will go from the Uk.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CHARITY (THE OBJECTS)	ARE:  1.	TO ADVANCE THE RELIGION OF ISLAM ACCORDING TO THE QURAN THE SUNNAH AND HADITH BY  MEANS OF, PARTICULARLY BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY, THE ESTABLISHMENT OF A MOSQUE AND MADRASSAH IN BIRMINGHAM.  2.	THE PREVENTION OR RELIEF OF POVERTY ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD BY PROVIDING:  GRANTS, ITEMS AND SERVICES TO CHARITIES, OR OTHER ORGANISATIONS WORKING TO PREVENT OR RELIEVE POVERTY.

name: THE CANBRICK CHARITABLE TRUST
activities: The Canbrick Charitable Trust has been set up to advance such charitable purposes as the trustees see fit, in particular, but not limited to advancing the education, health and environmental awareness of children and young people in the UK and abroad for the public benefit by making grants.
objects: THE OBJECTS ARE TO ADVANCE SUCH CHARITABLE PURPOSES (ACCORDING TO THE LAW OF ENGLAND AND WALES) AS THE TRUSTEES SEE FIT FROM TIME TO TIME IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT LIMITED TO ADVANCING THE EDUCATION AND HEALTH OF CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE ABROAD AND IN THE UK FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT

name: BARTON LANE COMMUNITY ASSOCIATION
activities: To promote benefits of local residents defined by the the political boundaries of the Clifton-south and North wards without distinction of sexual orientation, race or of political, religious, or other opinions.  To provide facilities in the interests of social welfare for and leisure time occupation with the object of improving the conditions of life for the said inhabitants.  For all age groups.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CHARITY ARE:  TO FURTHER OR BENEFIT THE RESIDENTS OF CLIFTON LANE/BARTON LANE AREA OF NOTTINGHAM [AREA OF BENEFIT] AND THE NEIGHBOURHOOD, WITHOUT DISTINCTION OF SEX, SEXUAL 							ORIENTATION, RACE OR OF POLITICAL, RELIGIOUS OR OTHER OPINIONS BY ASSOCIATING TOGETHER THE SAID RESIDENTS AND THE LOCAL AUTHORITIES, VOLUNTARY AND OTHER ORGANISATIONS IN A COMMON EFFORT TO ADVANCE EDUCATION AND TO PROVIDE FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION AND LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION WITH THE OBJECTIVE OF IMPROVING THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE FOR THE RESIDENTS.  IN FURTHERANCE OF THESE OBJECTS BUT NOT OTHERWISE, THE TRUSTEES SHALL HAVE POWER:  TO ESTABLISH OR SECURE THE ESTABLISHMENT OF A COMMUNITY CENTRE AND TO MAINTAIN OR MANAGE OR CO-OPERATE WITH ANY STATUTORY AUTHORITY IN THE MAINTENANCE AND MANAGEMENT OF SUCH A CENTRE FOR ACTIVITIES PROMOTED BY THE CHARITY IN FURTHERANCE OF THE ABOVE OBJECTS.

name: THE MAYOR'S CHARITY APPEAL TRUST (BASILDON)
activities: The charity will promote its objectives through making donations of money raising by various fundraising activities to charities and other organisations within the Borough of Basildon.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CHARITY ('THE OBJECTS') ARE TO MAKE GRANTS TO FURTHER SUCH GENERAL CHARITABLE PURPOSES ACCORDING TO THE LAW OF ENGLAND AND WALES AS THE TRUSTEES MAY IN THEIR ABSOLUTE DISCRETION DETERMINE IN THE BOROUGH OF BASILDON.

name: ARLINGTON GARDEN ASSOCIATION
activities: Set up to lead volunteer gardening sessions in Arlington Garden.  We bring volunteers together monthly to undertake maintenance and improvements in the garden to enable the garden to be used by local residents and visitors.  We arrange fundraising activities to enable purchase of tools for gardening and provide other amenity items.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO ARE  A.TO PROMOTE THE CONSERVATION, PROTECTION AND IMPROVEMENT OF THE PHYSICAL AND NATURAL ENVIRONMENT OF ARLINGTON GARDEN (ALSO KNOWN AS VICTORIA PARK) FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE LOCAL COMMUNITY AND VISITORS THROUGH TRUSTEE LED VOLUNTEER MAINTENANCE SESSIONS AND FUNDRAISING FOR RESTORATION.  B.TO PROVIDE FACILITIES FOR RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY PROVIDING AN AREA FOR USE AS A COMMUNITY GARDEN FOR INDIVIDUALS IN CLIFTON EAST, BRISTOL AND THE SURROUNDING AREA, WHO HAVE NEED OF SUCH FACILITIES BY REASON OF THEIR YOUTH, AGE, INFIRMITY OR DISABLEMENT, FINANCIAL HARDSHIP OR SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC CIRCUMSTANCES OR THE PUBLIC AT LARGE IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND WITH THE OBJECT OFIMPROVING THE CONDITION OF LIFE OF THE SAID INHABITANTS.  C.TO ADVANCE EDUCATION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY PROVIDING OPPORTUNITIES FOR COMMUNITY GARDEN VOLUNTEERS TO LEARN ABOUT HORTICULTURE IN AND AROUND THE COMMUNITY GARDEN.

name: THE SIXTEEN TRUST
activities: Group and one-to-one mentoring for school-age children by arts professionals.  Art in schools program Exhibitions for young people
objects: TO ADVANCE IN LIFE AND ACT AS A RESOURCE FOR YOUNG PEOPLE AGED 11 TO 16 LIVING IN THANET AND THE SURROUNDING AREA BY PROVIDING MENTORING, PROJECTS, SUPPORT AND ADVICE LED BY ESTABLISHED ARTS PROFESSIONALS IN THE FIELDS OF ART, DESIGN, GRAPHICS, COMPUTING, THEATRE, DANCE, MUSIC, FILM, PHOTOGRAPHY, TEXTILES AND SCIENCE TO DEVELOP THEIR SKILLS, CAPACITIES AND CAPABILITIES TO ENABLE THEM TO PARTICIPATE IN SOCIETY AS MATURE AND RESPONSIBLE INDIVIDUALS.

name: ENDERBY LAWN TENNIS CLUB
activities: Enderby Lawn Tennis Club encourages people to participate in the healthy sport of tennis. The club operates and maintains three floodlit savannah tennis courts for the benefit of the people of Enderby and the surrounding district.
objects: THE PROMOTION OF COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION IN HEALTHY RECREATION FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE INHABITANTS OF ENDERBY AND THE SURROUNDING DISTRICT BY THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES FOR PLAYING TENNIS.

name: STEAM
activities: TO PRESERVE AND PROTECT THE GOOD MENTAL HEALTH OF PEOPLE IN THE CONSTRUCTION INDUSTRY, PARTICULARLY BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY THROUGH THE PROVISION OF PSYCHOSOCIAL SUPPORT TO WORKERS THROUGH SPORTS ACTIVITIES, ACCESS TO COUNSELLING AND GROUP SUPPORT AND CONDUCTING RESEARCH INTO MENTAL HEALTH IN THE CONSTRUCTION INDUSTRY TO FURTHER BOLSTER AWARENESS RAISING AND PROGRAMMING.
objects: TO PRESERVE AND PROTECT THE GOOD MENTAL HEALTH OF PEOPLE IN THE CONSTRUCTION INDUSTRY, PARTICULARLY BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY THROUGH THE PROVISION OF PSYCHOSOCIAL SUPPORT TO WORKERS THROUGH SPORTS ACTIVITIES, ACCESS TO COUNSELLING AND GROUP SUPPORT AND CONDUCTING RESEARCH INTO MENTAL HEALTH IN THE CONSTRUCTION INDUSTRY TO FURTHER BOLSTER AWARENESS RAISING AND PROGRAMMING.

name: VILNIUS LYCEUM ALUMNI ASSOCIATION UK
activities: The association aims to advance the education and personal development of students and alumni of Vilniaus licejus (Vilnius Lyceum) in such ways as the charity trustees see fit, including, but not limited to (i) awarding scholarships, maintenance allowances and grants and (ii) providing and assisting the provision of facilities for education at the school.
objects: FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF STUDENTS AND ALUMNI OF VILNIAUS LICEJUS (VILNIUS LYCEUM) SCHOOL INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE AWARDING OF SCHOLARSHIPS, THE PROVISION OF MAINTENANCE ALLOWANCES AND GRANTS AND PROVIDING AND ASSISTING THE PROVISION OF FACILITIES FOR EDUCATION AT THE SCHOOL

name: LIGHT OF TABERNACLE MINISTRY
activities: TO ADVANCE THE CHRISTIAN FAITH FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC THROUGH THE HOLDING OF PRAYER MEETINGS, LECTURES, PRODUCING AND DISTRIBUTING LITERATURE ON CHRISTIAN FAITH TO ENLIGHTEN OTHERS.
objects: TO ADVANCE THE CHRISTIAN FAITH FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC THROUGH THE HOLDING OF PRAYER MEETINGS, LECTURES, PRODUCING AND DISTRIBUTING LITERATURE ON CHRISTIAN FAITH TO ENLIGHTEN OTHERS.

name: THE JUDY BLAME CHARITABLE TRUST
activities: TO ADVANCE PUBLIC EDUCATION IN AND APPRECIATION OF THE ARTS BY:    A) PROVIDING ACCESS TO THE ARTISTIC WORK OF THE LATE JUDY BLAME;    B) PROVIDING DEVELOPMENTAL SUPPORT, MENTORING, SCHOLARSHIPS AND FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO EMERGING DESIGNERS AND ARTISTS.
objects: TO ADVANCE PUBLIC EDUCATION IN AND APPRECIATION OF THE ARTS BY:    A) PROVIDING ACCESS TO THE ARTISTIC WORK OF THE LATE JUDY BLAME;    B) PROVIDING DEVELOPMENTAL SUPPORT, MENTORING, SCHOLARSHIPS AND FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO EMERGING DESIGNERS AND ARTISTS.

name: DOWN SYNDROME UK
activities: TO RELIEF OF THOSE IN NEED BY REASON OF PARENTS AND FAMILIES OF CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE WITH DOWN SYNDROME IN THE UK THROUGH THE PROVISION OF A FORUM THAT PROVIDES ACCURATE UP TO DATE INFORMATION ON THE REALITIES OF LIVING WITH DOWN SYNDROME AND IS A CENTRAL HUB OF INFORMATION AND RESOURCES FOR THE CONDITION
objects: TO RELIEF OF THOSE IN NEED BY REASON OF PARENTS AND FAMILIES OF CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE WITH DOWN SYNDROME IN THE UK THROUGH THE PROVISION OF A FORUM THAT PROVIDES ACCURATE UP TO DATE INFORMATION ON THE REALITIES OF LIVING WITH DOWN SYNDROME AND IS A CENTRAL HUB OF INFORMATION AND RESOURCES FOR THE CONDITION

name: OSSETT WAR MEMORIAL COMMUNITY CENTRE CIO
activities: THE OBJECT OF THE CIO IS TO FURTHER OR BENEFIT THE RESIDENTS OF OSSETT AND SURROUNDING AREAS, WITHOUT DISTINCTION OF GENDER, SEXUAL ORIENTATION, RACE OR POLITICAL, RELIGIOUS OR OTHER OPINIONS, BY ASSOCIATING TOGETHER THE SAID RESIDENTS AND THE LOCAL AUTHORITIES, VOLUNTARY AND OTHER ORGANISATIONS IN A COMMON EFFORT TO ADVANCE EDUCATION AND TO PROVIDE FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION AND LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION WITH THE OBJECTIVE OF IMPROVING THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE FOR THE RESIDENTS.  IN FURTHERANCE OF THESE OBJECTS, BUT NOT OTHERWISE, THE TRUSTEES SHALL HAVE POWER TO ESTABLISH OR SECURE THE ESTABLISHMENT OF A COMMUNITY CENTRE AND TO MAINTAIN OR MANAGE OR CO-OPERATE WITH ANY STATUTORY AUTHORITY AND/OR OTHER RELEVANT ORGANISATIONS IN THE MAINTENANCE OF SUCH A CENTRE FOR ACTIVITIES PROMOTED BY THE CIO IN FURTHERANCE OF THE ABOVE OBJECT.
objects: THE OBJECT OF THE CIO IS TO FURTHER OR BENEFIT THE RESIDENTS OF OSSETT AND SURROUNDING AREAS, WITHOUT DISTINCTION OF GENDER, SEXUAL ORIENTATION, RACE OR POLITICAL, RELIGIOUS OR OTHER OPINIONS, BY ASSOCIATING TOGETHER THE SAID RESIDENTS AND THE LOCAL AUTHORITIES, VOLUNTARY AND OTHER ORGANISATIONS IN A COMMON EFFORT TO ADVANCE EDUCATION AND TO PROVIDE FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION AND LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION WITH THE OBJECTIVE OF IMPROVING THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE FOR THE RESIDENTS.  IN FURTHERANCE OF THESE OBJECTS, BUT NOT OTHERWISE, THE TRUSTEES SHALL HAVE POWER TO ESTABLISH OR SECURE THE ESTABLISHMENT OF A COMMUNITY CENTRE AND TO MAINTAIN OR MANAGE OR CO-OPERATE WITH ANY STATUTORY AUTHORITY AND/OR OTHER RELEVANT ORGANISATIONS IN THE MAINTENANCE OF SUCH A CENTRE FOR ACTIVITIES PROMOTED BY THE CIO IN FURTHERANCE OF THE ABOVE OBJECT.

name: LIVE LUKE'S DREAMS
activities: To support the needs and wellbeing of children diagnosed with childhood cancer in the Enfield and Barnet area.
objects: TO RELIEVE THE NEEDS OF CHILDREN AND THE BEREAVED SIBLINGS OF CHILDREN DIAGNOSED WITH PAEDIATRIC CANCER IN THE BARNET AND ENFIELD AREA, WHO ARE OR WERE RECEIVING CANCER TREATMENT AT GREAT ORMOND STREET CHILDREN'S HOSPITAL, UNIVERSITY COLLEGE LONDON HOSPITAL, BARNET GENERAL HOSPITAL AND NORTH MIDDLESEX HOSPITAL BY PROVIDING GIFTS, DAYS OUT AND TICKETS TO EVENTS IN THE LOCAL AREA

name: THE TEDDYROSE FOUNDATION
activities: FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT, PRESERVE AND PROTECT THE PHYSICAL AND MENTAL HEALTH OF FAMILIES IN ENGLAND WHO HAVE LOST A BABY BY:  A)PROVIDING DONATIONS DIRECTLY TO THE BEREAVED FAMILIES  B)PROVIDING DONATIONS TO OTHER CHARITABLE ORGANISATIONS WITH SIMILAR PURPOSES  C)PROVIDING SUPPORT AND INFORMATION TO THE BEREAVED FAMILIES.
objects: FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT, PRESERVE AND PROTECT THE PHYSICAL AND MENTAL HEALTH OF FAMILIES IN ENGLAND WHO HAVE LOST A BABY BY:  A)PROVIDING DONATIONS DIRECTLY TO THE BEREAVED FAMILIES  B)PROVIDING DONATIONS TO OTHER CHARITABLE ORGANISATIONS WITH SIMILAR PURPOSES  C)PROVIDING SUPPORT AND INFORMATION TO THE BEREAVED FAMILIES.

name: GREAT HAYWOOD UNDER 5'S
activities: THE AIMS OF THE PRE-SCHOOL ARE TO ENHANCE THE DEVELOPMENT AND EDUCATION OF CHILDREN PRIMARILY UNDER STATUTORY SCHOOL AGE BY ENCOURAGING PARENTS TO UNDERSTAND AND PROVIDE FOR THE NEEDS OF THEIR CHILDREN THROUGH COMMUNITY GROUPS AND BY:  (A)OFFERING APPROPRIATE PLAY, EDUCATION AND CARE FACILITIES, FAMILY LEARNING AND EXTENDED HOURS GROUPS, TOGETHER WITH THE RIGHT OF PARENTS TO TAKE RESPONSIBILITY FOR AND TO BECOME INVOLVED IN THE ACTIVITIES OF SUCH GROUPS, ENSURING THAT SUCH GROUPS OFFER OPPORTUNITIES FOR ALL CHILDREN WHATEVER THEIR RACE, CULTURE, RELIGION, MEANS OR ABILITY;  (B)ENCOURAGING THE STUDY OF THE NEEDS OF SUCH CHILDREN AND THEIR FAMILIES AND PROMOTING PUBLIC INTEREST IN AND RECOGNITION OF SUCH NEEDS IN THE LOCAL AREAS;  (C)INSTIGATINGAND ADHERING TO AND FURTHERING THE AIMS AND OBJECTS OF THE PRE-SCHOOL LEARNING ALLIANCE.
objects: THE AIMS OF THE PRE-SCHOOL ARE TO ENHANCE THE DEVELOPMENT AND EDUCATION OF CHILDREN PRIMARILY UNDER STATUTORY SCHOOL AGE BY ENCOURAGING PARENTS TO UNDERSTAND AND PROVIDE FOR THE NEEDS OF THEIR CHILDREN THROUGH COMMUNITY GROUPS AND BY:  (A)OFFERING APPROPRIATE PLAY, EDUCATION AND CARE FACILITIES, FAMILY LEARNING AND EXTENDED HOURS GROUPS, TOGETHER WITH THE RIGHT OF PARENTS TO TAKE RESPONSIBILITY FOR AND TO BECOME INVOLVED IN THE ACTIVITIES OF SUCH GROUPS, ENSURING THAT SUCH GROUPS OFFER OPPORTUNITIES FOR ALL CHILDREN WHATEVER THEIR RACE, CULTURE, RELIGION, MEANS OR ABILITY;  (B)ENCOURAGING THE STUDY OF THE NEEDS OF SUCH CHILDREN AND THEIR FAMILIES AND PROMOTING PUBLIC INTEREST IN AND RECOGNITION OF SUCH NEEDS IN THE LOCAL AREAS;  (C)INSTIGATINGAND ADHERING TO AND FURTHERING THE AIMS AND OBJECTS OF THE PRE-SCHOOL LEARNING ALLIANCE.

name: JETTY LANE C.I.O.
activities: To build and then operate a modern, vibrant, inclusive, accessible and welcoming facility for young people, artists and all age groups in the local community.
objects: TO FURTHER OR BENEFIT THE RESIDENTS OF WOODBRIDGE AND THE NEIGHBOURHOOD, WITHOUT DISTINCTION OF SEX, SEXUAL ORIENTATION, RACE OR OF POLITICAL, RELIGIOUS OR OTHER OPINIONS BY ASSOCIATING TOGETHER THE SAID RESIDENTS AND THE LOCAL AUTHORITIES, VOLUNTARY AND OTHER ORGANISATIONS IN A COMMON EFFORT TO ADVANCE EDUCATION AND TO PROVIDE FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION AND LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION WITH THE OBJECTIVE OF IMPROVING THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE FOR THE RESIDENTS.  IN FURTHERANCE OF THESE OBJECTS BUT NOT OTHERWISE, THE TRUSTEES SHALL HAVE POWER:  TO ESTABLISH OR SECURE THE ESTABLISHMENT OF A COMMUNITY CENTRE AND TO MAINTAIN OR MANAGE OR CO-OPERATE WITH ANY STATUTORY AUTHORITY IN THE MAINTENANCE AND MANAGEMENT OF SUCH ACENTRE FOR ACTIVITIES PROMOTED BY THE CHARITY IN FURTHERANCE OF THE ABOVE OBJECTS.

name: GEMMA ROSE FOUNDATION
activities: The preservation and protection of good health and relief of sickness in the diagnosis and treatment of cancer for the public benefit, by advancing the availability of cancer treatment not available on the NHS that may prolong life and/or improve quality of life, and providing the necessary support, guidance and advice in pursuit of fulfilling their medical needs.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO ARE:    THE PRESERVATION AND PROTECTION OF GOOD HEALTH AND RELIEF OF SICKNESS IN THE DIAGNOSIS AND TREATMENT OF CANCER FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY ADVANCING THE AVAILABILITY OF CANCER TREATMENT NOT AVAILABLE ON THE NHS THAT MAY PROLONG LIFE AND/OR IMPROVE QUALITY OF LIFE AND PROVIDING THE NECESSARY SUPPORT, GUIDANCE AND ADVICE IN PURSUIT OF FULFILLING THEIR MEDICAL NEEDS.

name: LIONS CLUB OF CHIPPING SODBURY (CIO)
activities: THE OBJECTS OF THE CLUB ARE SUCH PURPOSES AS ARE EXCLUSIVELY CHARITABLE IN ENGLAND & WALES, INCLUDING IN PARTICULAR:  3.1.1 THE ADVANCEMENT OF CITIZENSHIP BY:  3.1.1.1 PROMOTING THE PRINCIPLES OF GOOD CITIZENSHIP;  3.1.1.2 ENCOURAGING MEMBERS TO TAKE AN ACTIVE INTEREST IN THE CIVIC, CULTURAL, SOCIAL AND MORAL WELFARE OF THE COMMUNITY;  3.1.1.3 PROVIDING A FORUM FOR THE OPEN DISCUSSION OF ALL MATTERS OF PUBLIC INTEREST; PROVIDED THAT PARTISAN POLITICS AND SECTARIAN RELIGION SHALL NOT BE DEBATED BYMEMBERS;  3.1.1.4 ENCOURAGING SERVICE-MINDED PEOPLE TO SERVE THEIR COMMUNITY WITHOUT PERSONAL REWARD AND ENCOURAGING THE PROMOTION OF HIGH ETHICAL STANDARDS IN COMMERCE, INDUSTRY, PROFESSIONS, PUBLIC WORKS AND PRIVATE ENDEAVOURS;  3.1.1.5 SUPPORTING YOUTH TO DEVELOP THEIR SKILLS, CAPACITIES AND CAPABILITIES TO ENABLE THEM TO PARTICIPATE IN SOCIETY AS MATURE AND RESPONSIBLE INDIVIDUALS;  3.1.2 PROMOTING THE VOLUNTARY SECTOR FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY ASSOCIATING WITH LOCAL AUTHORITIES IN A COMMON EFFORT TO ADVANCE EDUCATION AND PROVIDE FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION TO IMPROVE THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE OF PEOPLE IN LOCAL, NATIONAL AND INTERNATIONAL COMMUNITIES;  3.1.3 PROMOTING VOLUNTEERING;  3.1.4 THE RELIEF OF POVERTY AND THE RELIEF OF THOSE IN NEED IN PARTICULAR BY PROVIDING HUMANITARIAN AID AND DISASTER RELIEF;  3.1.5 THE ADVANCEMENT OF HEALTH OR THE SAVING OF LIVES BY PREVENTING AVOIDABLE BLINDNESS, ASSISTING DISABLED PEOPLE TOLEAD INDEPENDENT  LIVES OR HELPING TO PREVENT OR MANAGE HEALTH ISSUES;  3.1.6 PROMOTING FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC THE CONSERVATION PROTECTION AND IMPROVEMENT OF THE PHYSICAL AND NATURAL ENVIRONMENT; AND/OR  3.1.7 PROMOTING COMMUNITY PARTICIPATIONIN HEALTHY RECREATION.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CLUB ARE SUCH PURPOSES AS ARE EXCLUSIVELY CHARITABLE IN ENGLAND & WALES, INCLUDING IN PARTICULAR:  3.1.1 THE ADVANCEMENT OF CITIZENSHIP BY:  3.1.1.1 PROMOTING THE PRINCIPLES OF GOOD CITIZENSHIP;  3.1.1.2 ENCOURAGING MEMBERS TO TAKE AN ACTIVE INTEREST IN THE CIVIC, CULTURAL, SOCIAL AND MORAL WELFARE OF THE COMMUNITY;  3.1.1.3 PROVIDING A FORUM FOR THE OPEN DISCUSSION OF ALL MATTERS OF PUBLIC INTEREST; PROVIDED THAT PARTISAN POLITICS AND SECTARIAN RELIGION SHALL NOT BE DEBATED BYMEMBERS;  3.1.1.4 ENCOURAGING SERVICE-MINDED PEOPLE TO SERVE THEIR COMMUNITY WITHOUT PERSONAL REWARD AND ENCOURAGING THE PROMOTION OF HIGH ETHICAL STANDARDS IN COMMERCE, INDUSTRY, PROFESSIONS, PUBLIC WORKS AND PRIVATE ENDEAVOURS;  3.1.1.5 SUPPORTING YOUTH TO DEVELOP THEIR SKILLS, CAPACITIES AND CAPABILITIES TO ENABLE THEM TO PARTICIPATE IN SOCIETY AS MATURE AND RESPONSIBLE INDIVIDUALS;  3.1.2 PROMOTING THE VOLUNTARY SECTOR FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY ASSOCIATING WITH LOCAL AUTHORITIES IN A COMMON EFFORT TO ADVANCE EDUCATION AND PROVIDE FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION TO IMPROVE THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE OF PEOPLE IN LOCAL, NATIONAL AND INTERNATIONAL COMMUNITIES;  3.1.3 PROMOTING VOLUNTEERING;  3.1.4 THE RELIEF OF POVERTY AND THE RELIEF OF THOSE IN NEED IN PARTICULAR BY PROVIDING HUMANITARIAN AID AND DISASTER RELIEF;  3.1.5 THE ADVANCEMENT OF HEALTH OR THE SAVING OF LIVES BY PREVENTING AVOIDABLE BLINDNESS, ASSISTING DISABLED PEOPLE TOLEAD INDEPENDENT  LIVES OR HELPING TO PREVENT OR MANAGE HEALTH ISSUES;  3.1.6 PROMOTING FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC THE CONSERVATION PROTECTION AND IMPROVEMENT OF THE PHYSICAL AND NATURAL ENVIRONMENT; AND/OR  3.1.7 PROMOTING COMMUNITY PARTICIPATIONIN HEALTHY RECREATION.

name: HELP OUR HOMELESS
activities: To join and promote local agencies under a single, recognised logo, promote a clear educational message and offer an alternative method of giving. To divert financial giving on the street towards providing direct practical and/or financial support to homeless people, rough sleepers and people at risk of homelessness through service providers in Ipswich.
objects: TO RELIEVE THE CHARITABLE NEEDS OF PEOPLE IN IPSWICH AND THE SURROUNDING AREA WHO ARE HOMELESS, AT RISK OF HOMELESSNESS OR RECOVERING FROM HOMELESSNESS BY:  - MAKING GRANTS TO INDIVIDUALS IN NEED AND/OR CHARITIES, OR OTHER ORGANISATIONS WORKING TO RELIEVE HOMELESSNESS, ROUGH SLEEPING AND BEGGING.  - WORKING WITH CHARITIES, VOLUNTARY ORGANISATIONS, GOVERNMENT AGENCIES AND OTHER GROUPS IN IPSWICH THAT WORK TO RELIEVE HOMELESSNESS, ROUGH SLEEPING AND BEGGING.

name: WINCHCOMBE ROTARY TRUST FUND CHARITABLE INCORPORATED ORGANISATION
activities: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO ARE: THE RELIEF OF THE POOR AND NEEDY IN THE WINCHCOMBE AREA, ANY OTHER PART OF THE UNITED KINGDOM OR ELSEWHERE IN THE WORLD, OR SUCH OTHER CHARITABLE PURPOSE, INSTITUTION OR OBJECT AS THE MEMBERS OF THE CIO SHALL IN DULY CONSTITUTED MEETING DIRECT.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO ARE: THE RELIEF OF THE POOR AND NEEDY IN THE WINCHCOMBE AREA, ANY OTHER PART OF THE UNITED KINGDOM OR ELSEWHERE IN THE WORLD, OR SUCH OTHER CHARITABLE PURPOSE, INSTITUTION OR OBJECT AS THE MEMBERS OF THE CIO SHALL IN DULY CONSTITUTED MEETING DIRECT.

name: DUNAMIS BIBLE CHURCH (A.K.A. DUNAMIS MINISTRIES)
activities: PROCLAMATION OF THE GOSPEL OF JESUS CHRIST WITHIN UNITED KINGDOM, AND SUPPORTING OTHER CHURCHES ABROAD. THE TRAINING AND EDUCATION OF CHRISTIAN MINISTERS.
objects: 1.	THE OBJECT OF THE CIO IS THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE CHRISTIAN FAITH FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY-  (A)	FULFILLING THE GREAT COMMISSION GIVEN BY OUR LORD AND SAVIOUR JESUS CHRIST TO EVERY BELIEVER TO:  I)	GO INTO THE WORLD AND TEACH ALL NATIONS, PEOPLES AND RACES THE WORD OF GOD, TEACHING THEM TO OBSERVE EVERY JOT AND TITLE OF IT AND MAKING DISCIPLES OF THEM; AND  II)	PREACH THE WORD OF GOD TO EVERY CREATURE IN THE WORLD AND COVER THE EARTH WITH RIGHTEOUSNESS;  (B)	REACHING OUT TO THE CHURCHED AND UNCHURCHED PEOPLE;  (C)	LEADING BELIEVERS INTO PERSONAL, INTIMATE, DEEPER AND RICHER EXPERIENCES WITH THE LORD JESUS CHRIST, TEACHING AND GETTING THEM TO BE ACQUAINTED WITH THE GRACIOUS MEANS OF HOLY, HEALTHY, HAPPY AND PROSPEROUS, BALANCED AND FRUITFULCHRISTIAN LIVING THUS PREPARING THEM FOR HEAVEN;  (D)	MOBILISING BELIEVERS AND GETTING THEM ACTIVELY INVOLVED IN PRACTICALLY FULFILLING THE GREAT COMMISSION AS EXPRESSED IN CLAUSE (A) ABOVE.

name: THE DVASH PROJECT
activities: TO ADVANCE THE ORTHODOX JEWISH RELIGION FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY, BY: THE HOLDING OF PRAYER MEETINGS, LECTURES, PUBLIC CELEBRATION OF RELIGIOUS FESTIVALS; PROVIDING RELIGIOUS EDUCATION AND INSTRUCTION IN JEWISH ETHICS AND ANCIENT WISDOM, SUCH AS MARRIAGE GUIDANCE AND PARENTING SKILLS.
objects: TO ADVANCE THE ORTHODOX JEWISH RELIGION FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY, BY:  THE HOLDING OF PRAYER MEETINGS, LECTURES, PUBLIC CELEBRATION OF RELIGIOUS FESTIVALS;  PROVIDING RELIGIOUS EDUCATION AND INSTRUCTION IN JEWISH ETHICS AND ANCIENT WISDOM, SUCH AS MARRIAGE GUIDANCE AND PARENTING SKILLS;  PROMOTING SOCIAL COHESION THROUGH A RANGE OF CULTURAL AND COMMUNITY ACTIVITIES.

name: PRICKWILLOW ENGINE MUSEUM CIO
activities: TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUBLIC IN THE HISTORY OF LAND DRAINAGE, CURRENT WATER MANAGEMENT AND LIFE IN THE EAST ANGLIAN FENS, THROUGH THE:  1. PRESERVATION AND PROTECTION OF DRAINAGE ENGINES AND PUMPS, AND THE BUILDINGS IN WHICH THEY ARE LOCATED2. THE PROVISION AND MAINTENANCE OF A MUSEUM TO COLLECT, PRESERVE AND DISPLAY THE COLLECTIONS AND ARTEFACTS
objects: TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUBLIC IN THE HISTORY OF LAND DRAINAGE, CURRENT WATER MANAGEMENT AND LIFE IN THE EAST ANGLIAN FENS, THROUGH THE:  1. name: SOUTH GWYNEDD FOODBANK
activities: South Gwynedd Foodbank operates throughout South Gwynedd and surrounding areas of North Wales. In partnership with over 60 voluntary and statutory Agencies, we help to relieve poverty by providing a minimum of three days emergency food and toiletries (supplemented on occasions by clothing and furniture) to individuals and families who are experiencing financial hardship, sickness or need.
objects: THE RELIEF OF FINANCIAL HARDSHIP AMONGST PEOPLE IN SOUTH GWYNEDD AND SURROUNDING AREA OR IN ANY OTHER PARTS OF THE UNITED KINGDOM IN SUCH WAYS AS THE TRUSTEES FROM TIME TO TIME THINK FIT, IN PARTICULAR, BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY BY:  (A) PROVIDING EMERGENCYFOOD, ESSENTIAL TOILETRIES AND HOUSEHOLD ITEMS TO INDIVIDUALS AND FAMILIES IN NEED AND/OR FOR DISTRIBUTION BY CHARITIES OR OTHER ORGANISATIONS WORKING TO PREVENT OR RELIEVE POVERTY;  (B) SUCH OTHER MEANS, INCLUDING (BUT NOT LIMITED TO) THE PROVISIONOF SUPPORT OR SIGNPOSTING TO RELEVANT INFORMATION AND OTHER ADVISORY SERVICES.

name: LITTLE HERO
activities: 1. TO RELIEVE THE SICKNESS AND TO PRESERVE THE HEALTH OF CHILDREN SUFFERING FROM CHILDHOOD BRAIN TUMOURS BY SUPPORTING RESEARCH PROJECTS THAT SEEK TO IMPROVE TREATMENT METHODS OF CHILDHOOD BRAIN TUMOURS AND THE CARE OF CHILDREN SUFFERING FROM CHILDHOOD BRAIN TUMOURS AND TO PUBLISH ALL USEFUL RESULTS ARISING FROM SUCH RESEARCH; AND  2. TO RELIEVE POVERTY OR FINANCIAL HARDSHIP OF CHILDREN LIVING IN THE UK SUFFERING FROM BRAIN TUMOURS AND THEIR IMMEDIATE FAMILIES BY PROVIDING MONEY, SERVICES, ITEMS AND/OR FACILITIES.
objects: 1. TO RELIEVE THE SICKNESS AND TO PRESERVE THE HEALTH OF CHILDREN SUFFERING FROM CHILDHOOD BRAIN TUMOURS BY SUPPORTING RESEARCH PROJECTS THAT SEEK TO IMPROVE TREATMENT METHODS OF CHILDHOOD BRAIN TUMOURS AND THE CARE OF CHILDREN SUFFERING FROM CHILDHOOD BRAIN TUMOURS AND TO PUBLISH ALL USEFUL RESULTS ARISING FROM SUCH RESEARCH; AND  2. TO RELIEVE POVERTY OR FINANCIAL HARDSHIP OF CHILDREN LIVING IN THE UK SUFFERING FROM BRAIN TUMOURS AND THEIR IMMEDIATE FAMILIES BY PROVIDING MONEY, SERVICES, ITEMS AND/OR FACILITIES.

name: THE STEPHEN AND JOY MOSS CHARITABLE TRUST
activities: The Charity makes grants to a wide range of charitable organisations in accordance with its current grant making policy.  Some of the charitable purposes supported are education, advancing health and social care, relief of those is need, the arts and care of the environment.
objects: THE TRUSTEES SHALL HOLD THE CAPITAL AND INCOME OF THE CHARITY UPON TRUST TO APPLY THE INCOME, AND ALL OR SUCH PART OR PARTS OF THE CAPITAL, AT SUCH TIME OR TIMES AND IN SUCH MANNER TO, OR FOR THE BENEFIT OF, SUCH EXCLUSIVELY CHARITABLE OBJECTS AND PURPOSES IN ANY PART OF THE WORLD AS THE TRUSTEES MAY IN THEIR DISCRETION THINK FIT.

name: THE THORESBY COLLIERY BAND
activities: THE OBJECTIVES OF THE BAND SHALL BE:  TO FURTHER THE STUDY, PRACTICE AND ENJOYMENT OF BRASS BAND MUSIC IN ALL ITS FORMS IN ORDER TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION AND APPRECIATION OF THE PUBLIC IN THE ART OF BRASS BAND MUSIC, THROUGH PUBLIC PERFORMANCE, TRAINING AND EDUCATION IN THE COUNTY OF NOTTINGHAMSHIRE AND THE SURROUNDING AREA.
objects: THE OBJECTIVES OF THE BAND SHALL BE:  TO FURTHER THE STUDY, PRACTICE AND ENJOYMENT OF BRASS BAND MUSIC IN ALL ITS FORMS IN ORDER TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION AND APPRECIATION OF THE PUBLIC IN THE ART OF BRASS BAND MUSIC, THROUGH PUBLIC PERFORMANCE, TRAINING AND EDUCATION IN THE COUNTY OF NOTTINGHAMSHIRE AND THE SURROUNDING AREA.

name: OLDHAM BAPTIST CHURCH
activities: THE PRINCIPAL PURPOSES OF THE CHURCH ARE:- 3.1.1 THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE CHRISTIAN FAITH ACCORDING TO THE PRINCIPLES OF THE BAPTIST DENOMINATION. 3.1.2 THE CHURCH MAY ALSO ADVANCE EDUCATION AND CARRY OUT OTHER CHARITABLE PURPOSES IN THE UNITED KINGDOM AND/OR OTHER PARTS OF THE WORLD. 3.2 [NOTHING IN THIS CONSTITUTION SHALL AUTHORISE AN APPLICATION OF THE PROPERTY OF THE CHURCH FOR PURPOSES WHICH ARE NOT CHARITABLE IN ACCORDANCE WITH SECTION 7 OF THE CHARITIES AND TRUSTEE INVESTMENT (SCOTLAND) ACT 2005 OR SECTION 2 OF THE CHARITIES ACT (NORTHERN IRELAND) 2008.]

name: CYLCH MEITHRIN CARMEL
activities: TO PROMOTE CHILDRENS EDUCATION ESPECIALLY, BUT NOT RESTRICTED TO CHILDREN UNDER SCHOOL AGE IN THE MEDIUM OF THE WELSH LANGUAGE. THIS WILL BE DONE BY:- PROVIDE AND PROMOTE SPORT AND OTHER ACTIVITIES, ARRANGE CHARITABLE EVENTS TO ALLOW PARENTS TO SUPPORT THEIR CHILDRENS EDUCATION

name: THE HULL LIGHTHOUSE PROJECT
activities: TO RELIEVE THE NEEDS OF WOMEN WORKING IN PROSTITUTION AND OTHER VULNERABLE WOMEN IN THE CITY OF HULL AND THE SURROUNDING AREAS IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY BY THE PROVISION OF OUTREACH AND SUPPORT SERVICES, ADVICE, ASSISTANCE AND INFORMATION AS WELL AS SIGNPOSTING TO RELEVANT SERVICES AND BENEFITS.
objects: TO RELIEVE THE NEEDS OF WOMEN WORKING IN PROSTITUTION AND OTHER VULNERABLE WOMEN IN THE CITY OF HULL AND THE SURROUNDING AREAS IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY BY THE PROVISION OF OUTREACH AND SUPPORT SERVICES, ADVICE, ASSISTANCE AND INFORMATION AS WELL AS SIGNPOSTING TO RELEVANT SERVICES AND BENEFITS.

name: MATTHEW 25:40
activities: Community-incentivised fundraising: We will work with partner organisations to support specific projects that meet our objects by providing a platform for fundraising.  Friends initiative:  involves volunteers and beneficiaries meeting weekly to talk about a variety of topics and provide support in a safe, consistent and supportive environment where everyone is encouraged to give and receive.
objects: TO RELIEVE POVERTY AMONG THOSE WHO ARE HOMELESS OR AT RISK OF BECOMING HOMELESS THROUGH PROVISION OF: ITEMS, TRAINING, AND LONG-TERM PRACTICAL AND SOCIAL SUPPORT TO INDIVIDUALS IN NEED, TO ALLOW FOR RE-INTEGRATION INTO SOCIETY.    TO PROMOTE SOCIAL INCLUSION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY PREVENTING PEOPLE FROM BECOMING SOCIALLY EXCLUDED, RELIEVING THE NEEDS OF THOSE PEOPLE WHO ARE SOCIALLY EXCLUDED AND ASSISTING THEM TO INTEGRATE INTO SOCIETY.    FOR THE PURPOSE OF THIS CLAUSE 'SOCIALLY EXCLUDED' MEANS BEING EXCLUDED FROM SOCIETY, OR PARTS OF SOCIETY, AS A RESULT OF ONE OF MORE OF THE FOLLOWING FACTORS: UNEMPLOYMENT; HOMELESSNESS, FINANCIAL HARDSHIP; YOUTH OR OLD AGE; ILL HEALTH (PHYSICAL OR MENTAL); SUBSTANCE ABUSE OR DEPENDENCY INCLUDING ALCOHOLAND DRUGS; DISCRIMINATION ON THE GROUNDS OF SEX, RACE, DISABILITY, ETHNIC ORIGIN, RELIGION, BELIEF, CREED, SEXUAL ORIENTATION OR GENDER RE-ASSIGNMENT; POOR EDUCATIONAL OR SKILLS ATTAINMENT; RELATIONSHIP AND FAMILY BREAKDOWN; POOR HOUSING (THAT IS HOUSING THAT DOES NOT MEET BASIC HABITABLE STANDARDS; CRIME (EITHER AS A VICTIM OF CRIME OR AS AN OFFENDER REHABILITATING INTO SOCIETY).

name: BIG C LITTLE WARRIOR
activities: We boost confidence and esteem by providing free beauty and grooming treatments to anyone undergoing treatment for cancer. We are a small caring charity that is based in South Yorkshire and we work in hospitals, homes and hospices in the surrounding area. Our mission is to continue the work of Laura Powell, our Little Warrior.
objects: TO PROMOTE HEALTH AND TO RELIEVE THOSE SUFFERING FROM OR AFFECTED BY CANCER, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY, IN YORKSHIRE, BY THE PROVISION OF FREE BEAUTY TREATMENTS

name: CHASING CONNOR'S CURE
activities: The Charity supports research into the diagnosis, prevention and treatment of Duchenne Muscular Dystophy. It provides support and assistance to improve the quality of life of individuals affected by Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy.
objects: THE RELIEF OF SICKNESS AND PROTECTION OF GOOD HEALTH BY SUPPORTING RESEARCH INTO THE IMPROVED DIAGNOSIS, PREVENTION, AND/OR TREATMENT OF DUCHENNE MUSCULAR DYSTROPHY; AND THE PROVISION OF FINANCIAL AND OTHER ASSISTANCE TO SUPPORT THE IMPROVED QUALITY OF LIFE OF INDIVIDUALS AFFECTED BY DUCHENNE MUSCULAR DYSTROPHY.

name: ARIES UK
activities: THE PROMOTION OF EQUALITY AND DIVERSITY FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT AND THE ELIMINATION OF OF DISCRIMINATION ON THE GROUNDS OF SEXUAL ORIENTATION AND GENDER IDENTITY BY A) CREATING A SAFE SPACE FOR MEMBERS OF THE LGBTQI COMMUNITY. B) PROVIDING PHYSICAL AND DIGITAL REFERRALS TO PARTNER ORGANISATIONS. C)PROVIDING PEER SUPPORT AND COUNSELLING WITH A FOCUS ON MENTAL HEALTH.
objects: THE PROMOTION OF EQUALITY AND DIVERSITY FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT AND THE ELIMINATION OF OF DISCRIMINATION ON THE GROUNDS OF SEXUAL ORIENTATION AND GENDER IDENTITY BY A) CREATING A SAFE SPACE FOR MEMBERS OF THE LGBTQI+ COMMUNITY. B) PROVIDING PHYSICAL AND DIGITAL REFERRALS TO PARTNER ORGANISATIONS. C)PROVIDING PEER SUPPORT AND COUNSELLING WITH A FOCUS ON MENTAL HEALTH. D)IDENTIFYING AND CREATING NEW SERVICES FOR THE COMMUNITY NOT CURRENTLY AVAILABLE. E) COLLABORATIVELY WORKING WITH EXISTING SERVICESTO ENSURE LGBTQI + PEOPLE ARE REPRESENTED AND PROVIDED FOR. F)PROVIDING SEXUAL HEALTH ADVICE AND SUPPORT. G) TO FURTHER ANY OTHER PURPOSE WHICH IS CHARITABLE ACCORDING TO THE LAW OF ENGLAND AND WALES FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT AS THE TRUSTEES SEE FIT FROMTIME TO TIME.

name: PERSON TO PERSON CITIZEN ADVOCACY
activities: PROMOTE THE RELIEF OF PEOPLE WITH A LEARNING DISABILITY WITHIN SOUTH WALES AND TO ASSIST THOSE PEOPLE TO REALISE THEIR FULL POTENTIAL TO LEAD FULFILLING LIVES BY THE PROVISION OF A SERVICE CALCULATED TO: I.	ASSIST PERSONS AS DEFINED ABOVE TO OBTAIN THEIR FULL RIGHTS AND PRIVILEGES AS A CITIZEN; II.	PROVIDE LONG TERM FRIENDSHIP AND SUPPORT; AND III.	PROVIDE INFORMATION TO PEOPLE WITH A LEARNING DISABILITY.

name: CREDITON & DISTRICT LIONS CLUB (CIO)
activities: CREDITON LIONS CLUB PROVIDES FINANCIAL AND SERVICE SUPPORT TO INDIVIDUALS AND OTHER CHARITABLE ORGANISATIONS IN THE CREDITON AREA. THE CLUB DONATES TO LIONS INTERNATIONAL TO HELP WITH EMERGENCY AND DISASTER APPEALS
objects: SUCH PURPOSES AS ARE EXCLUSIVELY CHARITABLE IN ENGLAND AND WALES, INCLUDING IN PARTICULAR:  THE ADVANCEMENT OF CITIZENSHIP BY;  PROMOTING THE PRINCIPLES OF GOOD CITIZENSHIP;  ENCOURAGING MEMBERS TO TAKE AN ACTIVE INTEREST IN THE CIVIC, CULTURAL, SOCIAL AND MORAL WELFARE OF THE COMMUNITY;  PROVIDING A FORUM FOR THE OPEN DISCUSSION OF ALL MATTERS OF PUBLIC INTEREST; PROVIDED THAT PARTISAN POLITICS AND SECTARIAN RELIGION SHALL NOT BE DEBATED BY MEMBERS;  ENCOURAGING SERVICE-MINDED PEOPLE TO SERVE THEIR COMMUNITY WITHOUT PERSONAL REWARD AND ENCOURAGING THE PROMOTION OF HIGH ETHICAL STANDARDS IN COMMERCE, INDUSTRY, PROFESSIONS, PUBLIC WORKS AND PRIVATE ENDEAVOURS;  SUPPORTING YOUTH TO DEVELOP THEIR SKILLS, CAPACITIES AND CAPABILITIES TO ENABLE THEMTO PARTICIPATE IN SOCIETY AS MATURE AND RESPONSIBLE INDIVIDUALS;  PROMOTING THE VOLUNTARY SECTOR FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY ASSOCIATING WITH LOCAL AUTHORITIES IN A COMMON EFFORT TO ADVANCE EDUCATION AND PROVIDE FACILITIES IN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE FOR RECREATION OR OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION TO IMPROVE THE CONDITIONS OF LIFE OF PEOPLE IN LOCAL, NATIONAL AND INTERNATIONAL COMMUNITIES;  PROMOTING VOLUNTEERING;  THE RELIEF OF POVERTY AND THE RELIEF OF THOSE IN NEED IN PARTICULAR BY PROVIDING HUMANITARIAN AID AND DISASTER RELIEF;  THE ADVANCEMENT OF HEALTH OR THE SAVING OF LIVES BY PREVENTING AVOIDABLE BLINDNESS, ASSISTING DISABLED PEOPLE TO LEAD INDEPENDENT LIVES OR HELPING TO PREVENT OR MANAGE HEALTH ISSUES;  PROMOTING FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC THE CONSERVATION PROTECTION AND IMPROVEMENT OF THE PHYSICAL AND NATURAL ENVIRONMENT; AND/OR  PROMOTING COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION IN HEALTHY RECREATION.

name: BRIDGE@175
activities: FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE RESIDENTS OF THE PARISHES AND COMMUNITIES OF WINSLEY AND LIMPLEY STOKE, TO FURTHER SUCH CHARITABLE PURPOSES (AS CHARITABLE UNDER THE LAWS OF ENGLAND AND WALES) AS THE TRUSTEES SEE FIT FROM TIME TO TIME, AND IN PARTICULAR (BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY) TO RAISE SUFFICIENT FUNDS TO CONSTRUCT A PEDESTRIAN BRIDGE ACROSS THE KENNET AND AVON CANAL AT WINSLEY HILL.
objects: FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE RESIDENTS OF THE PARISHES AND COMMUNITIES OF WINSLEY AND LIMPLEY STOKE, TO FURTHER SUCH CHARITABLE PURPOSES (AS CHARITABLE UNDER THE LAWS OF ENGLAND AND WALES) AS THE TRUSTEES SEE FIT FROM TIME TO TIME, AND IN PARTICULAR (BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY) TO RAISE SUFFICIENT FUNDS TO CONSTRUCT A PEDESTRIAN BRIDGE ACROSS THE KENNET AND AVON CANAL AT WINSLEY HILL.

name: LITTLE ACORNS PRE-SCHOOL
activities: Provision of a Pre-School in Kingsnorth, Ashford, Kent
objects: OBJECTS  THE AIMS OF THE PRE-SCHOOL ARE TO ENHANCE THE DEVELOPMENT AND EDUCATION OF CHILDREN PRIMARILY UNDER STATUTORY SCHOOL AGE BY ENCOURAGING PARENTS TO UNDERSTAND AND PROVIDE FOR THE NEEDS OF THEIR CHILDREN THROUGH COMMUNITY GROUPS AND BY:  3.1 OFFERING APPROPRIATE PLAY, EDUCATION AND CARE FACILITIES, FAMILY LEARNING AND EXTENDED HOURS GROUPS, TOGETHER WITH THE RIGHT OF PARENTS TO TAKE RESPONSIBILITY FOR AND TO BECOME INVOLVED IN THE ACTIVITIES OF SUCH GROUPS, ENSURING THAT SUCH GROUPS OFFER OPPORTUNITIES FOR ALL CHILDREN WHATEVER THEIR RACE, CULTURE, RELIGION, MEANS OR ABILITY;  3.2 ENCOURAGING THE STUDY OF THE NEEDS OF SUCH CHILDREN AND THEIR FAMILIES AND PROMOTING PUBLIC INTEREST IN AND RECOGNITION OF SUCH NEEDS IN THE LOCAL AREAS;  3.3INSTIGATING AND ADHERING TO AND FURTHERING THE AIMS AND OBJECTS OF THE PRE-SCHOOL LEARNING ALLIANCE.

name: DEMENTIA SINGS OUT

name: PEEL BANK WOODLAND AND CONSERVATION TRUST
activities: To promote for the benefit of the public the conservation protection and improvement of the natural environment by the creation and preservation of urban and rural wildlife sanctuaries and woodland creation. And to advance the education of the public in the conservation, protection and improvement of the natural environment within the Ribble Valley area.
objects: TO PROMOTE FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC THE CONSERVATION PROTECTION AND IMPROVEMENT OF THE NATURAL ENVIRONMENT BY THE CREATION AND PRESERVATION OF URBAN AND RURAL WILDLIFE SANCTUARIES AND WOODLAND CREATION.  TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUBLIC IN THE CONSERVATION, PROTECTION AND IMPROVEMENT OF THE NATURAL ENVIRONMENT.

name: GRIMSBY ICE HOCKEY CLUB
activities: THE OBJECTS OF THE CHARITY ARE:  (A) TO PROMOTE COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION IN HEALTHY RECREATION BY PROVIDING FACILITIES FOR PLAYING ICE HOCKEY (FACILITIES MEANS LAND, BUILDINGS, EQUIPMENT AND ORGANISING ICE HOCKEY ACTIVITIES).  (B) TO PROVIDE AND ASSISTIN PROVIDING FACILITIES FOR SPORT, RECREATION AND OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION OF PEOPLE WHO HAVE NEED OF SUCH FACILITIES BECAUSE OF THEIR YOUTH, AGE, INFIRMITY OR DISABLEMENT, POVERTY OR SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC CIRCUMSTANCES OR FOR THE PUBLIC AT LARGEIN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CHARITY ARE:  (A) TO PROMOTE COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION IN HEALTHY RECREATION BY PROVIDING FACILITIES FOR PLAYING ICE HOCKEY (FACILITIES MEANS LAND, BUILDINGS, EQUIPMENT AND ORGANISING ICE HOCKEY ACTIVITIES).  (B) TO PROVIDE AND ASSISTIN PROVIDING FACILITIES FOR SPORT, RECREATION AND OTHER LEISURE TIME OCCUPATION OF PEOPLE WHO HAVE NEED OF SUCH FACILITIES BECAUSE OF THEIR YOUTH, AGE, INFIRMITY OR DISABLEMENT, POVERTY OR SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC CIRCUMSTANCES OR FOR THE PUBLIC AT LARGEIN THE INTERESTS OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND WITH THE OBJECT OF IMPROVING THEIR CONDITIONS OF LIFE.

name: KINGDOM EMPOWERMENT MINISTRIES INTERNATIONAL FELLOWSHIP (KEMIF)
activities: The advancement of the Christian religion mainly, but not exclusively, by means of broadcasting Christian messages of an evangelistic and teaching nature, through the holding of Christian religious worship, prayer meetings, lectures, public celebration of religious festivals, producing and/or distributing literature on Christian religion to enlighten others about the Christian religion.
objects: 1.THE ADVANCEMENT OF THE CHRISTIAN RELIGION MAINLY, BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY, BY MEANS OF BROADCASTING CHRISTIAN MESSAGES OF AN EVANGELISTIC AND TEACHING NATURE, THROUGH THE HOLDING OF CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS WORSHIP, PRAYER MEETINGS, LECTURES, PUBLIC CELEBRATION OF RELIGIOUS FESTIVALS, PRODUCING AND/OR DISTRIBUTING LITERATURE ON CHRISTIAN RELIGION TO ENLIGHTEN OTHERS ABOUT THE CHRISTIAN RELIGION.  2.TO ADVANCE IN LIFE AND RELIEVE NEEDS OF YOUNG PEOPLE BY PROVIDING SUPPORT AND ACTIVITIES WHICH DEVELOP THEIR SKILLS, CAPACITIES AND CAPABILITIES TO ENABLE THEM TO PARTICIPATE IN SOCIETY AS MATURE AND RESPONSIBLE INDIVIDUALS.  3.ADVANCE EDUCATION OF THE PUBLIC ON STABLE AND HEALTHY RELATIONSHIPS, INCLUDING PROMOTING THE CAPABILITY OF INDIVIDUALS TO FORM ANDSUSTAIN STABLE AND HEALTHY RELATIONSHIPS AS WELL AS EDUCATION AND RESEARCH INTO RELATIONSHIPS AND MATTERS CONNECTED WITH FAMILY LIFE.  4.TO PROMOTE SOCIAL INCLUSION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY WORKING WITH PEOPLE WHO ARE SOCIALLY EXCLUDED, TO RELIEVETHE NEEDS OF SUCH PEOPLE AND ASSIST THEM TO INTEGRATE INTO SOCIETY, THROUGH THE PROVISION OF A LOCAL NETWORK GROUP THAT ENCOURAGES AND ENABLES THOSE WHO ARE SOCIALLY EXCLUDED TO PARTICIPATE MORE EFFECTIVELY WITHIN THE WIDER COMMUNITY AND BY INCREASING, OR CO-ORDINATING, OPPORTUNITIES TO ENGAGE WITH SERVICE PROVIDERS, TO ENABLE THOSE PROVIDERS TO ADAPT SERVICES TO BETTER MEET THE NEEDS OF THAT COMMUNITY.

name: MANSFIELD WILDLIFE RESCUE
activities: FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC, TO RELIEVE THE SUFFERING AND DISTRESS OF WILDLIFE IN NEED OF CARE AND MEDICAL ATTENTION BY REASON OF SICKNESS, NEGLECT OR MISTREATMENT. TO PROVIDE AND MAINTAIN RESCUE HOMES AND OTHER FACILITIES FOR THE RECEPTION, CARE AND TREATMENT FOR SUCH WILDLIFE. TO EDUCATE AND PROMOTE TO THE PUBLIC THE ADVANCEMENT OF MATTERS CONCERNING ANIMAL WELFARE AND THE PREVENTION AND CRUELTY AND SUFFERING TO WILDLIFE. TO RELEASE RECOVERED WILDLIFE BACK TO THEIR NATURAL HABITAT OR PROVIDE OTHER FACILITIES WHERE WILDLIFE CANNOT BE RELEASED. TO COVER THE AREAS OF NOTTINGHAMSHIRE, DERBYSHIRE, LINCOLNSHIRE AND STH YORKSHIRE.
objects: FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC, TO RELIEVE THE SUFFERING AND DISTRESS OF WILDLIFE IN NEED OF CARE AND MEDICAL ATTENTION BY REASON OF SICKNESS, NEGLECT OR MISTREATMENT. TO PROVIDE AND MAINTAIN RESCUE HOMES AND OTHER FACILITIES FOR THE RECEPTION, CARE AND TREATMENT FOR SUCH WILDLIFE. TO EDUCATE AND PROMOTE TO THE PUBLIC THE ADVANCEMENT OF MATTERS CONCERNING ANIMAL WELFARE AND THE PREVENTION AND CRUELTY AND SUFFERING TO WILDLIFE. TO RELEASE RECOVERED WILDLIFE BACK TO THEIR NATURAL HABITAT OR PROVIDE OTHER FACILITIES WHERE WILDLIFE CANNOT BE RELEASED. TO COVER THE AREAS OF NOTTINGHAMSHIRE, DERBYSHIRE, LINCOLNSHIRE AND STH YORKSHIRE.

name: GLOBAL SIKH COUNCIL
activities: TO ADVANCE THE SIKH RELIGION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT WORLDWIDE, IN ACCORDANCE THE TEACHINGS OF THE SIKH SCRIPTURE, THE SRI GURU GRANTH SAHIB, AND THE 1945 SIKH REYAT MARYADA (SIKH CODE OF CONDUCT), IN PARTICULAR, BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY BY:  (A) PROVIDING A GLOBAL FORUM TO PROMOTE A WIDER UNDERSTANDING OF THE TEACHINGS; AND  (B)ACTING IN AN ADVISORY CAPACITY TO HELP SETTLE DISPUTES INVOLVING SIKH GURDWARAS AND MEMBER SIKH ORGANIZATIONS WITH THE CONSENT OF THE ORGANISATIONS CONCERNED.  3.2 THE PROMOTIONEQUALITY & DIVERSITY IN DIFFERENT COUNTRIES, WITH PARTICULAR REFERENCE TO RELIGIOUS FREEDOM AND TOLERANCE, FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY:  (A)THE ELIMINATION OF DISCRIMINATION ON THE GROUNDS OF RELIGION;  (B)CULTIVATING A SENTIMENT IN FAVOUR OF EQUALITYAND DIVERSITY;  (C)EDUCATING THE PUBLIC IN DIFFERENT RELIGIOUS BELIEFS INCLUDING AN AWARENESS OF THEIR DISTINCTIVE FEATURES AND THEIR COMMON GROUND TO PROMOTE GOOD RELATIONS BETWEEN PERSONS OF DIFFERENT FAITHS;  (D)PROMOTING KNOWLEDGE AND MUTUAL UNDERSTANDING AND RESPECT OF THE BELIEFS AND PRACTICES OF DIFFERENT RELIGIOUS FAITHS.  IN FURTHERANCE OF THAT OBJECT BUT NOT OTHERWISE, THE TRUSTEES SHALL HAVE POWER TO ENGAGE IN POLITICAL ACTIVITY PROVIDED THAT THE PROPOSED ACTIVITIES WILL FURTHER THE PURPOSES OF THE CHARITY TO AN EXTENT JUSTIFIED BY THE RESOURCES COMMITTED AND THE ACTIVITY IS NOT THE DOMINANT MEANS BY WHICH THE CHARITY CARRIES OUT ITS OBJECTS

name: EBS COUNSELLING
activities: A confidential Counselling Service in Eastleigh and the surrounding areas including Southampton to all those over the age of 18 who are in need of non -judgmental emotional support. To promote understanding of both physical and mental well-being.
objects: TO PRESERVE AND PROTECT PHYSICAL AND MENTAL HEALTH FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY PROVIDING COUNSELLING IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT LIMITED TO THOSE WHO HAVE LOST A RELATIVE OR FRIEND THROUGH DEATH AND TO ADVANCE PUBLIC EDUCATION ON THE IMPACT OF BEREAVEMENT ANDRELATED ISSUES.

name: CROESO MENAI
activities: THE RELIEF OF THOSE GRANTED REFUGEE STATUS AND THEIR DEPENDENTS, OR THOSE SEEKING ASYLUM OR THOSE WHO HAVE BEEN GRANTED HUMANITARIAN PROTECTION BY THE HOME OFFICE AND WHO RESIDE, OR WISH TO RESIDE, IN ANGLESEY OR GWYNEDD
objects: TO RELIEVE FINANCIAL HARDSHIP, ADVANCE EDUCATION AND PROMOTE SOCIAL INCLUSION AMONGST THOSE SEEKING ASYLUM AND THOSE GRANTED REFUGEE STATUS PARTICULARLY BY TO ASSISTING WITH THE RESETTLEMENT AND INTEGRATION OF FAMILIES AND BY ANY OTHER MEANS AS THE TRUSTEES IN THEIR DISCRETION SHALL DETERMINE.

name: HENLEY IN ARDEN AND DISTRICT DEMENTIA CAFE
activities: THE OBJECT OF THE CIO IS:    FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT, TO PRESERVE AND PROTECT GOOD HEALTH AMONG PEOPLE WITH DEMENTIA THEIR FAMILIES AND CARERS IN HENLEY IN ARDEN AND THE SURROUNDING AREA PARTICULARLY, BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY THROUGH THE PROVISION OF A SAFEENVIRONMENT TO HOLD REGULAR MEETINGS, TO PROVIDE STIMULATING EXPERIENCES THROUGH RECREATION, TO PROVIDE OUTSIDE SOCIAL TRIPS AND TO GIVE PRACTICAL AND EMOTIONAL SUPPORT, HELP AND ADVICE.
objects: THE OBJECT OF THE CIO IS:    FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT, TO PRESERVE AND PROTECT GOOD HEALTH AMONG PEOPLE WITH DEMENTIA THEIR FAMILIES AND CARERS IN HENLEY IN ARDEN AND THE SURROUNDING AREA PARTICULARLY, BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY THROUGH THE PROVISION OF A SAFEENVIRONMENT TO HOLD REGULAR MEETINGS, TO PROVIDE STIMULATING EXPERIENCES THROUGH RECREATION, TO PROVIDE OUTSIDE SOCIAL TRIPS AND TO GIVE PRACTICAL AND EMOTIONAL SUPPORT, HELP AND ADVICE.

name: THE GREGORY MILLS FOUNDATION (A CHARITABLE TRUST)
activities: TO ADVANCE EDUCATION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY PROVIDING GRANTS AND RAISING AWARENESS OF FINANCIAL NEED FOR CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE AGED 4 TO 22 ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD AS THE TRUSTEES SEE FIT;    TO ADVANCE PHYSICAL EDUCATION AND AMATEUR SPORT AND THE PHYSICAL DEVELOPMENT OF YOUNG PEOPLE FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY PROVIDING GRANTS AND RAISING AWARENESS OF FINANCIAL NEED ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD AS THE TRUSTEES SEE FIT;    TO RELIEVE THOSE IN NEED BY REASON OF FINANCIAL OR OTHER DISADVANTAGE FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY PROVIDING GRANTS AND RAISING AWARENESS OF FINANCIAL NEED ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD FOR THE PROVISION OF FOOD AND CLEAN WATER AS THE TRUSTEES SEE FIT;    TO PROVIDE GRANTS AND RAISING AWARENESS OF FINANCIAL NEED FOR THE PROVISION OF VETERINARY CARE AND TREATMENT AND RE-HOUSING OF ANIMALS THAT ARE ABANDONED, MISTREATED OR LOST ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD AS THE TRUSTEES SEE FIT; AND    THE ADVANCEMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION OR IMPROVEMENT INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE MARINE ENVIRONMENT ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD BY PROVIDING GRANTS AND RAISING AWARENESS AS THE TRUSTEES SEE FIT.
objects: TO ADVANCE EDUCATION FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY PROVIDING GRANTS AND RAISING AWARENESS OF FINANCIAL NEED FOR CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE AGED 4 TO 22 ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD AS THE TRUSTEES SEE FIT;    TO ADVANCE PHYSICAL EDUCATION AND AMATEUR SPORT AND THE PHYSICAL DEVELOPMENT OF YOUNG PEOPLE FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY PROVIDING GRANTS AND RAISING AWARENESS OF FINANCIAL NEED ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD AS THE TRUSTEES SEE FIT;    TO RELIEVE THOSE IN NEED BY REASON OF FINANCIAL OR OTHER DISADVANTAGE FOR THE PUBLIC BENEFIT BY PROVIDING GRANTS AND RAISING AWARENESS OF FINANCIAL NEED ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD FOR THE PROVISION OF FOOD AND CLEAN WATER AS THE TRUSTEES SEE FIT;    TO PROVIDE GRANTS AND RAISING AWARENESS OF FINANCIAL NEED FOR THE PROVISION OF VETERINARY CARE AND TREATMENT AND RE-HOUSING OF ANIMALS THAT ARE ABANDONED, MISTREATED OR LOST ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD AS THE TRUSTEES SEE FIT; AND    THE ADVANCEMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION OR IMPROVEMENT INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE MARINE ENVIRONMENT ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD BY PROVIDING GRANTS AND RAISING AWARENESS AS THE TRUSTEES SEE FIT.

name: WE APPEAL
activities: We Appeal is serving the humanity and improving the lives of the society, acknowledging emergencies, helping the homeless by providing basic essentials such as nutritious food, aiding the needy, orphans and widows, relieving poverty, supporting campaigns to rescue abandoned animals and protecting them, improving hygiene by supplying water facilities and preventing the risk of diseases.
objects: TO MAKE SUCH GRANTS AND DONATIONS FOR SUCH PURPOSES AS ARE EXCLUSIVELY CHARITABLE PURPOSES ACCORDING TO THE LAWS OF ENGLAND AND WALES AS THE TRUSTEES THINK FIT, IN PARTICULAR GRANTS SHALL BE AWARDED FOR THE FOLLOWING PURPOSES:  A) THE PREVENTION OR RELIEF OF POVERTY AND FINANCIAL HARDSHIP; AND  B) THE PROMOTION OF HUMANE BEHAVIOUR TOWARDS ANIMALS BY SUPPORTING EXISTING REGISTERED CHARITIES WHOSE PURPOSES ARE AIMED AT PROMOTING ANIMAL WELFARE AND HUMANE TREATMENT OF ANIMALS

name: THE OPEN BIONICS FOUNDATION
activities: The charity provides financial assistance to enable people, in need of a multi-functional upper limb prosthetic device and associated professional fitting services, who would not otherwise be able to take advantage of such technology.  It is able to help people of all ages worldwide, if necessary.
objects: THE RELIEF OF PERSONS THROUGHOUT THE WORLD WHO ARE IN NEED OF A PROSTHETIC LIMB OR DEVICE OR SERVICES IN ORDER TO IMPROVE THE FUNCTIONALITY OF AN IMPAIRED, PARTIALLY EXISTING OR NON-EXISTENT LIMB IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY BY PROVIDING FINANCIAL SUPPORT FOR:  (A)	THE DESIGN, MANUFACTURE AND MAINTENANCE OF PROSTHETIC LIMBS OR DEVICES FOR THE SPECIFIC BENEFIT OF SUCH PERSONS;  (B)	THE SUPPLY OF PROSTHETIC LIMBS OR DEVICES FOR THE SPECIFIC BENEFIT OF SUCH PERSONS;  (C)	THE SERVICES OF A PROSTHETIST TO HELP SUCH PERSONS OBTAIN THE OPTIMUM SOCKET DESIGN AND TO BE ABLE TO BENEFIT FROM THE FULL RANGE OF PROSTHETIC FUNCTIONALITY  (D)	THE DEVELOPMENT OF SPECIFIC PROJECTS TO ENHANCE THE CAPABILITIES AND PRACTICAL USES OF PROSTHETICS AND EXO-SKELETAL DEVICES.

name: ADVOCACY IN GREENWICH
activities: Supporting people with learning disabilities by:  Providing a range of independent advocacy services  Improving quality of life  Enabling people to assert their rights and make decisions about their future Develop  and deliver accessible training. Work strategically to influence policy and practice Greenwich and surrounding areas also specific projects and services across London and wider.
objects: TO SUPPORT DISABLED PEOPLE WITHIN THE AREA OF BENEFIT WITH A FOCUS ON PEOPLE WITH LEARNING DISABILITIES BY:  A) PROVIDING THEM WITH A RANGE OF INDEPENDENT ADVOCACY SERVICES, IMPROVING QUALITY OF LIFE AND ENABLING PEOPLE TO ASSERT THEIR RIGHTS.  B) SUPPORTING PEOPLE WHO ARE VULNERABLE OR AT A SOCIAL DISADVANTAGE TO MAKE DECISIONS ABOUT THEIR FUTURE.  C) SUPPORTING PEOPLE WHO ARE MARGINALISED TO DEVELOP A RANGE OF SKILLS.  D) DEVELOPING AND DELIVERING ACCESSIBLE TRAINING ALONGSIDE OUR BENEFICIARIES.E) TO WORK STRATEGICALLY TO INFLUENCE POLICY AND PRACTICE IN ADVOCACY ALONGSIDE AND ON BEHALF OF DISABLED PEOPLE.

name: FRIENDS AT DRAKE "FAD"
activities: THE OBJECT OF THE ASSOCIATION (THE OBJECTS) IS TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF PUPILS IN THE SCHOOL IN PARTICULAR BY:    2.1 DEVELOPING EFFECTIVE RELATIONSHIPS BETWEEN THE STAFF, PARENTS AND OTHERS ASSOCIATED WITH THE SCHOOL    2.2 ENGAGING IN ACTIVITIES OR PROVIDING FACILITIES OR EQUIPMENT WHICH SUPPORT THE SCHOOL AND ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUPILS.
objects: THE OBJECT OF THE ASSOCIATION (THE OBJECTS) IS TO ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF PUPILS IN THE SCHOOL IN PARTICULAR BY:    2.1 DEVELOPING EFFECTIVE RELATIONSHIPS BETWEEN THE STAFF, PARENTS AND OTHERS ASSOCIATED WITH THE SCHOOL    2.2 ENGAGING IN ACTIVITIES OR PROVIDING FACILITIES OR EQUIPMENT WHICH SUPPORT THE SCHOOL AND ADVANCE THE EDUCATION OF THE PUPILS.

name: KEYNOTE OPERA
activities: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO ARE:  TO ADVANCE PUBLIC EDUCATION IN AND APPRECIATION OF THE ART OF OPERA MUSIC AND MUSICAL THEATRE, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY BY PROMOTING INTEREST IN AND ACCESS TO OPERA THROUGH REGULAR PUBLIC PERFORMANCES AND WORKSHOPS AND BY OFFERING SINGERS AND COMPOSERS THE OPPORTUNITY TO WORK ALONGSIDE EXPERIENCED OPERA PRACTITIONERS TO DEVELOP AS ARTISTS AND COMPOSERS, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT LIMITED TO HELPING THOSE WHO ARE SOCIALLY OR ECONOMICALLY DISADVANTAGED AND UNDERREPRESENTED.
objects: THE OBJECTS OF THE CIO ARE:  TO ADVANCE PUBLIC EDUCATION IN AND APPRECIATION OF THE ART OF OPERA MUSIC AND MUSICAL THEATRE, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT EXCLUSIVELY BY PROMOTING INTEREST IN AND ACCESS TO OPERA THROUGH REGULAR PUBLIC PERFORMANCES AND WORKSHOPS AND BY OFFERING SINGERS AND COMPOSERS THE OPPORTUNITY TO WORK ALONGSIDE EXPERIENCED OPERA PRACTITIONERS TO DEVELOP AS ARTISTS AND COMPOSERS, IN PARTICULAR BUT NOT LIMITED TO HELPING THOSE WHO ARE SOCIALLY OR ECONOMICALLY DISADVANTAGED AND UNDERREPRESENTED.

name: COACH CORE FOUNDATION
activities: THE OBJECTS OF THE FOUNDATION ARE FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE PUBLIC: (A)	TO PROMOTE COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION IN HEALTHY RECREATION; (B)	TO PROMOTE EDUCATION PARTICULARLY BUT WITHOUT LIMITATION BY SUPPORTING CHILDREN AND YOUNG ADULTS TO OBTAIN QUALIFICATIONS RELATING TO SPORTS COACHING;
